Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Amy S wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Text: Myself and my partner (male and female in our mid-twenties) have just returned from a 7 night stay at this hotel. Overall our stay was average and I would not be planning to return. Unfortunately our cons list outweighed the pros there is room for improvement in this hotel which is far from a 5 star resort.    Pros:  - The hotel itself is lovely with staff cleaning and gardening consistently.    - The rooms are spacious with comfy beds and a good strong shower. (safe and hairdryer included as well as free use of the iron and board from reception)    - The entertainment both during the day and in the evenings was great during the day there are many activities and the staff are always friendly. In the evening there was calmer live music on from 8-10 and from 10 there was a dj belly dancers oriental show karaoke etc all with a great atmosphere and getting the audience involved.    - The food was mostly good. The buffet offers a very french influenced variety which includes fresh bread and pastries every day the snack bar at lunch was very handy as you could eat in swimwear outdoors. The dinner buffet was ok some dishes were cold but as with all all inclusive hotels some nights better than others depending on individual tastes however we never went hungry.    - In the evenings we had a wonderful waiter named Azdine who was very attentive and remembered our drinks order every night.    Cons:  - The buffet areas were often extremely busy which staff seemed to struggle to keep up with which resulted in lots of messy tables from previous guests which could not be used. This is not a reflection on the staff as they worked very hard to keep up but the volume of guests was too much for them.    - The snack bar has the potential to be better too. I love the idea of ordering from a menu and having fresh food made. However we often waited 10-20 minutes just to receive a menu and then have our order taken. I ordered a chicken burger one day which was 2 slabs of bread with 3 chicken nuggets inside. This felt cheap and not as expected for an advertised 5 star.    - The food signs in the buffet need to be evaluated and fast. The signs were often missing or misleading which would be very alarming for a person with any allergies or intolerances. Some signs which indicated a traditional moroccan dish did not name the ingredients included which meant they were often overlooked due to uncertainty.    - There is a huge plastic issue at this hotel. Plastic cups and bottles which were non-reusable were used around the pool all day and for most of the evening from the bar. This is alarming in terms of pollution and recycling and could be easily rectified by using washable and reusable plastic or paper cups. The cups should also be bigger as they often had enough juice for 3-4 sips then they were finished which resulted in us attending at the bar for soft juice in new cups more than we would like.    - We travelled into Marrakesh town on the free bus ran by the hotel (this is a coach transfer which was a very nice touch) however on arrival into Marrakesh our bus driver was speaking to a man outside the bus and told him which hotel we had been brought from. This man then proceeded to pretend to be a Be Live employee and flashed a fake ID badge at us and tried to take us on a tour down some unknown streets. This made us feel unsafe and untrustworthy of the bus driver. Keep this in mind that Be Live do not have a tour guide in Marrakesh.    - One of the major issues of our holiday was at the evening lobby bar where the entertainment was performed. Our drinks were watered down missing alcohol completely or just incorrect on most occasions. We raised these concerns with the bar staff on 3 nights during our 7 night stay and heard a multitude of other groups and couples complaining about the same. We would order 2 vodkas at the bar the staff would ask us to sit down so they could bring them over and when they arrived they were just juice. We quickly realised that we had to watch the drinks be poured to ensure they had completed our order.    - We also had issues with incorrect drinks such as asking for a rum and coke and being given a tequila and coke. We raised this again with staff who told us that ‚Äúrum and tequila are the same thing‚Äù. This was another risk for allergies. There are multiple reviews on trip adviser speaking to similar issues at the bar which I wish I had taken more seriously before paying for our stay here. I would recommend sticking with beer or wine to ensure these are correct.    - Another issue we faced constantly was that when we went to the bar we would often order 2 drinks each to save queuing especially during the shows. The staff were reluctant to give out more than one drink per person and questioned us on this multiple times. On once occasion we were also told ‚Äúthis is your last‚Äù in reference to the last drink we would be able to receive even though the bar was still open.    - Finally when we raised these complaints with the bar manger Achraf he implied that we were lying about the drinks and asked myself (female) ‚Äúdoes your mister think this too‚Äù. This was degrading as a women to feel that only my partners opinion would be respected. I felt as though my concerns were brushed off and that other waiters and bar staff were being told to limit the alcohol given to guests. This being an all inclusive hotel which was not cheap to visit is alarming that drinks are not available and correct. I appreciate that if we had been drunk or disorderly however we were a couple on a quiet holiday enjoying playing cards and sitting in the sunshine there was no excuse to skimp on the drinks.    Overall the negative points have outweighed the positive for us. We still enjoyed our holiday as the weather was great and we are quite easy going people. We will not be planning to return to this hotel and I am unsure if I would consider another Be Live hotel for the fear of finding similar issues.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sunshine wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Text: The staff are very nice and friendly. Be aware that there is a refundable deposit when checking in. Around ¬£100. The hotel has on going work outside especially off the garden facing Rooms. It was very noisy as there was pounding all afternoon. There is also a constant smell of sewage. The room was clean. The food is good.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: CCB wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Title: You get what you pay for‚Ä¶
Review_Text: ‚Ä¶which is to say this is a very basic hotel. Do not come expecting anything luxurious. This was my first experience with the brand and I would not recommend it to anyone I care about.    PROS:  - Nice welcome drink and snack upon arrival.  - Spacious and clean room  - The gym had working equipment and attendant and towel service.  - There was an effort to provide daily and nightly entertainment.  - Shuttle service was available (for a fee).  - Reliable Wi-Fi throughout.    CONS:  - No welcome info sent after booking.  - I found conflicting information about airport transportation. I had to reach out to coordinate (only $50 USD for our group of 6).  - Restaurant options are extremely limited basically just a buffer and snack bar. (A restaurant with a la carte options is available for those with a longer stay.) The buffet restaurant is severely understaffed. It‚Äôs self-seating but you have to fight for a clean table. Once you do that you wait for a tablecloth silverware and drink service. On one busy night I was treated to a previously used dirty tablecloth and no drink offered. It‚Äôs like they‚Äôre never prepared for the volume despite it being the main dining option.  - No poolside service.  - Slow snack bar service.  - Very limited beverage selection. The mixed drinks were generally not good. I had to give instructions for a Manhattan and that was only tolerable. You can stick with beer or wine but you get only one option for each category (red white rose). You can pay cash for champagne but we didn‚Äôt think it would be worth it.  - There is tea instant coffee and a Nespresso machine in the room. But only two Nespresso pods are complimentary.  - The nightly entertainment can be heard in the room (maybe a pro for some but made it hard for me to sleep).  - The room balcony is too high to enjoy a view while seated (again maybe the privacy is a pro for some).  - There are no designated smoking areas.    The worst part of our stay was in dealing with the concierge. We had spa reservations at another facility. We requested transportation the night before and were given a pickup time and price. When we showed up for our ride the driver was not there and the concierge did not seem concerned. He said he would call the driver no problem and we would not be late. The driver came 20 minutes after the scheduled pick up time and attempted to drop us off at the wrong location. Needless to say we were very late for our spa appointment. After our service I called the hotel to request pickup. 50 minutes later we were still waiting so I called again. A woman told me there was (another) miscommunication but they would send a driver. We waited another two hours and still did not have anyone pick us up. We eventually asked the location for a taxi in order to get back to the hotel. Once we returned and approached the front desk there the response was unbothered and unapologetic. The staff told us that the driver could not pick us up because (1) he couldn‚Äôt get through security (2) no one was waiting in the lobby for a pickup and (3) no one answered the phone. I asked why no one attempted to reach me via phone or email and the staff told us we could take it up with the concierge the next day. This disregard for our well-being was unsafe and disappointing.    Bottom line:  This place may be better suited for younger inexperienced guests but do not venture beyond the property plan ahead for the buffet and limit your drink preferences.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Ruth S wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Text: Spent a week in this hotel and enjoyed every minute in Marrakech. The hotel was just what we needed. Relaxation good food and drink excellent custom service exception rooms comfiest bed I have ever slept in and a quick shuttle service in Marrakech centre.  From the photos of this hotel on social media i went thinking there were alot of young people. On arrival it was a real cross section of ages and adults only was fabulous.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: jackieb wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Text: Can be noisy at night very quiet during the day. Most of the food was very enjoyable. Hotel was very secluded so you need to book a couple of trips we did a city tour and saw the marrakesh market absolutely crazy lol. We stopped half way for a meal the restaurant very nice but if you don't like couscous you are a bit stuck.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: msandys34 wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Title: Typical all inclusive, we enjoyed it!
Review_Text: Literally just got home following 3 days and nights at this hotel.  Food and drink is very typical all inclusive if you‚Äôve been to others it‚Äôs very samey samey. The drinks I thought where decent - beer and wine I thought where good especially the draft beer rather than the bottled but still ok.  Cocktails where all fine but depends who made the drink and how much alcohol or other mixers was put in.  Put it this way myself my wife and another couple knew we had been drinking all day on all of the days so it can‚Äôt be that bad! It‚Äôs certainly not watered down.  We got the shuttle bus into Medina which is free and booked the day before..a really good eye opening experience. We had a few drinks in rooftop bars etc all fine. But be prepared to be hassled quite a lot but a polite no thank you is fine.    But overall we enjoyed our stay at the hotel..rooms nice clean and modern English film channels to fall asleep to..  Staff where all quite nice and I suppose could have been a bit more chatty but maybe that‚Äôs just the way they are.  We joined in with some activities with the animation team and had a good laugh doing so.    We would recommend this hotel - maybe the sports bar could open earlier on a Saturday when the footballs on?  Although they did allow us to watch the tv‚Äôs but the bar wasn‚Äôt open until 17.00.    We didn‚Äôt use the ala carte restaurant
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Stephanie C wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Text: Beds were really comfortable with soft nice pillows ( I am a complete pillow snob!) Bedding was soft and clean.  Great black out blinds with aircon that was quiet.  Bathroom is a nice size clean well tiled and free from mould! Nice shower pressure whilst I didn't use the bath it looked good.    We were a bit of a walk away from the relax pool ( our room was outside the sports bar) it was well worth It as it was very quiet in the evening.    There are 2 pools. Both great in their own right. One has activities and music all day. The other is quiet and has a swim up bar.    We had a great spa the hot stone massage was great and the gym has all you need.    Food is good fresh and varied with opertinity for buffet pool restaurant and ala cart. All very good. Service at the pool restaurant is a bit slow also very hit and miss with remembering things. (I had to ask for butter 3 times) but it really wasn't a big deal just something to keep in mind.    Alcoholic drinks are weaker during the day and by looking at the state of some people I understand why!!    Feedback for improvement would be:    The stalls at the swim bus bar and textured enought to exfoliate your cheeks and ruin you bikini so take care.    Second is waste and recycling!!!  Small bottles of water single use plastic cups and straws coming out your ears.    Would love to see them give you a drinks bottle and a facility to re fill it. The same with pool side drinks no straws and reusable plastic cups would be ideal!!.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: guru_fordy17 wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Title: A good hotel for a hassle free holiday, but there are some meh bits
Review_Text: Got off to a bad start with flights so we ended up arriving at midnight for check-in. Good first impressions of the hotel and the staff were very accommodating. Got to our rooms (bottom floor) and quickly noticed how tired everything was especially in the bathroom. Cracked tiles pubic hair dirty grout and worst of all was the drain smell that singed your nostrils. So late at night we just needed sleep so in the morning we asked to be moved and there was no fuss made. Second room was on the first floor and was much better so all good. That being said the shower head could have done with unblocking at least half the rubber outlets!    From there everything was hassle free. Never had to complain or say anything to the staff.    So a few quick fire points:  + Stork Beer was nice and on tap!  + Try the chilli peppers in the buffet delicious and hot.  + The a-la-carte restaurant was pretty nice with good food and entertainment.  + Internet was ok measure 80D/90U on a speed test. WiFi held ok.  + East facing rooms were very quiet in the evening. Even facing the road there was nothing going down it.  - Cocktails had less than a shot added so make sure you ask for a double.  - Buffet was nice but a bit boring/safe on flavors. We're in a land of spice and some of it just tasted of nothing. They have a spicy sauce which literally had no spiciness to it. You could see the same sauces in different dishes and very little variety over the week we stayed.  - Coffee from the buffet tasted like Nescafe. Go across to the lobby bar for a proper ground coffee.  - Waiting staff very slow to greet and offer drinks.  - No bathrobe or slipper provided  - The view from the room was a bit poor. We overlooked a wasteland area with wheelie bins in. Good job we didn't use the balcony much.    Useful info:  Shuttle bus to Marrakech centre was good. Dropoff is 8C3JJ2G4+2R (put in Google Maps search). You have to book this the day before to get a ticket.  The buffet gets really busy after 9am and ran out of cutlery and crockery so get there before.  The a-la-carte restaurant doesn't switch it's AC on till after it opens so don't book for when it opens like we did it was like an inferno!  The a-la-carte restaurant doesn't have a dress code    Would we go back to this hotel again...maybe but I would look around first for something a bit more luxury. We hold Cancun All-Inclusive as the standard and this was not even close to that.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Emmaphilp1 wrote a review Oct 2022
Review_Text: Just returned from Be Live Marrakech Adults Only Hotel and i am already planning when I can return - next time likely as a solo traveller as I felt so safe within the hotel complex.  ALL the staff were beyond helpful and so hardworking - really wish I could remember everyones names. The maintainence/domestic/gardeners are literally working ALL the time keeping the complex absolutly spotless. The bar/reception/restaurant staff were so attentive and friendly - clearly worked off their feet though.  Salah at reception couldnt have been more friendly or helpful Adzine in the Lobby Bar - thank you for keeping our wine glasses topped up Sara in the bar - beautiful smile and so helpful Ema from entertainment team - thank you for the game of dominoes in the Sports Bar.    I know this hotel is advertised as 5star and as wonderful as it is I wouldnt quite say it was 5star.    Food in the buffet restaurant is plentiful and the chefs are fantastic. Local flavours large choices of meats fish shellfish salads veg breads fruits desserts juices etc. Small selection of ‚Äòbritish food‚Äô to keep the fussier eaters happy - plus the snack bar caters for those wanting pizza burgers etc.    The wines are local Morrocan wine - very nice!  Spirits and beers are also local and not premium but good choice of cocktails.    I visited the gym on an overcast day which was small but fairly well equipped.  My friend visited the spa (not included in the price) and had an amazing experience.    Cant wait to return to this hotel and to Morroco.  Thank you to all the Be Live Hotel staff who made our holiday one to remember.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Richard R wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: My fianc√©e and I had a 9 night stay here at the end of September and we would definitely recommend.    The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Both pools were very clean and the overall quality of the food was good.    We stayed in a Superior Room with a garden view. The room was very comfortable and we had no issues to report.    The live music every evening before dinner really enhanced the experience and we didn‚Äôt struggle to get spots at either pool at any time of day (though the quiet pool with the swim up bar did fill up faster).    We saw a few otherwise very positive reviews before we came which said they didn‚Äôt consider this a five star hotel. I think this comes down to the size of the hotel resort itself. It‚Äôs quite a small place relative to similar resort type locations I‚Äôve visited in the past. However I think the smaller size also has its positives as the atmosphere of an evening around the smaller entertainment area was always really upbeat and fun.    One small improvement would be opening the sports bar earlier. This really was a hidden gem with a good pool table table football and board games (as well as a nice bar) it was a shame it didn‚Äôt open until 5 pm.    The quality and variety of food (especially the pizza and made to order pasta station) was better than expected based on some reviews we read.    Overall we had a fantastic holiday and would definitely come again or visit another BeLive Collection resort.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kome B wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Wonderful experience at Be Live Collection. Excellent service from the staff who are always cheerful responsive and helpful. Special thanks to Marwa from guest services Laila Saad Ahmed Hassan and Ilham for a good dining experience. Lovely pictures taken by Zanji Rasta man. Will definitely visit again
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Bailey Coe wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Such a great time away with my partner and such beautiful people.  Massive shout out to the homies Mustafa Zanji and Yasin who made us feel so welcome and were genuinely so friendly.  Zanji and Yasin are incredibly skilled photographers and not only are they talented but also very welcoming.  Mustafa was always happy to chat and always went out of his way to ensure we were having a great time would love to have tipped him to show our gratitude as I can only thank him so many times but we left before having the chance.  Thanks to all the staff too‚ù§Ô∏è
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Curiosity788873 wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Excellent All Inclusive Stay at this outside of Marakesh hotel. Food was very good with lots of fresh salads fruit fish and meats. So many choices for every palate and every day something different.    Rooms large well appointed and very clean. Pleasant amd helpful staff. OK this is not a 5 star like the Ritz Carlton or Raffles however it is a very good 4 star plus all inclusive resort. Grounds are beautifully kept with several pools bars and lots of very good evening entertainment like Celebrity cruises on land.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jordan I H wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Okay stay. Money they take as a deposit still not refunded though!
Review_Text: We stayed a few weeks back. It was decent though they took a "deposit" of ¬£80 when we arrived said it's cancelled but we haven't received any of it back yet. Had anyone else had this issue? Getting v annoyed now because I need this money
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Karis B wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: There is Titif Ema Oussama Mohamed and all the entertainment team are absolutely amazing they great with getting everyone involved water aerobics is amazingg i would definitely recommend this hotel its out of this world. Cant wait to come back xx‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Hafiza R wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Amazing entertainment here at the Be Live Marrakech-the staff really make your holiday here. Emma is the friendliest face you will ever meet-big shout out to her and the team for making our holiday even more special. She always has a smile on her face and gets you really involved. Me and my partner don‚Äôt usually do as much as we did here but it was so much fun to get involved in aqua aerobics the belly dancing and archery. Absolutely loved it. Great evening entertainment the team always get you up dancing great bar staff who always remember what you are drinking. Feeling fabulous after a refreshing week here highly recommended!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Ngozi O wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: I came with a group of friends for my 50th birthday celebration and it was amazing best trip ever photographer Zanji was awesome and professional Maruwa the receptionist was very helpful our domestic in room 2020 left us feeling extra special with clean room. Thanks to all the staff and I will be recommending it
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: nina wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Honest review without the help of the entertainment team to write it‚Ä¶.    Just to note we noticed the entertainment team taking peoples phones to write reviews on many occasions throughout our five night stay. Beware the short badly written reviews!    It was a lovely hotel and our first visit to Morocco. The food was amazing we love this style of food anyway and were never disappointed. The quality of seafood was fantastic.    Have to say at this point if you want British food stay at home or go to Spain.    We stayed in a swim up room and it was worth the extra. Gorgeous clean pleasure to stay in.    The staff were so hardworking friendly and helpful the whole way through. Couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. No fault there whatsoever.    Very clean. Nothing near by though so cabin fever can set in. Other holiday makers let the holiday down mainly British. Fights between couples lots of swearing.    Would agree with previous reviews not five star lots of broken tiles needs some updating no air conditioning in bars and restaurants. The evening entertainment area was no where near big enough you‚Äôll be lucky to get a table. Singers every night until 10pm great voices but very Smooth FM. Bring the fun entertainment on earlier please people want to dance / laugh!    We did have a lovely time and the weather was fab but for what we paid we would try somewhere else first.    To the hotel your bar / evening staff are a real credit to you they deserve the great reviews and work so hard.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: cueballlil wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Great week away at this hotel.
Review_Text: 1st visit to Morocco and this hotel group. This hotel was so clean everywhere. The staff are so helpful especially Rajaa in the restaurant at breakfast and lunch. Nothing was to much trouble for her and always did it with a smile. The food for a buffet restaurant was great has was the snack bar. Always found something good to have. Both pool and bar staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms are cleaned to a good standard every day. The grounds and gardens are kept to a high standard. I would gladly go back and also highly recommend the hotel.

It was a lovely hotel and our first visit to Morocco. The food was amazing we love this style of food anyway and were never disappointed. The quality of seafood was fantastic.    Have to say at this point if you want British food stay at home or go to Spain.    We stayed in a swim up room and it was worth the extra. Gorgeous clean pleasure to stay in.    The staff were so hardworking friendly and helpful the whole way through. Couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. No fault there whatsoever.    Very clean. Nothing near by though so cabin fever can set in. Other holiday makers let the holiday down mainly British. Fights between couples lots of swearing.    Would agree with previous reviews not five star lots of broken tiles needs some updating no air conditioning in bars and restaurants. The evening entertainment area was no where near big enough you‚Äôll be lucky to get a table. Singers every night until 10pm great voices but very Smooth FM. Bring the fun entertainment on earlier please people want to dance / laugh!    We did have a lovely time and the weather was fab but for what we paid we would try somewhere else first.    To the hotel your bar / evening staff are a real credit to you they deserve the great reviews and work so hard.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: cueballlil wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Great week away at this hotel.
Review_Text: 1st visit to Morocco and this hotel group. This hotel was so clean everywhere. The staff are so helpful especially Rajaa in the restaurant at breakfast and lunch. Nothing was to much trouble for her and always did it with a smile. The food for a buffet restaurant was great has was the snack bar. Always found something good to have. Both pool and bar staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms are cleaned to a good standard every day. The grounds and gardens are kept to a high standard. I would gladly go back and also highly recommend the hotel.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Richard R wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: My fianc√©e and I had a 9 night stay here at the end of September and we would definitely recommend.    The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Both pools were very clean and the overall quality of the food was good.    We stayed in a Superior Room with a garden view. The room was very comfortable and we had no issues to report.    The live music every evening before dinner really enhanced the experience and we didn‚Äôt struggle to get spots at either pool at any time of day (though the quiet pool with the swim up bar did fill up faster).    We saw a few otherwise very positive reviews before we came which said they didn‚Äôt consider this a five star hotel. I think this comes down to the size of the hotel resort itself. It‚Äôs quite a small place relative to similar resort type locations I‚Äôve visited in the past. However I think the smaller size also has its positives as the atmosphere of an evening around the smaller entertainment area was always really upbeat and fun.    One small improvement would be opening the sports bar earlier. This really was a hidden gem with a good pool table table football and board games (as well as a nice bar) it was a shame it didn‚Äôt open until 5 pm.    The quality and variety of food (especially the pizza and made to order pasta station) was better than expected based on some reviews we read.    Overall we had a fantastic holiday and would definitely come again or visit another BeLive Collection resort.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kome B wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Wonderful experience at Be Live Collection. Excellent service from the staff who are always cheerful responsive and helpful. Mustafa was always happy to chat and always went out of his way to ensure we were having a great time would love to have tipped him to show our gratitude as I can only thank him so many times but we left before having the chance.  Thanks to all the staff too‚ù§Ô∏è

Grounds are beautifully kept with several pools bars and lots of very good evening entertainment like Celebrity cruises on land.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: At0micandy wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Great for a break away from it all
Review_Text: Arrival and booking in was great and the room welcoming. Large comfortable double bed with table and chair room safe tea and coffee making. Mini Bar is empty but useful for storing and cooling water and drinks. We had a swim up room which we thought poor and when we return we will not go for again. It is more of a paddle up and they insist on putting the sun loungers in the water - not good if you like to browse electronic items! For what the upgrade cost the swim up is poor. The buffet restaurant took a bit of getting used to - the food is plentiful and varied but different from usual UK tastes. The usuals bread rolls pastries omelettes etc plenty of fruits but I did struggle to find a selection of cheeses. The A La Carte restaurant was really not to our taste everything tasted of apricots or almonds we shall not revisist when we go back. 2 swimming pools one busy and noisy and the other quiet - both had plenty of sunbeds and parasols. The Quieter pool also had several cabanas which were great to respite from the hot sun. However the cushions in the cabanas were all tired and desperately need replacing. In the week we were there we managed to get a pair of sunbeds or a cabana whenever we wanted no need to do the 6 AM towel run. Drinks from the various bars were OK but tended to be weak. I did struggle getting a coffee to my taste I suspect it was their choice of bean. Staff were pretty much all great and warm and friendly no complaints there at all. We stayed in the hotel all week so cannot comment on local amenities the hotel had everything we wanted we booked late check out and that was absolutely perfect for our flight times. We shall book again next year a great hotel with no children screaming and a quiet pool. Perfect for us to relax.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Arianne D wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Had a lovely stay nice and relaxing atmosphere especially around the pool. The food is amazing and the staff are very attentive especially Azdine. What a legend. He remembers everyones drink orders and makes sure you are never without a drink and always has a smile on his face.  Would definitely stay here again and recommend to my friends and family!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Zoey H wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Great vibes friendly staff solid entertainment    Different activities throughout the day and different themes/entertainment at night.    Loved aqua aerobics classes karaoke night and DJ night!! We‚Äôre definitely coming back!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: michelle p wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Just got back from a short four night stay and can't fault it. The rooms are clean and spacious the food tasty and plentiful with ac good range of local dishes fish salads and pasta and pizza etc in the restaurant and snacks and sandwiches at the pool bar. Both pools are lovely with one much quieter than the other space to sunbathe and a swim up bar. The spa is large and well run with an indoor pool. Being all inclusive and childfree made it a very relaxing place to stay. Every single member of the staff we met was friendly and kind. Thank you for a lovely stay.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Martin H wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Myself and my partner spent 7 nights at Be Live Collection. We arrived at the hotel around 10pm which by then the main dining area had closed. The room was fantastic clean spacious and the bed was absolutely comfortable and big which I loved as I like to toss and turn thoughout the night. There is a window in-between the bathroom and the bedroom which allows you to see the person showering however there is a mesh blind however you can still see depending on light. This is not a problem if you are with your partner but if you are sharing with mates your not comfortable seeing you have a bath/shower just bear this in mind.    There are two pools the quiet pool which also has the swim up bar we never visited and spent most of our time at the main pool. The main pool does host various water games to keep you entertained. I got involved in one or two which I fully enjoyed. The water sports and pool side games were hosted by Emma and Titif who were amazing and a big credit to the hotel. From day one I was approached at pool side by Oussama who went out of his way and provided me with a parasol everyday and made sure I had sunshade while my partner had the sun. Well done and thank you.    The food I found overall ok and found food I like.However my partner had an upset stomach after day two and didn't like hardly any of the food.    Outside the hotel there is no amenities however the hotel does run a free bus into the local town were you will find restaurants shops and the market. If you are going to the market just be sure to keep your belongs safe and not to carry and valuables goods such as jewellery and be prepared to be harassed by the locals as they can be quite intense. The bus to the town you do need to book in advance .    Overall the hotel is very clean and there are cleaners always cleaning a=so they take pride in the hotel. I would definitely visit this hotel again.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Katrina K wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Absolutely amazing special the entertainment team and man called sexy belly was a star made us feel very welcome and good food. Great rooms and staff are very friendly. Check in teams are good and helpful
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jon D wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Been here 3 days so far.  Foods vert bice. Drinks are great.  Excellent water aerobics classes run in the mornings good fun. Run by Secy belly and jordano.  Rooms very spacipus abd clean.    No compaints so far!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kaz wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Well what can I say the title says it all but anyway here‚Äôs my full review lol!    To begin with the staff were always happy and available whenever you needed them nothing seemed to be much trouble.    We had a swim up room which was amazing I would definitely recommend choosing one of these rooms. Always lovely and clean maids were great. Pity there just wasn‚Äôt a few more English channels on the tv but always a film channel which was good my hubby missed the sports channel though!    Food was great lunchtime and evening. I noticed a few negative reviews about the food but there was always something you could find to eat. Yes there was a selection of daily tagines but you are in Morocco? They had a different meat which was carved each evening the lamb especially was fantastic. Lots of various pastas. The French stick breads were lovely and just like ours at home. Different soup each evening and my husband had the chicken soup and said it was amazing the best chicken soup he‚Äôd ever tasted and he‚Äôs fussy when it comes to his soups!! Lovely seafood calamari large prawns mussels in various sauces. The chefs and staff work so hard to please. The only slight downside was they never seemed to be any fries? I know we all love fries so that might be something they need to look into. But again staff couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. So yes the seating area was a little annoying poor serving staff rushed off their feet but tried to lay the tables and serve you as quickly as they could. Breakfast was also good omelettes made to order the general breakfast items wasn‚Äôt keen on the chorizo breakfast sausage and no bacon but everything else good. Dried fruit fresh fruit daily pastries cheeses hams and more enough choice for most people I‚Äôm sure. Well you certainly won‚Äôt go hungry. I would only say it‚Äôs a pity there isn‚Äôt a little snack place open late evening. Restaurant closes at 10.00 but entertainment finishes are 12.00 and I always need a little snack before I go to bed but that‚Äôs just me lol! Tbh I used to take a few biscuits and cakes to have later.    Evening entertainment was well as it can a in most countries bit hit and miss. The two male singers each evening were very good Brazilian dancers were worth watching not keen on the group that where there on a couple of occasions. DJ was great and karaoke was a a laugh and if you didn‚Äôt want to join in you could laugh at everyone else! Again very busy and lack of tables but staff always found you at been and chairs. Again I must say Azine was a fabulous waiter rushed off his feet but always remembers what we were having to drink and everyone else‚Äôs he worked his socks off so to speak always supplying drinks to people as quickly as he could he did a great job well done Azdine!    The food at the snack bar was nice but the buns and bread served there was so sweet too sweet for us so I just used to order some of the French stick bread. Hey but this was the only place you could get French fries! Again sometimes you had to was a little while for your food/ drinks but you can see they are so busy but always happy and pleasant. Shout out goes to I think Hamzi‚Äôs great guys!    Last but not least the Animation Team fabulous guys if you wanted to join in with the activities you could but no problem if you didn‚Äôt they definitely weren‚Äôt in your face so to speak. Daily activities of archery darts water aerobics water polo and lots of games. The staff were amazing especially Titif what a lovely kind helpful young man you are a truly great asset to the hotel continuously working hard day and night missing you already! Now Emma another fabulous member of the animation team lovely helpful young lady.    My hubby loves a massage whilst on holiday so opted for the 3 day sessions. He said they were all great but the hot stones were amazing the best massage he‚Äôs had by far. Not quite sure of the young ladies name that did the stone massage but good value for money.    Free coach to the centre of Marrakesh 3 times day. We went with friends we met at the hotel one being for a drink and meal. Similar to a lot of countries lots of people trying to sell you items you don‚Äôt want so just politely say no the thanks.    We didn‚Äôt go on any trips so can‚Äôt comment about those as we just wanted a relaxing holiday but lots of people that went on various trips seemed to enjoy them.    Well I think that‚Äôs about it happy holidays!!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Christopher T wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: The animation team at BeLive were amazing they encouraged you to get involved in all activities but they weren‚Äôt pushy if you didn‚Äôt want to participate!  The whole team were great but Titif & the tall Oussama really made a conscious effort to make the activities that extra bit enjoyable & fun!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: marilyn rachael b wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Lovely hotel very nice location lovely rooms and stunning grounds brilliant swimming pools. Staff especially the bar staff were superb loved the musicians of a evening.  Food very good with lots of choices

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lauren D wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: We have just returned from a 9 night stay at Be Live. We have had a lovely time at this beautiful hotel however would recommend considering 9 nights due to the certain negatives which we encountered.    Hotel: The hotel itself is very modern and beautiful. The rooms are very spacious and provide a lovely touch to the hotel. Our toiletries were not topped up regularly (shampoos etc) however we took our own at the beginning so this wasn‚Äôt a big problem! The television only has x2 English Channels (but we weren‚Äôt bothered because we don‚Äôt really watch the television much). The room is cleaned daily and the maids always done a perfect job- I often asked for coffee creams to be added to the mini bar which they done immediately! The air con In the room worked a treat and the beds are very comfy!    The hotel is always very clean and there is always staff about cleaning and maintaining the gardens there is a lot of space which could be used for other things which is abandoned though. For instance on floor 1 there is a very big spacious area with x2 outside balconies which would make a perfect bar / cocktail sitting area - however no one sits there and everyone tries to get seated in the bar downstairs near the live music.    Food: The food itself is delicious and they do provide a wide range of foods! Breakfasts include eggs pastries fruits cheeses and Hams omelettes and pancakes. However a lot of the food is always the same and sometimes cold. For example you can guarantee that there will be couscous beef tagine rice or Turkey on the menu on an evening. The desserts aren‚Äôt that good - they are quite small and they are pretty much all the same- but they are tasty! The food itself is lovely and the waiters in the dining area are a credit to the hotel. The food does cater for a wide variety such as: mussels lamb beef Turkey dishes pasta dishes vegetables rice couscous etc‚Ä¶.    A big negative about the food / dining area is how small it is. As the hotel gets quite busy the food area to plate and collect your food is extremely small and this often leads to queuing for your food and feeling on top of one another.    Cocktails: One thing we really enjoyed about this hotel was the amazing selection of drinks and cocktails! The cocktails are beautiful and there is a lot on tne menu to choose from including: tequila sunrise fun on the beach pina coladas Malibu and coke mojito strawberry mojito etc! We spent most of our time at the quiet pool and have to give a MASSIVE credit to the bar men at the swim up pool bar! There was mainly only one gent on there the full day and he was none stop all day making sure you were served straight away. Nothing was a bother to him!    Staff: The staff at the hotel are lovely and will do anything for you. They are definitely under staffed and especially on a night time downstairs near the live music ! Azdine is the only waiter and is an absolute credit to the hotel- he was very humorous and got on with everyone taking everyone‚Äôs order and running round all night. No fault of Azdine as he possibly couldn‚Äôt do anymore he is that busy and doing an incredible job however the hotel would massively benefit from more staff on an evening.    Spa: Unfortunately we didn‚Äôt get the chance to book the spa which was one of the main reasons we booked this hotel. The spa costs ‚Ç¨15.00 each per hour even just to use the indoor pool.    Check in wasn‚Äôt until 3pm- which when we arrived at 12:30pm wasn‚Äôt great - however the staff had the room ready for us early as we had asked and it was ready for 1:30pm. You do have to pay a deposit and tax when you arrive - however this is refunded at the end of your visit.    The entertainment is good and the singers are great. Unfortunately as you can‚Äôt really leave the resort on an evening the evening entertainment is always the same (live music) so we would often get a couple of drinks and take them back to our room because it was always the same.    Overall we have had a lovely holiday and a 9 night stay at the hotel - I would definitely return to this hotel.    Thanks to all of the staff for such a lovely stay and all of your hard work l.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: James V wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: We‚Äôre on holiday and love the services. The staff are lovely and our rooms are cleaned everyday. The gym is pretty good does the job. We especially enjoyed Carlos Reyes‚Äô help he‚Äôs always the first to smile and welcome us at the Marketplace buffet

Review_Text: Location of the hotel is remote. No shops close by. The hotel is clean and new. The rooms are a good size. Were kept waiting for our rooms though. Now being all inclusive the food is ok. It was repetitive on most nights. Lunch at the snack bar was much better than the buffet. Now the biggest problem is the alcoholic drinks. They are so watered down you could not get drunk even if you tried. I know the point is not to get drunk but seriously. Disappointed. Bar staff were great. The pools were great. Pool bar bars not so great. Giving us drinks that wasps had sat on. Not good. The entertainment team were absolutely fantastic. If it was not for them we would of had such a boring holiday. The free bus to the medina was good. Maybe being someone who has been to many great all inclusive hotel my expectations were of a higher standard. I would not return to this hotel but to Marrakech I would.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Grzegorz W wrote a review Sep 2022

Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Alicja U wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: We are really enjoying our holiday in the hotel. Entertainment every day was great. Staff was very friendly and Look after us everyday. Great fun in aqua aerobics and archery. The evening entertainment was very nice involving people to dance and sing. Great holiday and definitely come back. üòÅ
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kevin S wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Lovely week in a lovely Hotel
Review_Text: This is our last night of our week here  and we have had a very chilled week the staff are amazing with a special mention for Rajaa in the restaurant her constant smile is a joy and nothing is to much trouble to Azdine the Lobby bar waiter who again has a constant smile and how he knows your drinks and where you are sitting is beyond us and finally Youness top Barman a smile a conversation and knows your drink every time and a lovely guy  we would agree the hotel needs more staff especially in the bar but otherwise we have had a great time if you want a chilled time this is the place for you.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Anne W wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Your entertainment crew were amazing. During the daytime pool entertainment and evenings. Amazing xx  I took part in aqua aerobics archery and many more. And evening dancing was a huge part of my enjoyment
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Georgina S wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Titif has provided really amazing entertainment during our time at Be.Live Collection Hotel in Morocco. From Aqua Aerobics to ball games in the pool he‚Äôs led loads of really fun activities and has always put a smile on our face! He comes over to all the people who are staying at the hotel and makes them feel very welcome having lots of conversations with them and we are very grateful to have spent time with amazing reps at this hotel like Titif.    The night entertainment has been really fun as well with different forms of entertainment each night (latino dancing Karaoke Live Bands)
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Daniel C wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: The activities and entertainment were fantastic - we did aqua aerobics every day and was a lot of the day and the team worked hard to look after us around the pool. The night activities were equally as fun and we really enjoyed especially Tittif the legend.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Christopher T wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: We stayed at Be Live Collection Adults Only for a week all inclusive as a relaxation holiday!    We would definitely come back here again!    The bars are under staffed which is a shame considering the bar staff work effortlessly to ensure your experience is enjoyable.  Azdine always remembers your drink order & brings them over regularly he may be rushed of his feet but he always has a smile on his face & gets your drink order right every time.    We both suffer from nut allergies & feel the food should be more clearly labelled with notes on certain ingredients included there should also be more choice for allergy sufferers.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Anton W wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: The entertainment staff are really friends and put on great activities big shout to Emma and Mohammed who were friendly from the start! Bothe afternoon activities and evening were great! Made my trip!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Georgina S wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: Titif has provided really amazing entertainment during our time at Be.Live Collection Hotel in Morocco. From Aqua Aerobics to ball games in the pool he‚Äôs led loads of really fun activities and has always put a smile on our face! He comes over to all the people who are staying at the hotel and makes them feel very welcome having lots of conversations with them and we are very grateful to have spent time with amazing reps at this hotel like Titif.    The night entertainment has been really fun as well with different forms of entertainment each night (latino dancing Karaoke Live Bands)
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Daniel C wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: The activities and entertainment were fantastic - we did aqua aerobics every day and was a lot of the day and the team worked hard to look after us around the pool. The night activities were equally as fun and we really enjoyed especially Tittif the legend.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Christopher T wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Text: We stayed at Be Live Collection Adults Only for a week all inclusive as a relaxation holiday!    We would definitely come back here again!    The bars are under staffed which is a shame considering the bar staff work effortlessly to ensure your experience is enjoyable.  Azdine always remembers your drink order & brings them over regularly he may be rushed of his feet but he always has a smile on his face & gets your drink order right every time.    We both suffer from nut allergies & feel the food should be more clearly labelled with notes on certain ingredients included there should also be more choice for allergy sufferers.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kevin S wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Lovely week in a lovely Hotel
Review_Text: This is our last night of our week here  and we have had a very chilled week the staff are amazing with a special mention for Rajaa in the restaurant her constant smile is a joy and nothing is to much trouble to Azdine the Lobby bar waiter who again has a constant smile and how he knows your drinks and where you are sitting is beyond us and finally Youness top Barman a smile a conversation and knows your drink every time and a lovely guy  we would agree the hotel needs more staff especially in the bar but otherwise we have had a great time if you want a chilled time this is the place for you.

The bars are under staffed which is a shame considering the bar staff work effortlessly to ensure your experience is enjoyable.  Azdine always remembers your drink order & brings them over regularly he may be rushed of his feet but he always has a smile on his face & gets your drink order right every time.    We both suffer from nut allergies & feel the food should be more clearly labelled with notes on certain ingredients included there should also be more choice for allergy sufferers.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Review_Date: Kevin S wrote a review Sep 2022
Review_Title: Lovely week in a lovely Hotel
Review_Text: This is our last night of our week here  and we have had a very chilled week the staff are amazing with a special mention for Rajaa in the restaurant her constant smile is a joy and nothing is to much trouble to Azdine the Lobby bar waiter who again has a constant smile and how he knows your drinks and where you are sitting is beyond us and finally Youness top Barman a smile a conversation and knows your drink every time and a lovely guy  we would agree the hotel needs more staff especially in the bar but otherwise we have had a great time if you want a chilled time this is the place for you.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Vanessa S wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: Everything is perfect.  Azdine from the bar is a cocktail genius salim animation manager makes you work hard & play hard & titif is the aqua master  The food has everything you could ever wish for so much choice  Nothing to fault I anyway  Recommended 100%
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Cloger365 wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: My partner and I stayed at Be Live Collection for a week on 14th June. On arrival to the hotel we were greeted with Moroccan mint tea and snacks. The staff were very friendly and the check in process very easy. You will have to pay a tourist tax on arrival and a deposit for the room however this is refunded on departure.    We had a road view room which was very spacious. The king size bed was changed each morning and was very comfortable. The shower worked however there was an issue with the altering attachement which meant it shot at the wall the full time. The rainfall shower did not work and looked as if it was for decorative purposes only. Each morning the towels were changed.    The pool areas were immaculate. The larger pool was our preference as there was music on and a good atmosphere. The entertainment team were fabulous and really worked hard to get people involved...however did not pressure you into activities either. The Yoga was great as was aqua aerobics and darts. The cleaning staff regularly cleared away cups and swept away water from the side of the pool which could be slippy.  The smaller pool was lovely to relax later in the day. The swim up bar did often have a bit of a wait as only 1 person was serving. The glass bottle beers were a hit for us! At times the cocktails did need more alcohol but staff were more than happy to add more. The cocktail menu had a number of options and all were very tasty - strawberry mojito was my favourite!    The nighttime entertainment particularly the singers were brilliant. It was chilled and easy going with nothing too ‚Äúin your face‚Äù. There was plenty of space to relax at night and the outside space was lovely. We weren‚Äôt ever bothered by mosquitoes which was a hit but there was numerous cats running around which really put me off. It did not help that guests would feed them or pet them.    The gym was small but had excellent range of equipment for a few workouts over the duration of the holiday. The fresh towels and cold water were a great addition. It was never too busy which helped.    Moving onto the food. The pool bar provided bar snacks throughout the day including pizza toasties burger and chips. This menu catered to all and everything was fresh and tasted great. The breakfast buffet had a lot to offer. The pancakes were a huge hit as well as the freshly made omelettes and fresh fruit and yoghurt. However the evening buffet was a huge disappointment. There were bizarre combinations of flavours limited choice and on one occasion we had chicken nuggets (baring in mind it‚Äôs adults only) as there was limited options available. For dessert I would recommend the small fruit pastry tarts - delicious! My partner did experience an upset stomach after eating the cold prawns which did impact on the holiday. At nighttime the cats are always prowling around the outdoor area of the buffet so be aware. We did attend the Moroccan restaurant one night but again the food was similar to that offered in the buffet but presented in a slightly nicer manner. The cous cous was very dry and the chicken dish was very olivey.    The hotel offers a shuttle bus to-from the city on a 2 hourly basis. It is a easy way to get in and out. Dropped off at the Jeema-El Fna and easy to get a taxi to other areas of the city.    All the staff at the hotel were attentive and very friendly and helpful. I cannot fault them at all!    Overall the stay was good however improvements on the food are needed to make it a true 5* hotel.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Chrissylew22 wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Title: Great hotel in a convenient setting and good facilities but trust nobody - our money was stolen!
Review_Text: The facilities and hotel were fantastic and we would recommend the guided trip to Marrakesh markets booked through the tour company in the hotel lobby as they were friendly and helpful and very informative. The YSL gardens are fab and if you go with a guide you jump the queue. You also get little to no hassle in the markets and if you don't want to to barter they will do it for you. The main pool has loads of activities to get involved in. The drinks are good and the food is what you would expect from this sort of holiday. Rooms are clean and modern looking. Buffet restaurant staff could be more attentive with drinks etc but they are friendly when they are. The reception staff were fine on arrival however we were not happy with the experience with them at the end of the holiday. Myself and my partners money was taken from our room during our stay there when we went to pay for the tour at the end of the holiday I opened my wallet to find that both the Morrocan dirhams and the British pounds were gone. Realising this was the case we went back to the room only to discover that my partners purse was also empty. Long story short they didn't believe us because they have never had anything stolen before the receptionist eventually apologies and said they would investigate with the manager and come back to us but never did. Put a sour taste in our mouths and made it a very expensive holiday and not one I would recommend unless they sort it. The money was stolen from a zipped bag under a dressing table in a locked room (yes it ideally should have been in the safe but you just don't expect that when on a 5 star holiday you have to carry round every single valuable item all of the time to make sure its safe).

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Taryn M wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: This was one of the nicest (definitely cleanest) hotels I have ever been to!    Pros:  - The grounds are so much prettier than the pictures  - Constant cleaning in progress  - The staff can‚Äôt do enough for you  - The hotel is stunning and new  - The pools - ones for activities and partying and the other is perfect for just chilling so you have a choice  - There are always loungers available (no early morning lounge hoggers)  - Entertainment switches off at bang on 12am for those of you that don‚Äôt want to pull an all nighter  - The food consists of a mix of English French and Moroccan - so a good selection  - The restaurant and bar staff actually all the staff (reception and bellboys) are so super friendly and helpful  - Room was lovely and big  - Bathroom was huge    Cons:  - Our shower (room 5002) leaked and flooded the whole bathroom everytime we showered - staff cleared it up no problem though  - The pool barman was a little grouchy - but probably with reason as he worked the whole day without backup (which probably wouldn‚Äôt even be legal in this country (UK))  - We chose and paid for a pool view room - which was lovely but one the couple of occasions we wanted to go to bed before 12am we were disturbed by the entertainment that goes on until 12am. I would suggest anyone that wants early nights shouldn‚Äôt worry about a pool view room    All in all we plan on returning next year and staying longer.    Thank you to all the staff at Be Live!! You were incredible.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

The free bus means it is really easy to get into Marrakech for trips out.    We loved every minute of our stay & would absolutely return!

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: tchouki123 wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: I stayed at beLive for a week and I have to say that the staff is amazing.  Its a reasonable size hotel with 2 pools one to chill and one with activities such as aquagym and water polo.  Salim is in charge of the activities including the evening events. They vary from karaoke to live band and the atmosphere is a good mix between party and lounge.  Being an all inclusive hotel the guys behind the bar are crucial!  Ahmed and Oussama are the perfect answer already preparing the cocktail once they see you approching the bar.  In case you prefer to sit down at the terrace just look for Azdine he is the smiling man runing around with cocktails and always ready to bring you drinks.  I wouldn't want to forget Tarek manager of the main bar and making sure that everyone is staying hydrated.  In conclusion its a nice hotel with great staff.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Elaine B wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: Lovely clean hotel great food and staff were very friendly. My only moan is that we were in room 4004 and the music at night was very very loud. During the hot evenings when there wasn‚Äôt rain forecast they would bring the eve enterntainment outside. If went off at midnight but until then it‚Äôs very unpleasant. We asked reception for earplugs as apart from the noise we loved our room. Unfortunately they didn‚Äôt have any however did offer to move us. As we were going the following day we declined.  Take earplugs or just drink lots of gin then you‚Äôre be fine.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: tchouki123 wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: I stayed at beLive for a week and I have to say that the staff is amazing.  Its a reasonable size hotel with 2 pools one to chill and one with activities such as aquagym and water polo.  Salim is in charge of the activities including the evening events. They vary from karaoke to live band and the atmosphere is a good mix between party and lounge.  Being an all inclusive hotel the guys behind the bar are crucial!  Ahmed and Oussama are the perfect answer already preparing the cocktail once they see you approching the bar.  In case you prefer to sit down at the terrace just look for Azdine he is the smiling man runing around with cocktails and always ready to bring you drinks.  I wouldn't want to forget Tarek manager of the main bar and making sure that everyone is staying hydrated.  In conclusion its a nice hotel with great staff.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jay Y wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: Just got back today after spending 5 nights here with my misses.. took her here for her 30th birthday and it‚Äôs been an amazing time.. can‚Äôt really fault the hotel üòÅ the food for us was 10/10 if your in to your boring food like burgers and chips then you might not like the food lol.. it‚Äôs all traditional food and is amazing! The drinks weren't great to be honest but the strawberry mojito was nice üëçüèº The staff are really nice and helpful always happy.. we had no Wi-Fi for about 28 hours on our trip because there was a problem in the area was not the hotels fault but I certainly was not happy as I could not contact my kids!! Overall I would recommend this hotel and would happily come back üëçüèº

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: mcuk23 wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: We stayed for 10 days in May our first proper holiday for 2 years after covid. We had a really relaxing and enjoyable break and Overall this hotel is great but it needs some work to get to a 5-star level. Here's my breakdown.    Cleanliness - 5/5 - This is a very clean hotel there's always someone buzzing around sweeping clipping the hedges mopping the floors etc. The rooms were cleaned bedding changed and floors mopped daily. The main reception is very clean and has a lovely diffuser smell to it too. The food areas are always being cleaned by the staff.    Food - 4/5 - Plenty of choices good selection of hot and cold food egg station in the mornings pasta station at night. They changed the menu slightly every day but sometimes dinner felt like you were just eating a reheated rehashed version of whatever was out at lunchtime. They don't serve fast food here other than pizza so no fries nuggets burgers etc The restaurant seemed a little small too and can imagine at full capacity it would be really cramped.    The snack bar is a real letdown the food is really not well presented or thought through. I had a pizza with literally 3 strands of cheese on it. Dry panini with wilted brown salad Cesar salad consists of some lettuce anchovies and 2 chicken nuggets drizzled with mayo. You get a basket of fries with around 10 fries in It's really not 5-star quality at all.    The 1 A la carte restaurant is Moroccan we are both not fans of sweet food which typically Moroccan food is but this was nice. only a choice of Menu A or B but we tried both and they were OK nothing to shout about. The Hotel really could do with another food offering.    Pool areas - 4/5 There are 2 pools one is near the snack bar which we didn't stay at as it was constantly pumping music and loud people everywhere. Felt like a club 18-30 vibe with people drinking way too much and being generally loud. The other pool is much nicer quiet and relaxing however we found people bagging sunbeds early ( which is not uncommon anywhere ) but the annoying thing was people reserving the day beds and then taking 2 sun loungers too. This made a few days a little tricky to get a sun lounger after 9.30 am but we managed all the same. The chap Kamal in the pool bar is great. Run off his feet all day no breaks and always a friendly hello. We tipped him a few dirhams here and there and found that we were never really waiting long for a beer.    Drinks 3/5 - Stork beer ( which is nice ) but tiny little glass bottles gone in 3/4 swigs. The cocktails are literally made up as they go along it seems. We heard several people complain about the lack of alcohol in the drinks but we never experienced this ourselves. The wine is nice and cold dry like pinot grigio style but again you would expect a 5-star resort to have a little choice however there is literally red/white/rose wine and that's it.    Room - 4/5 - Clean and bright our first room was overlooking the car park/road area to the rear of the hotel and we only stayed 1 night. We went to reception to enquire about a swim-up room ( i had emailed ahead and asked and was quoted 700 euro for 10 nights ). At the reception we asked and got a swim-up for 9 nights for around 400 euro. so much less than originally quoted. HOWEVER - I wouldn't bother doing this it really is literally a small cold slither of pool right outside your doors no privacy and ours was next to the walkway so had people constantly walking by. I wouldn't choose this option again but would have changed to a pool facing upper floor room instead.    Overall it's a decent place to stay to get away from the UK for a while. It's Hot and only 3.5 hrs flight from home. The Moroccan people in general are very warm welcoming and friendly. The staff in this hotel are very friendly Azdine in the lobby bar was probably one of the best barmen I've ever come across his friendliness charm and hard-working attitude are great to see. Most of the other staff were great too. There was the occasional grumpy face in the main buffet restaurant but I guess we caught a few of them on an off day. We tipped 20/50 dirham every now and again for good service and we were never really without a table or a drink too.    Credit to Titif and Mustapha as they opened up the sports bar early one day so that we could watch a very important football match.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Matthew M wrote a review Jun 2022
Review_Text: Currently here at this wonderful hotel.  The bar staff at the pool bar especially youness is superb he has no problem in filling up our bubba mugs.  The whole animation team including Titus are fantastic. The staff can‚Äôt do enough for us.  10:10 all round
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Ben P wrote a review May 2022
Review_Text: Azdine made our experience amazing!! Loved every moment and service in particular was great! He made amazing cocktails and was a lovely man all in all. Food was great aswell! The pool bar was great aswell and the rooms were exceptional traik and oussama
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Tyler cooper wrote a review May 2022
Review_Text: AZDINE!  He was the reason we had such a good time!  Best staff we could havelooked after us!  Thankyou for hmmmm traik and Oussama  Service for cocktails and drinks was amazing!  Snack bar was very good too great service!  Also the food was quality!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Isabel D wrote a review May 2022
Review_Text: Very good first hotel all inclusive experience with staff all being extremely friendly and attentive. Activities were offered throughout the day and food and drinks were served whenever you pleased. Bedroom was very comfy and cleaned regularly throughout the day and the hotel as a whole was spotless. However although the food offered was pleasing and extremely reasonable for the price we paid to stay myself and my brother suffered with upset stomachs from most of the trip and one of the nights i actually vomited. This may not have been linked to the food served but considering the milk often smelt like cheese i think it was extremely likely. Apart from that slight drawback the experience at belive was thrilling and has a high chance of being revisited.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jon H wrote a review May 2022
Review_Text: We had two swim up rooms for 4 nights last week. From the minute we arrived the service was fantastic. During our whole stay the staff were efficient and always had a smile on their faces. The room was brilliant with a comfortable bed and a lovely bathroom. We really loved our outside area with our own terrace and pool. The hotel facilities were great and we loved the pool area and using the swim up bar. Drinks were available all day with good bottled beer and wine but the cocktails were very weak with hardly any alcohol in them. The buffet was excellent and we enjoyed the breakfast  lunch and dinner there. We also enjoyed our meal in the Moroccan Restaurant where again the service was excellent. Overall the food was great but the quality of the drinks could have been better. Whilst we were there we had a birthday and the staff came over with a cake and sang happy birthday. The only facility that was disappointing was the sports bar. We were hoping to watch the F1 and football on the Sunday but it didn't open until 5pm. It's not really a sports bar more of a games bar with pool table and table football. Overall we had a great break in a lovely hotel with very good service.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Angel0ftheN0rth wrote a review May 2022
Review_Title: Best first holiday out of lock down anyone could wish for!!!
Review_Text: My boyfriend and I have come on an all inclusive holiday to the Be live adults resort in Marrakech.    The whole time we have been here the Staff have been wonderful efficient and friendly! In particular we would love to mention the warmth of Tariq the f and b Manager who is a credit to the hotel.    Upon arrival we were early for check in so taken straight to the lovely pool bar for cocktails and lunch we knew immediately that we were going to be looked after.    The food quality in both the main buffet restaurant pool bar and alacarte restaurant has been of a particularly high standard as-well as a wide selection of wines cocktails and soft drinks to choose from throughout the day.    There are a number of activities to choose from if you want ranging from yoga to archery spin classes and Pilates. We enjoy sunbathing around the pool and enjoying a good book but it‚Äôs nice to try something new.    The rooms are all brand new with flat screen TVs drench showers and are really comfortable. We just opted for a standard room and loved it but you can opt to stay in a suite or in a room that has a swim up moat to your own private sun beds on your terrace.    There is entertainment every night we have seen belly dancers singers and salsa classes when we have been in but we have also enjoyed making use of the free shuttle that takes you into Marrakesh and picks you up again. This has allowed use to explore and enjoy the city in the mornings and at night.    Thank you to Be live Marrakesh and Tariq we have had an amazing holiday and will definitely be using the Be live collection again as we have seen you have them all over the world!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only

Review_Text: The whole experience was absolutely amazing great food and lots of water activities. The whole stuff very friendly and helpful. Hotel has got evening events which are brilliant. Highly recommend! And I want say thank you for the stuff especially ziizo Emma tiiitif ssaaalim for the service mustaaapha I will back son thank you
