Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Becky W wrote a review Nov 2021
Review_Title: The staff made us feel like family
Review_Text: We had planned to stay at the hotel for a month but had to leave early due to new COVID restrictions in place stopping UK flights in and out of the country. We stayed for 3 weeks in the end.  We absolutely loved our time at the Be Live. From the moment we arrived to our sad goodbyes the staff were just wonderful. They always went the extra mile and truly made us feel welcome. After the last few years we needed a break and the Be Live Collection delivered.    The staff  First I was to shout out to Azzdine on the bar. He had our drinks memorised by the second day. Even on nights when it was crazy busy he worked so hard and it never went unnoticed. We never had to go to the bar to order he would always find us and keep our drinks topped up.  Mahdi on the travel desk was an angel. He made sure we could do all the things we wanted to to make the most out of our stay. The 3day excursion through the Atlas Mountains to the Sahara Desert was our favourite- cannot recommended enough! And incredibly good value for money!! Mahdi was a real sweetie and booking through him was so easy.  Marwa on the front desk was very sweet looking after us. Always greeted with a smile and was genuinely keen to know how we were enjoying our stay in Morocco. She gave us some great tips about the city and when we told her we had to leave early she was crushed. She was planning to give us a special meal on one of our last nights in the Moroccan restaurant.  Smilie and Mamadou and the entertainment staff were fantastic. So much energy and a great sense of humour. They kept the vibes at the ‚Äúloud pool‚Äù going and the water aerobics were never dull!  Youness and the young lads on the snack bar were always so so kind and greeted us with smiles every day. It could get busy but they worked so hard and quickly it was never a long wait.  And the waiting staff at the canteen- there was a young girl in the evenings with bling hair (never caught her name) who worked so hard and always had a smile on her face. And Raja in the breakfast team was always a welcome sight in the mornings. The food was fresh delicious and had so much variety. It was always a good meal ever night! The Moroccan restaurant is absolutely worth checking out!  And the cleaners were amazing! They made fun towel animals for when we came back from our excursions. Little touches like that made such a difference.    Pools:  The pools were brilliant- a quiet chill out vibe pool. And a more energetic pool with music and games. Both were a decent size and well maintained.    The grounds:  The grounds weren‚Äôt too big so nothing was too far away. The gardens are beautifully maintained.    Bar:  The drinks are all delicious! Some familiar drinks and some interesting new ones to try. Loved the Marrakesh Flower!    Location:  It‚Äôs not far from town and the free shuttle is easy to book.    Excursions:  We did Essaouira quad biking hot air Balloon ride Marrakesh the Atlas Mountains and Sahara desert. All amazing!! We wanted to do the waterfalls too but as we had to leave early we missed out.    The rooms:  Comfy bed and great pillows. Clean. Bright. Good water pressure in the showers and a nice deep bath to sit in too. Lots of storage and the safe for our valuables. Sometimes our cards didn‚Äôt work getting in but the reception fixed that in 2 seconds.    In short- if you‚Äôre going to Marrakesh stay here.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: bryanwalsh54 wrote a review Oct 2021
Review_Text: The hotel was perfect for a weeks holiday. There isn't much to do in the area so if you want a week packed with just sun food and drink it's perfect. If you want to get out and do things then it's a little more tricky. There's a rep doing trips from the hotel and there's a twice daily shuttle into town. I'd suggest paying for a taxi as the shuttle brings you so far away from the square that you will get lost if you don't have Internet to bring you back. The staff are amazing food is great! The drinks could have more alcohol in them so you have to be creative when ordering cocktails and asking for a spirit with ice separately!

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mathew Stevens wrote a review Oct 2021
Review_Text: I have just returned from a weeks stay at this lovely hotel. We met plenty of English and french people in the hotel as i was worried many English wouldn‚Äôt be here. The staff are fantastic! A lady with blonde/brown hair served us daily in the restaurant and was fantastic. A HUGE shout out to Ayoub at the snack bar brilliant young lad with very good customer service always keep us fed and watered.  The rooms ‚Ä¶ WOW‚Ä¶ the beds are AMAZING and I didn‚Äôt want to come back home to my own bed. Rooms are spotlessly clean and very Modern with plenty of plugs separate bath and walk in shower. Rooms cleaned daily with fresh sheets and towels.  The food was fantastic in the main buffet restaurant. The A La Carte was not so good. We waited far too long for food and walked our before our mains and went to the buffet restaurant instead as we were scared we wouldn‚Äôt get any food at all. 1 hour and 40 minutes we waited for a main course. Thankfully this didn‚Äôt bother us at all we just knew to not return to that restaurant. Amazing sports bar as well. The pools are great.. we stayed around the quieter pool and used the swim up bar a lot! Loved it.  I can not wait to return here next year. Thank you to all.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Angela R wrote a review Oct 2021
Review_Text: I have just returned from a week with my sister in this hotel for our first visit to Morocco and it was wonderful. Staff are so friendly hotel is clean and good is great! The beds are so comfortable too. Perfect weather and facilities are ideal. There is a chilled pool with swim up bar(pool is freezing though although nice when very hot outside) and another pool with more activities. I also use a walking stick and the hotel was great size for me. Also TUI where great with support in the airports on a separate note. There is an 11pm curfew and that's great. Free bus to the medina too and well worth a visit. The hotel were great to arrange private taxis too. Staff serving always remember your preferences and this makes a difference to the experience very respectful and make communication easy. Special shout out too Ayeoub Hassan and various other staff whose names escape me. Only downside is the local alcohol as very low content so don't expect to get very tipsy! I will certainly be visiting again!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Angela R wrote a review Oct 2021

Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Marie R wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Title: Too warm in the rooms- NO AC
Review_Text: DO NOT BOOK HERE if you expect AC in your room ( cold air) when its 32c outside and you are facing the sun.Stayed here March 3rd for 4 days. Booked with Alpha Rooms which I am now speaking too and also the hotel. Being reviewing for years now travel a lot and try to be as honest as possible. Neither of their websites says its seasonal.We stayed in 3 hotels on our 8 days in Marrakesh. 4 days here with myself and my wife I will do the negatives first as there are positives also. Booked and paid extra for superior room with pool view. Rooms good on arrival it was toast and always have AC as I suffer with anxiety which I explained to the hotel the shock of a 5 star hotel not having dual AC was off the scale. I went down to see the manger and you cant speak to the manager as they have 2 girls working shift Public relations they are called explained my situation got no where they made out I was the only one as it happens we spoke to three other couples whom complained also. They moved us to a twin room quickly which was good requested a fan which they laughed at seriously. Tried to get over it and move on but the heat in the evening after been at the pool dont book this if this is not your thing check!!  Bad points ;  1) Sparrows flying all round the restaurant landing on the bread boards and sitting there eating the crumbs for as long as they like ( manager standing within two feet one day) we asked why and he had no explanation. (we have photos and video if the manger wants them we found this amazing as we can only assume they work best practice in the kitchens and along with the Covid -19 starting to spread.  2) As others pointed out music start @ 10am and goes through to the sports bar and people shouting and roaring till 3am I am all on for a bit of banter but if you dont like it lump it or go to the city at night and day. Entertainment hit and miss. It just seems to be loud all day. Just to note with no AC we had to leave the doors open which we told the PR people!!  3) No AC as above  4) Public Relations of no use ( even though they are nice people like talking to SKY TV people when you have an issue you will know what I am talking about.  5) There is another pool down the other end which is not heated but very quiet and beautiful IF THE POOL WAS HEATED what a shame.  6) The restaurant area is way too small and they are building more units its lovely but too small too long waiting on staff at dinner to request a glass of wine.  7) Traditional Moroccan restaurant was useless and this was the opinion of many what a waste of time if you are going to do it please do it or make it a bar area as there are not enough seats out front.  POSITIVES ;  1) Bar staff and usually ( not the managers) cleaning staff were excellent Yassin and Azdine in the bar and some of the guys and girls in the restaurant the stars of the hotel. Even under pressure they were soooo nice and good crack.  2) Food generally really good  good variety and seemed always fresh. Good mix of fresh meats been carved and stir fry really good.  3) Heated pool great and clean  4) Late breakfast at the pool area a really great idea and served to you a real plus.  5) Rooms and area spotless - no issues    I hope the above is received as an honest review because that is what it is I am hoping the manger responds as it would have been nice to have the chance to speak to him / her. This place is only 2 years old and I would say they have and know made mistakes with planning as there are such empty spaces that could be used better and restaurants etc. One thing to note we meet another couple whom both worked in Hygiene ( they met the manger and mentioned the birds). This really has to stop. Hard to believe its happening. They are flying rats with huge bacteria.Overall the hotel is good ruined my week as could not relax with the heat in the room this must be made more clear on their own site which its not. Location is 20-30 mins outside of city depending on traffic nothing around anywhere near the hotel shuttle bus runs but at odd times for returning.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Tourist769614 wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Really impressed with this hotel. All staff helpful and friendly. Very clean throughout. Room was large and well laid out the view could have been better as we were not pool facing. The all inclusive food was very good will quality and good choice. Restaurant could be busy at times but staff always willing to help. The house wine was very good. The bar staff worked very hard as very busy at times. Entertainment staff were very friendly and tried to get you involved if you wanted to. Main pool is heated and great the other pool is not and can be very cold depending on time of the year. A greater flexibility on check out time would be appreciated with late departure flights. Pool bar lunchtime paninis and pizza were great. Hotel is quite a way from centre of marrakesh but hotel do provide a bus service. Overall great hotel with superb service for a short break in the sun.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: smarianne26 wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Really great hotel the pool areas are beautiful. Staff are really lovely rooms are kept clean. The food in the restaurant is great. The fresh pasta made on the lunch is lovely and there is options for everybody. Daytime entertainment are very friendly. Invite them to lunch with you!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Suru007 wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Really pleased with our choice of hotel for the 5 day Golf break - Be Live Collections Marrakesh. 25 minutes from the Airport and the top courses within 30-40 minutes of driving distance.  Good clean environment. Large airy twin rooms with massive twin beds and good quality linen. Quality of drinks including local wines were better than the fare dished out across European All inclusive destinations. Quality of food was good with attentive and helpful staff.  Enjoyable live music/dance shows every night.  Two big outdoor pools and a good Spa facility. Very friendly front desk staff.  Overall I would thoroughly recommend.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sankofa123 wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: I have just returned from staying at the Be Live Collection Adult only hotel. I had a pleasant stay with great food and helpful waiters waitress porters and domestic staff. The only issue was with the timing of the shuttle service. I think there also needs to be a shuttle service that returns people to the hotel at 4pm.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Katy wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: We stayed here for 7 nights and had an amazing time. The hotel was beautiful and our room was spacious and clean. The restaurant had a variety of fresh tasty food.    The animation team did a fab job of keeping everyone entertained & we enjoyed the aqua gym with Monsef!    Adzine & Yassin in the lobby bar were fab they always remembered our drinks and there were lots of cocktails to choose from.    We‚Äôd definitely stay again!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Steve S wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Eight heterosexual gentlemen (on a golf holiday) book four twin rooms. We are given four double rooms on arrival. The hotel made a mistake and over booked the twin rooms. The only option we were given was a very uncomfortable camp bed in each room. This despite there being other vacant double rooms in the hotel that they could put us in.    Buffet is poor .. the hot food is gone quicker than they can cook it.    Sadly it is my first day here. And I have another five days of this. It‚Äôs too late for me but you can still save yourself from making the mistake of staying here.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Looby loo wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: This hotel is lovely. The staff the cleanliness the rooms the food. I have no complaints.  There are two pools. One heated and noisy with quite loud music although sometimes the music man plays relaxing music. The other pool away from music but cold.  Moroccan people are very friendly and all the staff were wonderful. THERE IS A BUT.  MUSIC! If you intend having a nice quiet drink after dinner or going to bed before midnight forget it. Not enough waiters or assortment of drinks mean the cocktails are not really up to scratch but I don't drink much so it wasn't a problem for me. What I and many guests had a problem with Was The music After 10pm. Outside and loud. So loud even with all doors shut earphones on and a pillow over your head you still can't escape it. Add to that air-con doesn't work till April. No fan In room so you really need the doors open. We arrived Friday. Got no sleep that night. Remember this is all inclusive. People have been drinking all day and 'enjoying the music' till midnight then drinking some more and they have to pass everybody's room to get to there's. Just when the music stops and you think you can finally get some sleep the drunks start shouting and making as much noise as they can.  We did complain and they music was put inside but only one night.  I loved my holiday and this hotel I would return but wish they would be more considerate to people who don't like listening to BAM BAM BAM all night.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jess Harries wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: We stayed here on our honeymoon and were definitely treated to 5 star service! The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable staff were attentive and the food was so good! We loved the activities in the day and the lobby bar and sports bar were both perfect for us. We went to the morrocan restaurant for one meal and the food was delicious and was a lovely change of pace. Also highly recommend the food at the snack bar - amazing burger!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Raith C wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Really nice hotel the food options are changed every day... It‚Äôs good food for Morocco. Great service on the evening with the bar staff remembering drinks and continually bringing them out azdine is fabulous. Very polite. Some great events throughout the morning/afternoon around the pool. The afternoon staff have to eat with guests so I guess make friends if you want to be nice. Would stay again.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Danny P wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Me and my partner went to be love hotel marakesh for the very first time this year. We had a great experience and would recommend it to anyone.the staff were exceptional and very welcoming especially azdine who looked after us at the bar super waiter and everything was spotless 5 stars all the way
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Daniel H wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Title: Luxury stay on the outskirts of Marrakech
Review_Text: I was fortunate to spend a week at Be Live Collection Marrakech and I am extremely happy with my stay. The room was spacious and spotless the cleaning staff do an excellent job of cleaning both the rooms and all the common areas such as hallways and the main reception area. All the staff without exception are hard working and very courteous they are a credit to the establishment and are almost certainly it's most valuable asset.    The food offered is fresh and very tasty as with every all inclusive I have visited the main restaurant is a buffet. It offers a wide variety of choices which rotate on a daily basis. A special mention to the desserts which are absolutely amazing and leaves you spoilt for choice. The alternative a la carte restaurant requires prebooking and offers a choice of 2 set menus but sadly no veggie options which I thought was an oversight.    The resort also offers a complimentary shuttle bus to the city centre that is prompt and only requires pre-booking to ensure you can utilise it which I strongly recommend. The hotel lies about 15-25 mins (traffic permitting) from the city centre so this is vital if you wish to see more of Marrakesh.    My only two misgivings about my stay were that plastic straws were used and also provided with every drink so if you are environmentally minded may find that alarming. Could paper straws not be used and only provided when guests request them?    The second issue I encountered was when I attempted to book a treatment at the spa. The receptionist insisted on taking cash as payment in fact this was done in quite an abrupt manner. She instructed that cash can be accessed from the ATM at reception but as I prefer to make large payments on card I decided not to proceed with the booking.    The two issues aside I had a great stay and would recommend the resort highly.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: mary wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Azzdine.  Marrakech is brill. Belive hotel is excellent. Best place to stay in marrakech. Libby bar is the place to be! . Restaurant is great. Wide range of food and choices. Spa has amazing range of treatments and daily pool activities keep everyone busy!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Tom wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: AZDINE was absolutely fantastic. Nothing was too much trouble for him. He was always happy friendly and helpful. He is attentive and ensures you are always comfortable and keeps the drinks flowing. He has made our holiday a pleasure. Thank you Azdine. See you again soon.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Patrick wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: We travel all over the world and stay in some of the best hotels but we were really impressed by the quality and value for money this hotel had to offer all beers are bottled with a choice of SAN Miguel or Stork both good strong lagers also the wine cocktails and the food were excellent. We stayed the first week of March and the weather was great temperatures between 25c to 32c so no complaints there would definitely recommend.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Graham T wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: We came to Morocco not knowing what to expect we had been told great things about Marrakesh and when we researched hotels the Be Live Collection was highly recommended. A friend of mine knew of the hotel and she also said it was good... It is very true.    The food is great the entertainment is great the rooms are really nice and the staff friendly.    The pools are lovely and there are sports entertainment teams are always making us laugh. In particular one of the entertainers Monsef has so much positive energy and we were made to feel especially welcome by him. We're really grateful to him for making our stay so enjoyable.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: antoniolaserra wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Was a very nice trip concerning certain staff members that made it difficult to enjoy the trip . But mr unis was amazing .they should be happy to have a staff member like him cause he was always there to for the clients and always fix the problem .

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Joyce A wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Myself and 7 of my friends stayed at this hotel in Februrary for my birthday celebration. Upon arrival we were greeted by lovely workers who spoke good English.  Pros  -Food is really great. There're different varieties every night and the snack bar is always serving good food.  - Great entertainment. Really get the guests dancing all night long  - grMyself and 7 of my friends stayed at this hotel in February for my birthday celebration. Upon arrival we were greeted by lovely workers who spoke good English.    Pros  -Food is really great. There're different varieties every night and the snack bar is always serving good food.  - Great entertainment. Really get the guests dancing all night long  - great pool - free aqua aerobics definitely worth trying  - bed is absolutely comfy!!!!!  - clean room  -free shuttle bus (it doesn't go to the main medina area though which was abit disappointing  -close to medina (approx. 20mins drive)    Cons  -wifi is terrible in the rooms!  - no iron in the rooms- abit of a shame considering its a 5* hotel.  -drinks were not the best - overly dlitued juices but i guess its becasue they try and cater for the masses.  -hotel exchnage rate is a joke. one of the hotel worker tried to short change me which i wasn't too happy about. when i asked him how much is was to exchange pounds he told me right to my face 1: 12. I gave him ¬£50 to exchange expecting to get 600dhs back but he wanted to give me 590dhs. when i asked him why? he said sorry mam but the rate just changed to 1:11. hahaha what! i didnt know i was inside a stock office on wall street! what was annoying was that i was standing right in front of the rates and it hadnt changed so i think he was genuinely trying to pocket some change for himself. i took my money back and exhanged it for 615dhs when i got to the local exchange office at the medina!    Apart from that i would definitely visit this hotel again but please fix the wifi issue!

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kristian H wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Azzdine fantastic and always keeps your drinks topped up polite and friendly great service and always a smiley face lobby bar is fantastic and the entertainment is top class lots of friendly staff and a great place to stay
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Louis wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Great entertainment in this hotel Titif who is one of the workers was fantastic and did all he could for us. They did karaoke on Sunday night and had the whole hotel vibing! I would definitely recommend!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Nathan S wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Titif was friendly and made us feel very comfortable! Nothing was too much for him. The karaoke night he put on was excellent and he even managed to get me up singing which I have never done before! He is a credit to the hotel as are all of the staff they can't do enough!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Ali_J_lucas wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: When they describe the rooms 'air conditioning' they fail to mention that they do not turn it on until April! When you are reception and management to provide a solution to cool your room so you can sleep they are completely arrogant and dismissive. Thanks to our TUI rep for buying us a fan we now can have a comfortable stay.    All the other staff are very friendly and helpful. The food is very average.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Dee wrote a review Mar 2020
Review_Text: Brought my partner here for his birthday. Both of our first times in morocco. Couldn't fault the hotel one bit. It was beautiful! Stunning rooms (we had a superior double). The layout of the hotel was easy to navigate as it is quite small.  When we arrived we were given wrist bands straight away and told to get some lunch while our room was being finished.  By the time we ate and got a drink we went back to reception to get the keys. Pay the deposit and tourist tax. All very smooth.  There was activities on every day yoga archery mini golf zumba and aqua aerobics.  We were never bored.  The animation pool was cold but not as cold as the pool with the swim up bar.  There was always a sunbed free. Loads of games in the sports bar.  Drinks at breakfast were a bit slow I think they could change it at breakfast to self service. Missed having my coffee in the morning.  Mini bar wasnt stocked with milk for coffee in the room. But that didn't bother me. There was always water in there.  There was something on every night entertainment wise. The restaurant on site was a nice change food was just ok but the wine was nice.  We paid for quad biking through the guy at the hotel. He was very nice and the lads that greeted us at quad biking and the young lad that took us around were lovely. They did struggle with english. So a learning a few french words would be handy.  Would if loved to stay longer as we were there for 4 nights.  It's well worth the money and would 100% recommend this. We are going back next time with friends.  Thank you for the amazing experience!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: staceyellen22 wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Me and my partner stayed here last week for our first visit to Marrakesh.    Literally could not fault the hotel.  The a la carte dinner every day was amazing! So much good food! The sandwiches at the snack bar also great!  The only thing I could criticise was the food at the on site restaurant wasn‚Äôt very impressive.  Also the really nice swim up bar pool was freezing cold so you couldn‚Äôt go in it yet the other pool was fine so must have been heated.    The staff are all so friendly and who really stood out to us were the entertainment staff Mousef and Titteff what a credit to the hotel and very good at their job super friendly and charming our stay wouldn‚Äôt have been the same with out them! ‚úåÔ∏è    They have a free shuttle into the medina however the times aren‚Äôt partially great so we booked a taxi and tour through the hotel which I‚Äôd recommend as our tour guide was so knowledgable and helpful!    I‚Äôd defiantly stay here again
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Voyager134746 wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: The staff here are fantastic. Friendly helpful and attentive.  We found the that the food was good with plenty of choice.  Nice clean comfortable room but not ideal having an inter connecting door to next room. Could hear everything.  Gardens are kept lovely.  Plenty of sun loungers.  The heated pool had a lot of loose or missing tiles so was dangerous and needs a lot of work doing on it once the other pool which is unheated warms up considerably?  Enjoyed the evening entertainment.  Sweet young lady Mouna sings three evenings a week.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Amar M wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Animation team - absolutely fantastic entertainment.  All members very helpful and bring a super positive vibe to the poolside. Highly recommended.  Great set of Diverse music.  Thank to animation team  Definitely will come back
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Rob wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: As a Dutch couple we were at Belive hotel for ten days to play golf and visit Marrakech. We visited Marrokko for the first time and we were a little bit sceptical about the all-inclusive concept but were pleasantly surprised about the high quality and diversity of the food at Belive. For ten days we enjoyed it every day! Several chefs preparing meat an fish in portions so always fresh and good temperature.Every day fresh baked bread and pasterie. Staff was working very hard always friendly and we never had to wait long te be served. White wine was of a nice quality and no problem to get a bottle in ice at our table. Pool bar served during inbetween times great sandwiches burgers pizza etc.  Shuttle service to Marrakech and 2 outisde pools (one of them heated) were very nice to make use of.  Only small negative we found was the 1 time optional use of the alacarte Marrokan restaurant it is actually not alacarte but a choice out of 2 menu's which we didn't like to much. No problem though as said the buffet restaurant was excellent.  A compliment to the entire staff and many thanks we will come back!

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lizveall wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: I booked this resort for a few days of sun in the middle of February and the weather did not disappoint and it was pretty quiet - never a bun fight for sun beds! Beautiful weather beautiful room. Comfortable beds and a great rainfall shower in a spacious well-appointed bathroom. I would recommend the swim up rooms if you like a bit of quiet sunbathing just outside your room but don‚Äôt let them give you rooms ending in 09 or 10 - they are set back and don‚Äôt get sun til 4pm!    We did book spa treatments but didn‚Äôt really enjoy them. I really hate it when the therapist spends 20 of the 50 minutes out of the room while you lie there with masks on - they should at least do a hand/foot treatment!    I loved the yoga and aqua aerobics classes- brilliant activities team. There are two pools - one heated and a little bit shabby and the quiet unheated pool which was beautiful and had a swim up bar but in Feb was just too cold to use.    The food was typical of an all inclusive buffet but there was plenty for my daughter (carnivore) and me (vegetarian) to eat. I have to say the house wine (local red white and rose) was fantastic. I didn‚Äôt try any of the spirits or cocktails so can‚Äôt say how they were.    All in all a great holiday provided by TUI - the communication from the local rep Azzeddine was excellent but not intrusive and all the transfer and flight arrangements were spot on. I would definitely do this again.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: sammyjay73 wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: My husband and I have just returned from a week at this hotel.  I am sad not to give it 5 stars but I will explain why.  The hotel is lovely we were greeted on arrival with a Moroccan tea and cake which was lovely. The Reception staff were all lovely and extremely helpful. Nothing was too much trouble. We asked to move as we had noisy neighbours but only due to the fact that the rooms had an adjoining door(which seems odd for an adult only hotel) and this was no trouble. They moved all our stuff for us.  The food is of an ok quality but the same everyday and they can not cook quick enough at the hot plate.  The entertainment team are amazing and made the holiday Monsef and Zouhir are lovely men and it was lovely to get to know them and learn a bit about their lives in Morocco.  There was never a fight for a sun lounger even at peak times of the day.  What does need 5 stars Is the Spa. My husband and I both work hard so treated ourselves to one of their packages. Definitely worth every penny. The women doing the treatments are amazing and make you feel so relaxed and at ease.  We met some lovely people and had an amazing time.  One question for the hotel. What do you classify as an adult. Having 16 year olds there does not classify as an adult and to be fair I felt sorry for them as there is nothing for them to do.  My only recommendation for the hotel is more variety of food and places to get drinks.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: liz r wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Just returned from a weeks holiday rooms cleaned daily although we did have a terrible sewage smell in bathroom reported it 3 times but nothing was done   Staff very friendly  food was very disappointing
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Emma wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Me and my husband came recently and it‚Äôs been one of the best holidays we have had in a long time !!!  Loved every minute of it from waking up to going back to bed!  Animation team bar staff snack bar staff absolutely fantastic!  Our room was cleaned daily and lovely designs left on our bed!  Definitely be returning again! ‚ÄúWhoop whoop‚Äù haha!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Darbs wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: My wife and I were recently guests at the Be live collection Marrakech for 6 nights on our Honeymoon. We did our own research before deciding where to stay and Be live collection seemed to be be just what we were looking for. There are several positive reviews on the web which helped us make our final choice and decision to book with Stay for long holidays.  We arrived at Be live in the evening of 2nd February 2020 and on checking in a sign stated that one of the two pools was closed for maintenance which wasn't a problem. We were shown to our room it was exceptionally clean and we were excited to explore and enjoy our stay celebrating our marriage (we got married on 1st February 2020) We were woken up at 3am unfortunately from noise disturbance from inconsiderate neighbors we could hear everything through the connecting door and it seemed like they were in the room with us. If it became a reoccurring problem we would just ask to move rooms so not much of an issue there. Our first full day started off wonderful the hotel was spotless the gardens well kept breakfast was good and the sun was shining. Perfect! We decided to go for a swim in the pool that looked so inviting I hadn‚Äôt even got all the way down the steps and realized something was SERIOUSLY WRONG I lifted my foot out of the water and blood was pouring from my toe. I looked down into the water while my wife went to seek help and could see several broken tiles. The poolside guys helped with dressing the wound with a bit of cotton wool and some tape. I had cut my toe quiet badley almost down to the bone we went to the reception to see if they had a medical kit but they produce more cotton wool and tape. The pain and discomfort was unbearable and I spent the rest of the hoilday hobbling around the hotel. This ruined our entire stay. My toe is still in a bad way and probably should have had a couple of stitches...in my opinion they closed the wrong pool for maintenance. This should be immediately addressed and no one should be exposed to the risk of such injury.....
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mia wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: What a wonderful holiday! I can‚Äôt recommend my time here enough. Whilst the hotel is lovely it‚Äôs more of a 4 star! What made the holiday a 5* and so wonderful was the staff hospitality. They could not do enough for you. I would highly recommend booking an experience with Desert Safari Experience. For ¬£70 each we got to experience camel riding and quad biking in the desert with the most wonderful food and entertainment. The price also included a return taxi to the hotel. If you are looking for somewhere clean modern and chilled with good food and a short bus ride into the city this is for you.  A special shout out to Monsef who is part of the animation team wow! He literally made our holiday with his upbeat attitude and kind nature. He entertained us the entire trip and was an absolute pleasure to be around.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled on business

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Celia D wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: We had a lovely time at Be Live. Great value for money. The food & alcohol wasn‚Äôt great - there are a lot of options but it‚Äôs the same food everyday and the quality could be better. There is no food allowed by the pool but there is a poolside bar however again the food was average. The staff work incredibly hard and provide a great service. It was my birthday and they provided balloons a cake and lots of decorations in my bedroom which was a lovely touch. The poolside entertainers were fantastic - we had so much fun taking part in the activities I.e basketball and aqua-aerobics. The room was perfect - great size. There is entertainment in the evening after dinner which is nice. We had a spa morning at the hotel and this was incredible - we had the hot stone massage & Californian. I also really recommend going on the evening excursion to the desert where you can do camel riding/quad biking etc with a Moroccan dinner and entertainment. Fantastic value for money. We had such a great time. You can book this through the hotel.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Malcolm I wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: What a wonderful hotel  Stayed for my birthday and the staff arranged a cake with staff all singing to me at dinner and decorating our room.    The food was excellent and plenty of variety in the buffet and you can get a late breakfast at snack bar with fantastic omelettes and other items where Sara and Hassan looked after us with lunch as well. Lovely to eat outside in the sunshine üòé    We enjoyed late drinks in the sports bar where there a board games and a pool table and a very warm welcome.    All the staff we amazing from reception to the cleaning staff who keep the rooms and toilets the cleanest I have had the pleasure to experience and all this goes on quietly in the background ensuring you have a really relaxing holiday.    It was my first time to Morocco but will not be my last  people are so warm  happy and make you feel like family.    The hotel let us use the spa for a shower etc as we had checked out and you can still use all the facilities until you depart. This hotel should be very proud of its staff and how beautifully it is kept including the grounds.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Shaun Knowles wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Nice rooms at the Be Live Marrakech.  A few minor issues but all resolved quickly.  Food ok.    Overall it was the staff that made the holiday very friendly especially round the pool in the daytime.    Titif was great and made us feel always welcome.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Craig W wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: The best part of staying in the be live was the daytime entertainment provided by Titif.    Titif is fun and engaging and can get the whole pool side up having fun. A credit to the team and made our holiday!    The activity schedule is varied and fun at all times.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kevin B wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Great hotel. Top rate facilities with the best buffet service that I have experienced in many years. Staff were all excellent and nothing that we asked was too much trouble. The all inclusive drinks offer was good with some nice wines available. Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: AMP13967 wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Title: 3rd visit in 11 months and already on planning to return next month.
Review_Text: For me this hotel offers everything you need for a great stay in Marrakesh. Far enough out not to be bothered by the craziness of the city but close enough to take a cab or the free shuttle to the centre. Marrakesh really does have something to offer everyone. Fantastic restaurants bars and clubs to desert trips Atlas Mountains beautiful gardens and fantastic shopping

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Bronagh McK wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Hotel is really nice and clean. Activities throughout the day and the entertainment are fantastic! Thanks to Karim for making my stay very relaxing and enjoyable. Lovely new facilities and I will definitely come back again with my friends.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Margaret B wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Wonderful venue everyone was so helpful. We took part in some of the daily activities e.g. Archery and aquarobics which was fun to do. The pools are amazing and not too cold. The choice of food is so good and varied.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Adele P wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: Im a returning guest to this hotel.  On arrival you are always warmly welcomed and checking in is easy and stress freeall the reception staff are lovely and nothing is too much trouble.  The rooms are really nice very relaxing and always immaculatethe house keeping staff are a credit.  Meals are always freshly prepared and tasty in the restaurants with varied choice.  Drinks and cocktails are really good too.  During the day the snackbar team are wonderfulnothing is too much trouble and they are all so warm and friendly  The animation team in particular deserve a special mention.  They really make the day time fun and the evening entertainment great.The water aerobics is always really good and they make every day feel like a party.  The whole animation team genuinely create such a good atmosphere for everyone and Titif and Karim in particular go the extra mile and work hard to make sure guests can partake in all activities and everyone has a good time young and old alike.  They take the time to speak with everyone and make everyone feel included.  Im not so sporty myself but I really enjoyed the archery and they were very good teachers.  They provide a range of activities and make everything fun.  In the evenings they go out of their way to make sure guests have a fantastic evening and the entertainment is good.  I would highly recomend this resortthe hotel and amenities are really good but its the staff who really make this place stand outespecially the animation team.  I have never met such warmfriendly and welcoming people and you are made to feel like family.  Thankyou TitifKarimSarahKamal & hamza for making my break so enjoyable and I look forward to comi g back again soon
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: anneJ6158DY wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Title: A lovely relaxed hotel with good food and friendly staff.
Review_Text: This was our second visit to this hotel. We returned because it is good value for money has excellent facilities and staff are friendly. Food and wines are good quality and there's lots of choice of Moroccan dishes. There's also a reliable shuttle bus service into the city which is free and takes about 20 minutes. The only downside on this visit was someone was trying to get into our room in the night and the reception staff were a bit dismissive with us insisting it was a drunk guest. The staff moved us to another room on the first floor the next day without any fuss but we were a bit wary after this incident.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: paulocunhapaulos wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: I¬¥ve like very much of this experience. It was my first travel to Marrakech and the services provide from the hotel are very good. The persons are very nice always with a smile an ready to help us when we need. Attection to the details and always try to get the best service for us to enjoy.  To all the Hotel team/Staff. Thank you so much.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled on business

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Tracey S wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Text: We spent a week here and it was wonderful the grounds are well kept the rooms are spotless. All staff are very good and welcoming I never had to ask for more than my first drink when we went to the bars . The only issue I had was the food but that is because I'm a picky eater . But you can get snacks from the snack bar when breakfast or lunch service is over . The food I did eat was lovely just like all the staff that took care of us . I would recommend this place
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jennifer E wrote a review Feb 2020
Review_Title: Fantastic hotel - we just spent a week there, got home yesterday. Would recommend this hotel to all friends & family.
Review_Text: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel great rooms heated pool & delicious food. Would recommend to all friends and family. We are already planning another trip and would stay at this hotel without doubt

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: sheilashee2020 wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Absolutely fabulous hotel the food service in-fact everything was wonderful! Considering we were a big group the staff catered for all our needs and requests. All staff were warm and friendly towards us especially the help desk. The Bar staff were amazing and good entertainment keeping us full and topped up with alcohol and other various beverages. Also the waiting staff ensuring all our catering needs were met.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Stacey_GF wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: We went in January for 7 nights everything was perfect from the friendly greeting onward. The hotel is very clean all the staff are very friendly and nothing is a trouble for them. The guys who run the lobby bar and sports bar are great as well as the restaurant manager who is very friendly. The food was always good and the selection of entertainment was varied and more than expected the live music was always great too. Good luck to the trainee tourist animator he will do well! Thankyou to all the staff and we hope to see you again!  Stacey and Fabio
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mariyum K wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: The hotel was amazing!! From the moment I had arrived the staff and service was nothing but amazing!! The excursion operator Younes went beyond to make my trip special too!! Thank you Younes!! Highly recommend!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: James and Anne wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Be-Live collection hotel Marrakech for 7 nights
Review_Text: The hotel is beautiful the staff the grounds and the food are amazing.    Just a couple of issues to make future visitors aware of:    The hotel is located a good 20 + minutes by free shuttle bus outside the city centre in an area which comprises of mostly open land and a mixture of unfinished buildings and buildings under construction as a result there is nothing to do no where to walk outside the hotel grounds.    The hotel has an excellent spa with great facilities including an indoor heated pool which we were hoping to use as January is chilly here evenings and mornings however it is run by a separate company and the prices which the hotel have no control over are crazy high for example we asked to use the pool and were told it would cost us 150 Dirham or ¬£12 per hour!! We were then advised if we picked a particular program of treatments we would be eligible to use the pool as we wished however the treatments in question were going to cost us a total of 6600 Dirham or ¬£526!!! for the two of us.  Needless to say we gave the spa a miss we felt the staff there were out to make a fast buck with a degree of hard selling tactics.  Come on Be-Live sort this out this Spa does your customers or your reputation no good at all.    Finally hopefully it was just our room but we did note a strong smell of sewage in it at all times it was also noted in the Lobby bar on a couple of occasions only.    In summary if you take the surrounding area and the Spa out of the equation it really is a great place to stay.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Henry O wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: I had the best trip and a great experience with the staff. Will definitely come here again. Be live hotel staff are the one... please do all the activities available... archery darts swimming etc thanks you for everything
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: DaulKenneth wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Great resort, value for money, entertainment was better than expected.
Review_Text: The a la carte restaurant was well worth the visit - we should have went back if we hadn't left this until the second to last night to visit.  Entertainment was better than expected cocktails and drink choices were good. Facilities such as spa/gym/pools etc were all good.  Rooms were serviced every day as expected and were slightly better than i had expected as well.  All in all good value for money.  Would return at some point in the future....
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled on business

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Graeme W wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: We visited here the week before Christmas and we had a lovely relaxing break for 3 nights.  The staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are very comfortable clean and spacious.    The only downside was the food. I was looking forward to trying local cuisine and was left disappointed. Plenty to choose from and the bread was freshly made.    We were looked after on an evening by Mourad who kept us topped up with the red wine which was delicious.    The hotel provides a shuttle bus to town where we visited the souk on the Friday.    There was good entertainment in the bar on 2 of the nights. Belly dancers and Latin dancing were both worth a watch!    All in all a lovely break in the run up to Christmas
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Wendy wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Visited in October 2019 we had booked a superior room and when we arrived was upgraded to a swim up room. We had room 3008 which was furthest away from reception buffet loud pool. This was great as it was really peaceful.  We chose the chill out pool each day myself and my 19 year old daughter it was never to busy got a bed no matter what time of day and the weather was great.  First 2 nights we went to the  buffet restaurant and thought the food was good but it gets very repetitive this is my first time in all inclusive for about 13 years and it is what it is..... we tried to the a la carte restaraunt but the food was not to our liking. The pool bar during in the day had decent food so ate tgere a few times.  If you are looking for a chilled time and are not too concerned about repetitive food would recommend.  The staff were great and very chatty and helpful.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Alexander Q wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Really enjoyed the darts archery and all other games. It was an experience I will not forget and that was all thanks to the crew which were making it there first thing to make sure we really enjoyed ourselves to the max.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sabz wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Friendly Staff, amazing food and great poolside entertainment
Review_Text: My sister and I visited this hotel staff are very friendly the food has been amazing every day and having a free shuttle into the square and souk is a huge perk. We enjoyed poolside entertainment every day...darts archery fresh ball games and basketball: )
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Amber wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: The staff are lovely and so attentive. Lots to do in the day.. Make sure you use the free shuttle service get around the city. Food is amazing here which is an added bonus.. love the entertainment team.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sajjad H wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Stayed here over Jan when the weather is much cooler. Very impressive hotel with amazing staff!    Room looked like it was new. My room had a little seating area outside the back where smokers could sit/ or just bask in the sun if you don‚Äôt smoke!    I personally found the food to be great. I can understand some people saying they didn‚Äôt enjoy the food but the good thing is that there is so much variety and the dishes change daily. There‚Äôs also the outside bar which serves food (albeit at certain times) so there shouldn‚Äôt really be a reason you can‚Äôt find something you don‚Äôt like.    There‚Äôs a shuttle bus which goes to the city centre everyday with three different stops. We found the best approach to have breakfast early morning get the earliest shuttle to town and see the sights whilst the weather is still cold and then come back at around 3ish so we can have lunch and sit in the sun whilst it‚Äôs at its hottest! One thing to improve on is that there should be a map of the stops and it‚Äôs localities given to you. We didn‚Äôt realise there were three different stops and we ended up getting lost on one of the days due to the language barrier between us and the driver of the coach on one of the days - he was really helpful though and drove us himself to where we needed to be.    Loved the Sports bar spent most of my evenings in there playing pool board games and watching football.    There‚Äôs a small shop in the hotel for small things e.g deodorant/cigarettes/snacks/souvenirs which is handy as there is literally nothing else around you other than a car showroom and another 4 star Be Live hotel.    All in all i had a great holiday. The staff are super friendly; I can see where some people have said they are understaffed as I got that feeling too.. but they are really hard workers and you could tell they were going the extra mile to make our holiday great.    I will 100% be back!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Klara G wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: We had such a good time at hotel. The staff are super. Especially Titif he made our holiday so much fun...doing archery and table tennis and taught us some Arabic. Also zackaria and Karim Abdula and photographer. At the snack bar wonderful Sara and Hamza and all the wait staff in whole hotel were amazing and always so friendly and helpful. We look forward to coming back thanks so much
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: De Pascal Vu Wooltz wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Nice Hotel in a quiet zone
Review_Text: As we arrived the staff took our bagages to the reception. The people at the reception were very friendly and explained us everything that we needed to know. Even during our stay they always had an open ear for questions.    The room was very clean. Two big beds and bathroom with a bathtub and an Italian shower. We also had a terrace. Rhe beds were very comfortable.    Since this is an All Inclusive Hotel and only local alcool was served we had a little doubt about the quality. We tried some cocktails and these were amazing. Even the Marrocanian beer was very good.    The food at the hotel is mainly served at the buffet restaurant. The menu changes everyday and there is food for everyone. I think that the quality is very good. You can try the local cuisine. For one evening we could go to their restaurant the ‚ÄòKsar‚Äô where you can choose between two menues. Food and service were amazing.    Free shuttles are offered to the city center. Just ask for your ticket at the reception.    Every evening they have a different event at the lobby bar. The waiters are very friendly and serve you your preferred drink always with a smile.    At the dports bar you can play pool table football several card games etc. The cocktails are bigger here than in the ither bars.    The big advantage of the hotel is their very competent and friendly staff.    We couldn‚Äôt use the pool because it was s little bit too cold.    Thank you for the nice experience
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: lee m wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Stayed over Christmas and all I can say if was great the hotel clean and modern  Staff were very friendly especially the bar staff always happy to see you lobby bar sport bar pool bar always smiling and happy to help food was OK snack bar next to pool was better than the main restaurant in the day great service from them  would definitely recommend this for a get away

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: JumpingJackFlash2017 wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: What a charming Hotel beautifully presented great hospitality what more could you ask for. Thank you Be Live Experience for an exceptional holiday the service from your staff was of a high order and you can feel proud of yourselves for providing such an all round good space to enjoy some much needed winter sun. Although the Hotel itself is a good stones throw from the main hub of Marrakesh the Hotel puts on a Coach shuttle service several times during the day. Within twenty five minutes you will find yourself in the thick of it all from Snake Charmers to the vibrant buzz of the melody of the Medina and the endless amount of Souks dotted around.    Worthy of a mention were the Maintenance team and Groundsmen whose work generally go overlooked. The grounds were always well maintained and the grounds were kept immaculate the Pool was clean and the addition of an outdoor seating area allowed for Al-fresco dining in the Moroccan Sun. You can always count on a Brandy or a tall cold Cocktail to add a laid back feel to eradicate the winter blues.    The front desk staff were generally helpful switched on and on hand to offer suggestions of the local landscape of Marrakesh but in all honesty the stars of the show were all those whom worked in the main eating quarters I cant say enough good things about them. They were always attentive to our party of two addressing us by name for the best part meeting us daily with a warm reception by offering up a smile and general chit chat. Its funny how the smallest seeming things leave a lasting impression nothing ever seemed to be a chore they were practically falling over themselves to help making sure that our meal was satisfactory and topping up our Glasses at the nearest opportunity.    I found the selection of food to be very good and plentiful the Lamb Tagine was delightful cooked to perfection. The generous cuts of meat seemed to just separate from the bone with ease and the Cous-Cous was so light and fluffy compliments to the head Chef keep up the hard work.    Throughout our stay I could sense a good sense of team work it was evident that all the Kitchen staff were well managed and worked cohesively to ensure that we had an enjoyable experience. Although all of Waiters and Waitresses were worthy of commendation I am guilty of having my favourites and would go as far as saying that their work was exemplary. I would like to take this time to thank them all by calling them out individually by name for their hospitality.    A Special thank you to Mouhssine Saad- lets hope Mourinho can turn things around at our beloved Spurs  Abdessamad for always offering up a smile and his tireless work ethic Mourad for his warmth of character and Nayma for making the best Pizzas that side of Morocco.    I know this review is getting lengthy but I cant conclude without mentioning The Hammam and Spa treatment package deal that we purchased. The service was professional and by far the most thorough massage we have ever experienced and we will be looking to return in the not so distant future. I opted for the Hot stone treatment which in hindsight was a great choice and left me feeling rejuvenated and with a sense of well-being. The masseuse had to practically scrape me up off the lino from where I had conked out bringing on relaxation to the point of inducing sleep. This crowned off a pleasant stay at the Hotel making a sweet holiday that little bit sweeter.    P.s : Please be mindful that a deposit of ¬£90 is taken by reception and will be returned on your departure.    In the market space Hagglehagglehaggle and haggle some more at the Souks and don't be afraid to walk away. Be mindful though as the tradesmen can be very pushy just be respectful and if not interested simply walk away.    If you are looking to have a nice night out of the Hotels ground and could use a change of scenery where you can get spruced up for with live music and belly dancing and all the razzmatazz and glitz Marrakesh has to offer get yourselves down to Bendoo Restaurant on a Saturday night its located the other side of Jemaa el-Fnaa not too far from Sofitel Hotel - accessible by getting the shuttle down to the last stop and a 15 minute walk. I would suggest you reserve a table for 9 pm and stay for the entertainment which gets started about 10 pm so be prepared to be leaving the venue no later than 12 am so you'll probably need to arrange a private Cab to get back to the Hotel.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Alex -London wrote a review Jan 2020

The food I was worried about but turned out to be great as well. If you are coming here don‚Äôt worry it‚Äôs a great place to stay
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: oakeydoki wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Just back from 7 nights at this wonderful hotel. To say this hotel has the friendliest and most professional staff is an understatement. The guys in the Lobby were unbelievably efficient and friendly. All the animation team made us feel so at home with a huge thank you to Zakaria for being one of the nicest people we have ever met.
