Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Dmitry wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: The hotel is very wonderful and well maintained. Special thanks to all the hotel staff reception especially to Marwa for their help in solving the problem of lost luggage. All people here are very responsive and friendly. Thanks to you our vacation was not overshadowed.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: HRV wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: We have just returned from a wonderful week at Be Live. Would definitely recommend Morocco as a good winter sun destination and the resort was great but there are definitely a few changes that can be made which will only serve to make it even better.    Staff: All staff in the hotel were friendly attentive helpful went out of their way and the animation team in particular were the best we have ever known. A special shout out to Zakaria and Mustafa and everyone was lovely getting people involved in the activities and talking to us almost daily.    Cleanliness: Rooms were spotless each and every day as well as all hotel areas restaurants lobby bar gym spa everywhere. Could not fault at all pool areas and all bathrooms in commons areas were spotless as well as the tables chairs and pool.    Food and drinks: Unfortunately this is one of the areas that needs improvement we found that a lot of the items in the international buffet were cold hit and miss or repetitive. Obviously we understand that its an all inclusive and this will be the case but I think they could do with a re think of a few different cuisines at lunchtimes and dinner times and things need to be properly labelled or sectioned as it was very unclear what was what was decent with eggs bread fruit etc.. The snack bar offered a different lunch option which was welcome as they did burger and chips which we had often. The cocktails depend on who is making them and they could offer more fresh juices but the coffees were lovely and like we said the service was always great.    Rooms: Very large comfortable bed with robes and slippers only issue was we had a connecting room door and unfortunately every single word movement and action could be heard from next door so perhaps better soundproofing would be something for the future.    Entertainment: Again this was hit and miss on the nights where they had two guys singing and playing live it was great however there were some nights were there was no atmosphere at all and the entertainment was so so. Karaoke was fun and when they had the dancers it was fun but from 9pm until the entertainment it was often waiting around for something to happen.  We took advantage of the free shuttle bus to Jmaa El Fna which was a fun day out and a nice thing to easily arrange with the staff.    I would say overall our experience was a joy and I would definitely consider staying at Be Live again. We had a great time thank you
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kirran wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: A very big thank you to Zakaria and his team tourist and animation titif Fati and Karim    Zakaria was very friendly and made us feel very welcomed.  He was very easy approachable with good English speaking skills.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: kim t wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: I booked this four night break as a Xmas pressie for my partner via Voyage Priv√©. We absolutely love it!!! Such an amazing deal.... food is great but remember it‚Äôs buffet style and in any hotel it‚Äôs always pretty much the same every day. We love Moroccan food so we are more than happy but there‚Äôs pizza and pasta if your a creature of habit!!! It‚Äôs a very small resort with nothing outside of it although they offer a courtesy bus to the M√©dina one a la carte which we haven‚Äôt found the need to try and a pool cafe which serves great club sandwiches and burgers. Wine is really nice sadly they water down fruit juice which I find hard to understand when there‚Äôs oranges growing in the resort grounds. Premium spirits chargeable. Haven‚Äôt tried the local beer. The hotel is absolutely spotless and staff couldn‚Äôt be more friendly or helpful... Now the Spa.... OMG best massage I‚Äôve ever had!!! Well worth a visit !! If you are thinking of a January trip here bring jeans/trousers and jumpers. Very cold in morning and early eve the hotel is quite casual ... so don‚Äôt bring anything fancy. Perfect break to start a peaceful relaxing new year. X
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: femi adedotun wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: This place is EXACTLY as seen on the advert. The staff are so nice its unreal. Nothing is ever too much to ask. Titif and Zakaria are forever asking if we needed anything else. Thank you so much and also the photographer is another gentle soul (Abdullah) ....HIGHLY RECOMMENDED HONESTLY! I will be back in few months.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Darren wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Great food, great restaurant and bar staff, but it is not a 5 star hotel.
Review_Text: We stayed for two weeks over Christmas and New Year.  As seasoned travellers we did not think that this was a 5 star hotel as it did feel a little disorganised and understaffed at times. That said the staff are very friendly and really do transform the place and made it a great place to stay.  The food- Very good indeed. We are both fussy eaters but we always had lots of choice and were always impressed with the standard. We could not make use of the √† la carte restaurant as my fianc√© is a pescatarian and they did not have any fish/vegetarian replacements for the set courses with meat (they could only serve the meat dish without the meat)- this amazed us and was another reason we do not consider the hotel 5 star.  The room- We stayed in a suite and were very happy with it. It did lack some basics like a mirror in the second bathroom and plug sockets for hair dryers etc. in the main bathroom. It was in a good part of the hotel away from the bars and restaurants so nice and quiet.  The snack bar could be an issue at times with queues for drinks and long wait times for food and service. It felt understaffed on both the walk up and sit-down service. The staff that were there worked very hard indeed.  They really do need a coffee machine and toilets at the quiet pool.  The gym- this really could do with expansion and upgrade. We visited at different times of the day and it was always pretty busy and difficult to get on things. It is a gym from a very average hotel!  The friendliness of the bar and restaurant staff really did make this an enjoyable stay. They also did an exceptional job at the New Years Eve gala.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Philhowe wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Lovely time away pool was amazing and entertainment was good fun. From teaching you Arabic at the bar to darts by the pool  enjoyed the archery competition there were 2 lads that stud out for there fun look on life titif and Karim  we will definitely be back in the summer
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Davinia wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Fantastic we could not falt any of the pool entertainment was great and all of the entertainment staff were friendly and fun we will definitely be back . There is more than enough to keep you entertained. Thy bring your drinks to your table and always smiling. From yoga in the morning to archery in the afternoon and water aerobics  salsa dancing it‚Äôs been so much fun
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Dominic C wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Seeing in the new year with Be Live
Review_Text: We stayed with Be Live for a week over the new year period. We visited for some winter sun. This is the colder part of the year with the day being warm between 11am and 6pm outside of these times it was fairly cold. However due to this time being less busy it was calmer and there was no great rush for sunbeds.  Food - The food was mainly a buffet which was good but not the greatest amount of variety. As a food allergy sufferer I would recommend getting translations for your allergy into Arabic and French (the two main languages spoken) prior to travelling. I would also notify the booking agent when booking. At the buffet there was no signage saying which dish contained which allergens. However I found the staff very helpful and they gave you a tour of the buffet saying which dishes you would have to avoid when asked  Guests were entitled to one night at the authentic Moroccan restaurant on site were you chose from one of two fixed menus. This made for a nice change.  Rooms - the rooms were of a good quality clean tidy and a decent size.  Pool and facilities - the gym is adequate for a fairly basic workout. There‚Äôs a number of cardio machines some free weights and a couple of weighted machines. There are two pools on offer (the main pool and a relaxation pool). Both pools are well managed if not a little small.  NYE - A formal gala dinner was hosted for New Year‚Äôs Eve for no additional fee. It was a nice way to chat to other guests. The food was nice and there was live entertainment.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Ellie G wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Myself partner and our friends visited this hotel in Oct 2019. When we first arrived the staff couldn‚Äôt have been more friendly and attentive and offered us some Moroccan tea whilst we waited to check-in. This did take a little longer than expected and we couldn‚Äôt get into our room for a good few hours due to check-in time which cant be helped.    It was scorching hot so we got some food and drinks whilst we waited. The rooms were beautiful and clean however there were a couple of times we went back to the room and they hadn‚Äôt been tended but once we asked there was no issue in arranging this.    The weather stayed hot all week and the pools were great to cool down in!    The food was beautiful lots of choice and delicious local dishes too!    The drinks in the sports bar and the lounge were fab however the drinks around the pool were less so there were lots of bees/wasps around the fizzy drinks often weren‚Äôt enough plastic cups meaning having to wait for them to be insufficiently cleaned.    The grounds were beautiful and the evenings were relaxing. We got the free shuttle into the Medina which i highly recommend it is an amazing eye opening experience!!    Overall I had a fab relaxing time the one and only thing i would say is the pool bars could be improved. Everything else was magnificent.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Gary H wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Title: Brilliant staff and would highly recommend this resort
Review_Text: Stayed at this resort over New Years for the second year in a row. The staff are extremely attentive and all go out of their way to make the stay enjoyable. Special mention to the bar staff in the lobby bar Azdine Youness And Abdel and also Oussama and Amine in the restaurant.  Every day the quality and selection of food was excellent and the hotel was spotlessly clean
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Aislinn wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: We stayed in the Belive for a week this year and last year. Azdine was fantastic catering for our every need. We enjoyed every minute both years and will definitely be going back!! Great New Years celebrations as well !
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: hawkes1979 wrote a review Jan 2020
Review_Text: Staff were very attentive. First ever solo trip and I almost didn‚Äôt go into the New Years Party due to nerves and having to sit with groups of family‚Äôs etc. The staff could see this and looked after me making sure my glass was never empty and every now and again asking if I was ok. At least until they could see I was settled in.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: caz226 wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: I took my daughter as a surprise for her 18th Birthday. Not sure what to expect as it was the first time adults only. The hotel itself was so clean  beautiful grounds and kept immaculate . The staff were always happy laughing and could not do enough for you. We enjoyed chatting to them. The guests were from all ages adult birthday bashes family Christmases. Lots of groups of adults and all age groups of couples. A great mix. Food was very good  always plenty. Snack bar good too. Speciality restaurant was a very lovely experience going from buffet to waiter service and they did it with style food was different it was a matter of taste. Rooms large and always spotless. Pool and bars well kept and staff again very helpful. Spa was amazing value we had treatments split over 3 days  fantastic experience  great treatments and fantastic service. Everything was just great. Shuttle bus free to souks in Marrakesh.Would not fancy this in summer as probably too busy and too hot but for a short winter sunshine break it was perfect. Would recommend and possibly go back. Thanks
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: M&A Simpson wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Positives-  ‚Ä¢they take pride in their decor and cleanliness of rooms and grounds.  ‚Ä¢The rooms are spacious with air con.  ‚Ä¢sports bar waiter very attentive and friendly.  ‚Ä¢free shuttle bus-although limited times of departure and pick up.    Negatives  ‚Ä¢ when you check in you are required to pay a deposit for the mini bar- which in fact is empty! A fridge in the room with water but nothing else This deposit is then returned to you upon check out apparently however I have only just received the ¬£80 deposit back today 31/12/19    ‚Ä¢the snack bar is time limited in terms of opening hours. Finishes 6pm  ‚Ä¢A particular waiter makes it evident of his distain if you‚Äôre not French or don‚Äôt speak French- came across ignorant.    ‚Ä¢As for food from 10pm you are given an option of a sandwich which is found in the sports bar.    ‚Ä¢Constant smell of sewage coming from our bathroom.    ‚Ä¢ after a week stay the food became a bit samey it looks like there are loads of options but several dishes of roasted vegetables buffs it out.    ‚Ä¢the evening entertainment is rubbish. This place is not catered for the younger population. Although a mixed age group when we visited but definitely more for your over 50s    Conclusion  I wouldn‚Äôt go back. It‚Äôs not all inclusive as you might expect. Snacks are limited drinks are cheap & watered down. Food meh. Entertainment is dull and because it‚Äôs out of the way you find yourself tucked up in bed for midnight.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: SHOWTRAC wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Title: Nice modern hotel - would visit again
Review_Text: Spent Xmas week here first time been at this hotel. Very quiet when we arrived but filled up over xmas.  Two nice pools one more fun noisy one more chilled and quiter. never once had to get up early for sunbeds always pleanty on offer. nice towels as well.  Rooms - we had a ground floor pool facing very large Super King bed. Good air con. Nice bathroom and powerful hot shower. Good blackout curtains room safe and fridge all handy. We did some mattress manouvering as the bed was just too soft for us and gave us back ache until we made some adjustments.  Food - the food selection in the buffett was awesome. I pretty much ate from teh salad bar each time as it was different every day. There is plenty of hot food and a pasta station as well. Breakfast has an omlette station but get your fried eggs fresh as they get cold when left in the warmer.  The waiters in the restaurant were brilliant and we very soon had our favourites that looked after us and plenty of wine.  Pool side snak bar is also good for food and we ate there on a few lunchtimes.  Evening in the lobby bar once again good service and entertainment though we often went to the sports bar which was also good and has san miguel in botlles.  We never did the ala carte so cannot comment    Overall this was our first trip to Morocco and this hotel was really good. Free shuttle in to Marrakesh regulalrly through out day and evening.    There is nothing outside of this hotel so no shops or places to walk to.    The Adults only does make a difference and we value that .    Would visit here again

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: alicemoraaqui wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: When we enter the hall it smells really nice which is a plus! The hotel has beautiful gardens and the rooms are amazing! All the staff is trully kind and wants you to be happy here! Good food also! Im loving it.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Iain McB wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Title: A great all inclusive close to Marrakech
Review_Text: We had a great week here over Christmas. Firstly the hotel is super clean modern and easy to get around. A truely adult only resort with the options of a quiet pool and fun pool. The fun pool is staffed by an enthusiastic team with regular activities and music. The food options in the buffet are excellent for all meals and we never got bored. The rooms are clean modern and spacious and really comfy beds. On the whole the staff are super friendly and responsive. Also helpful is the hotel runs a free shuttle bus to Marrakech centre which takes 15-20mins which is helpful as it‚Äôs a little way out of town. A taxi is also a good option and costs 100-150Dirhams. We can‚Äôt actually wait to come back to visit
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Tracey Scott wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: We didn‚Äôt realise we hadn‚Äôt locked our patio doors.  Very late at night two young men entered our room and tried it on with my friend and I.Luckily we told them to get out and they did.  We think they came back second night as we heard knocking on the door again..  Told receptionist but nothing has been done.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Paige H wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Wow... Where do I even begin with this review    Firstly I'd like to say IGNORE the negative comments and reviews on here because after staying here for 10 days we have nothing but amazing things to say about the whole experience from beginning to end.    When we arrived we were welcomed by the friendliest of belboys who immediately assisted and helped take all of our luggage inside we were greeted by the reception staff like family They were so incredibly polite and helped us in every which way they could nothing was too much trouble we had to pay a ¬£90 deposit for the room and towels at check in however if you look after your room and dont lose the towels you get it straight back with no problems on check-out.    The rooms were beautiful I stayed with my Mum and we booked a twin room we wasnt expecting to find to full size double beds and for the room to be so spacious it was immaculate and we were well stocked on teas/coffees bottled water etc. and all the other essential equipment you need we stayed in room 2114 which was perfect for us as it was round the back of the hotel on the 1st floor and our balcony was very secluded and quiet in the evenings I will say the only problem would be the bathroom window adjoined to the room as its see through even with the pull down blind so if you arent with a partner be aware of that to combat this problem me and my mum just put the bed runners up the window and it gave us the privacy we needed so wasnt at all an issue. The housekeeping were absolutely fabulous nothing was too much trouble and each day our room was left pristine so a special thankyou to them.    The Food was absolutely delicious we really couldnt fault it so all of those complaining and wanting your standard english grub book an all inclusive in benidorm if you want you pie and chips that badly! We are vegetarians and there was SO MUCH choice the chefs and dining staff go above and beyond to produce such beautiful spreads Christmas Eve was absolutely divine you could see just how much effort they had gone to for the guests and the chefs all looked as proud as can be when guests began to eat and so they should be we cannot thank you enough the waiting staff were all so friendly and efficient and would be over in a snap to replenish your drinks or clean away your plate once you had finished.    Now coming on to the parts that really made our holiday special firstly were the snack bar team They are some of the nicest warmest friendliest people we have ever come across a huge and very special thankyou to Khamal and Sara you really made our holiday special and we genuinely looked forward to coming down each morning to see and talk to you both I cant sing their praises enough and Belive... they really are a true credit to your team and you should be very proud to have them work for you I really hope you are able to relay this and they get some recognition for that. They would always seem genuinely happy to see us and interested in a chat as well as being beyond efficient in bringing us whatever we needed without even needing to ask we were genuinely sad to say our farewells and to leave them!    My second special mention would be Titif He made us feel like family and we will never be able to express just how much we enjoyed talking with you and how welcome you made us feel he too is an absolute credit to your team and we hope that he gets recognition for that also We also felt very sad saying goodbye to you too!    For those reasons alone and because of your fabulous staff we said that we will be returning to Marrakech Morocco is a beautiful country and we have never been made to feel more welcome anywhere before until we came here and we are very looking forward to coming back to see you all again!    Again such a massive thankyou to all of you that made our holiday so special and we will be back! Anybody that wants a relaxing getaway this is the place for you thankyou so much again.    Paige and Michelle
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Cassie B wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Just back from a Christmas break at this hotel. Can‚Äôt recommend enough. The food on Christmas Eve was amazing and excellent for the duration of our stay. The hotel is spotless and staff are hard working friendly and couldn‚Äôt do enough for us. Be live hotel if you read this review I hope you appreciate your staff as they made our holiday great. Please pass on our thanks once again.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jon Richard B wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Fantastic 5 star accommodation on the outskirts of Marrakech! Lovely staff food and surroundings. Beautiful courtyards created in the style of riads within spacious grounds. This stay was incredible value for money - all inclusive with the bonus of two large swimming pools entertainment and a shuttle coach included to transport guests to and from the town. I would definitely seek out accommodation with this company again.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: iompair wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: We had originally booked a break to Tunisia but got caught up in the Thomas Cook d√©bacle so booked here on a bit of a whim and are very glad we did.  Rooms are spacious beds comfy and bathrooms have a lovely deep bath and separate walk in shower.  There are 2 good size pools. It's worth being aware that the quiet pool - the one with swim up bar - isn't heated so not really suitable for swimming at this time of year. That said the animation team take their break 12:30-14:00 so the livelier (heated) pool is quiet then and good for swimming. There are plenty of loungers/beds around the pools. No need to get up early to reserve one although that didn't stop some people!  Food is plentiful and varied. One of us is a very fussy eater & has managed to find something at every meal! Excellent cocktails - highly recommended is the Mojith√© a local twist on the classic Mojito.  The resort is kept spotless by hardworking staff who all seem to be smiling whatever the hour!    If you prefer a quiet room ask for block 3. It is further from reception/amenities (walk to the pool takes about 90 seconds so not exactly a long way) but no disturbing music from the lively pool or bars.    This has been exactly what we wanted - a relaxing winter break away from any Christmas stresses.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Natalie F wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The first thing to say about the hotel is how hard the staff work in all bars restaurants and pools across the site. They are so lovely and polite and definitely add to your holiday. I think a lot of people come time and again as we hear some people that are really familiar with the staff and ask after their families which I think is lovely and really rare these days.    Our room is a swim up room which is great but the swim up doesnt swim anywhere it's just a pool in front of the adjoining rooms.  I dont think weve made the most of it and if we came again we'd probably just get a standard room.    The food is pretty average a usual all inclusive. It can be quite random.  The drinks are great the measures are generous and theres a good selection of cocktails.    Weve really enjoyed our time here and we both said we'd come again.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kathleen M wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: This is an excellent hotel.the staff are very pleasant.speak good English .the pool staff are a lot of fun.rooms very clean & comfortable the food is fantastic . The restaurant went all out & made amazing Xmas buffet. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Great staff all through this hotel both inside & outside big thank to all

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mayflower19 wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Azzdine. What a man goes far beyo d the extra mile. He has an infectious smile we love him. So hard working and nothing is too much trouble. Would 100% recommend. Kept supplied all nights and days at Lobby Bar Pool Bar and restaurant
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Brenda P wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Azzdine the best bar man never leaves you with an empty glass. So happy and full of laughs. Amazing cocktails at the pool party today. Such a lovely hotel will be returning again Christmas holiday and the sun is shining xxxx
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kate wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Lovely first holiday to Marrakesh at the Be Live Hotel Adults only. Very quiet and chilled week away with not a child in sight! Highly recommend if you want to get away from the typical busy all inclusive holidays.    The food was amazing! And probably the best I‚Äôve tasted whilst on a all inclusive holiday. Service was 5*. The Bay Spa on site is too highly recommended. The luxury spa treatment facilities and staff were great. The best spa treatments I‚Äôve also ever had.    So much to do in the area with a shuttle bus operating throughout the day 5 days a week! Made is so much easier to get around!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sonja Lawal wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Title: Excellent staff and service with great food
Review_Text: Our hotel experience was fantastic. All the staff were so friendly and always willing to help. A special thank you to Ghizlane who went above and beyond to make our birthday a special one and going out of her way to help plan everyday of our trip to make sure we experienced Marrakech really well. Would definitely recommend for a nice relaxing holiday and well supported by the lovely staff.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: MAB199369 wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: We had a very nice stay at the resort the service was great.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone else looking for something affordable but decent service!    Azdine needs a raise! Best waiter going! :)
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Adrian C wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Great waiter azdine gave every thing we wanted love him very friendly helpful snack bar great great place will visit again rooms great rooms showers very hot gym very good spa great need to try the good chicha
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Rose V wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The best team!!! AzdineYouness Mouhssin  The best kind people work in this hotel!  The hotel is nice and clean! The pool are beautiful!  Restaurant is great. Waiters are very friendly!  Snack bar is good.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Maria Pinheiro wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Azzdine and younes Ana j Mouhssin are good profissional and wonderfull people always available to all the guests as well the restaurant staff. The hotel and all the facilities including food and drinks are TOP.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Ranjana wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Looking for a relaxing place then try this hotel. Located in quite residential placefriendly staff and clean spacious room.All inclusive formula works well and free shuttle to Jemaa el fnaa(souks).The gardens are well maintained and a little walk helps after food and drinks.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Stevie b wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Azzdine and mouhhs in excellent service provided by both.    Azzdine is always happy he has a cheeky smile. Staff generally are very friendly the hotel is spotless so clean. Definitely w.    ...worth 5 stars.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled on business

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: AodhO wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Visited for long weekend. Place us spotless and all the staff very friendly and helpful. Food and entertainment grand. Special mention to Nassir in the Sports Bar who always went that extra mile to make your time there enjoyable.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: jake h wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Very friendly service very good hotel brilliant atmosphere nothing to complain about everything organised. All the waiters very kind. One of the best services from a hotel I've had. Hotel has everything from spa to heated indoor pool again brilliant service from all the waiters including azdine.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kk F wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Hotel is about 18months old very clean and staff are extremely friendly and always checking if guests are ok.    All inclusive so you should never go hungry. Plenty of food and drinks although will give the food an average rating.    There‚Äôs a snack bar available between meals which means you don‚Äôt have to worry about missing breakie or lunch. Snack bar closes at 6pm - just in time for dinner.    You‚Äôll be entitled to ‚ÄúMorrocan fine dining‚Äù (which needs to be prebooked at the reception) at the KStar restaurant if hotel is booked for 4+ nights. There are two menu options which aren‚Äôt very great (but the general buffet is just about a minute away so you can pretty much get some food in the dinning area if not satisfied with the ‚Äúfine dinning‚Äù meal).    Hotel has a gym. Sadly the indoor pool doesn‚Äôt come with the price of the hotel. Also has a sport bar for the sports fanatic. Not a lot of TV channel choices if english is your primary language. There are also two table tennis tables there and an outdoor pool. Had a game or two with Titif (staff) who practically made it his duty to make sure guests were ok. Same for Hamza at the snack bar who made sure your orders arrived hot and accurate. Music at the pool finishes at 6:30pm each day.    The hotel offers a shuttle service to and from the town centre. everyday which needs to be prebooked.    The indoor music bar operates between 10pm and midnight everyday and it offers different themes each day. Drinks and peanuts available at the music bar.    Didn‚Äôt book any tours via the hotel because they were a tad pricey.    Will definitely love to visit again. Thanks to all the staff who made my holiday enjoyable
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Hicham Li wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: One name Azzedine!!! He‚Äôs so professionnel and so kind. He always serve you with a smile and a nice word. He feels your mood and give you the good advice for your drinks to make you enjoy the atmosphere...
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kessa M wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The hotel itself was beautiful. It was clean and the staff were very friendly. The room was lovely and spacious and had everything you needed. The rooms were cleaned excellently daily. The spa was exceptional. We had a spa package which started with a Hammam.The Hammam treatment was an amazing experience leaving my skin feeling soft and clean. This was followed by a massage which was comforting and relaxing. We were then allowed to relax by the heated pool. T  he pool was warm and clean. The style of the spa was just lovely and was my favourite part. The food at the hotel was ok. There was a good variety of food and many different options. However the food could have been hotter.  We did try to book at La Carte restaurant one night however we didn't enjoy the slow service and ended up eating at the buffet.    Again the staff were very friendly and welcoming.  When booking the excursions it was easy simple and quick.    I would love to return to the hotel and do it all again.  Amazing!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Andy wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Stayed here for ten days. Fabulous hotel with fabulous staff. Nothing was too much for them to help you. Entertainment was fun and swimming pool was clean but a bit cold. Titi was particularly helpful as were the other pool boys Staff in the bar and restaurant were also very friendly and couldn‚Äôt have done anymore to make it a great ten days. Only one problem I had was the towels in the room. Three times I had a shower and there was no towels in the room but it didn‚Äôt spoil a great holiday. Thank you very much and I will be back in April for another much needed break.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Richard S wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Amazing hotel and great staff. If there ever saw an empty glass it was refilled!! the rooms are modern and spacious with super comfortable large beds. Food in the buffet style restaurant was excellent and something different every night. The hotel is slightly out of town but not an issue if you are sitting by the pool. Excellent weather for December grounds immaculately kept. Lots of activities if you want it. Indoor pool gym and spa. Free shuttle bus into the centre of town a bonus. Tui rep that operated from the hotel was very good and knowledgeable gave great tips. Highly recommended and a great price. Would definitely consider going back in the warmer months. Brilliant

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lee wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The service cant be faulted at all. The animation team were super friendly and very interactive quite a lot on offer to keep you well entertained from archery basketball football gymn. We will definetly visit again no doubt. Thumbs up to all the team and Titif always on the look out to help...Mourad- best waiter i've ever met. Above all its an extremely nice resort.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mark M wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Amazing hotel and amazing stay. The staff are outstanding and the food is excellent too knocked 1 star off due to a smell I presume is plumbing works on the last 2 days    Overall it was a great stay and we would come back again. The staff really are brilliant and make you feel really welcome the rooms are modern and spacious with super comfortable beds - would recommend to anyone
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

The staff are outstanding and the food is excellent too knocked 1 star off due to a smell I presume is plumbing works on the last 2 days    Overall it was a great stay and we would come back again. The staff really are brilliant and make you feel really welcome the rooms are modern and spacious with super comfortable beds - would recommend to anyone
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: jake h wrote a review Dec 2019

Hotel has everything from spa to heated indoor pool again brilliant service from all the waiters including azdine.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kk F wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Hotel is about 18months old very clean and staff are extremely friendly and always checking if guests are ok.    All inclusive so you should never go hungry. Plenty of food and drinks although will give the food an average rating.    There‚Äôs a snack bar available between meals which means you don‚Äôt have to worry about missing breakie or lunch. Snack bar closes at 6pm - just in time for dinner.    You‚Äôll be entitled to ‚ÄúMorrocan fine dining‚Äù (which needs to be prebooked at the reception) at the KStar restaurant if hotel is booked for 4+ nights. There are two menu options which aren‚Äôt very great (but the general buffet is just about a minute away so you can pretty much get some food in the dinning area if not satisfied with the ‚Äúfine dinning‚Äù meal).    Hotel has a gym. Sadly the indoor pool doesn‚Äôt come with the price of the hotel. Also has a sport bar for the sports fanatic. Not a lot of TV channel choices if english is your primary language. There are also two table tennis tables there and an outdoor pool. Had a game or two with Titif (staff) who practically made it his duty to make sure guests were ok. Same for Hamza at the snack bar who made sure your orders arrived hot and accurate. Music at the pool finishes at 6:30pm each day.    The hotel offers a shuttle service to and from the town centre. everyday which needs to be prebooked.    The indoor music bar operates between 10pm and midnight everyday and it offers different themes each day. Drinks and peanuts available at the music bar.    Didn‚Äôt book any tours via the hotel because they were a tad pricey.    Will definitely love to visit again. Thanks to all the staff who made my holiday enjoyable
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Hicham Li wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: One name Azzedine!!! He‚Äôs so professionnel and so kind. He always serve you with a smile and a nice word. He feels your mood and give you the good advice for your drinks to make you enjoy the atmosphere...
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kessa M wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The hotel itself was beautiful. It was clean and the staff were very friendly. The room was lovely and spacious and had everything you needed. The rooms were cleaned excellently daily. The spa was exceptional. We had a spa package which started with a Hammam.The Hammam treatment was an amazing experience leaving my skin feeling soft and clean. This was followed by a massage which was comforting and relaxing. We were then allowed to relax by the heated pool. T  he pool was warm and clean. The style of the spa was just lovely and was my favourite part. The food at the hotel was ok. There was a good variety of food and many different options. However the food could have been hotter.  We did try to book at La Carte restaurant one night however we didn't enjoy the slow service and ended up eating at the buffet.    Again the staff were very friendly and welcoming.  When booking the excursions it was easy simple and quick.    I would love to return to the hotel and do it all again.  Amazing!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Andy wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Stayed here for ten days. Fabulous hotel with fabulous staff. Nothing was too much for them to help you. Entertainment was fun and swimming pool was clean but a bit cold. Titi was particularly helpful as were the other pool boys Staff in the bar and restaurant were also very friendly and couldn‚Äôt have done anymore to make it a great ten days. Only one problem I had was the towels in the room. Three times I had a shower and there was no towels in the room but it didn‚Äôt spoil a great holiday. Thank you very much and I will be back in April for another much needed break.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Richard S wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Amazing hotel and great staff. If there ever saw an empty glass it was refilled!! the rooms are modern and spacious with super comfortable large beds. Food in the buffet style restaurant was excellent and something different every night. The hotel is slightly out of town but not an issue if you are sitting by the pool. Excellent weather for December grounds immaculately kept. Lots of activities if you want it. Indoor pool gym and spa. Free shuttle bus into the centre of town a bonus. Tui rep that operated from the hotel was very good and knowledgeable gave great tips. Highly recommended and a great price. Would definitely consider going back in the warmer months. Brilliant

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lee wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The service cant be faulted at all. The animation team were super friendly and very interactive quite a lot on offer to keep you well entertained from archery basketball football gymn. We will definetly visit again no doubt. Thumbs up to all the team and Titif always on the look out to help...Mourad- best waiter i've ever met. Above all its an extremely nice resort.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Review_Text: One name Azzedine!!! He‚Äôs so professionnel and so kind. He always serve you with a smile and a nice word. He feels your mood and give you the good advice for your drinks to make you enjoy the atmosphere...
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kessa M wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The hotel itself was beautiful. It was clean and the staff were very friendly. The room was lovely and spacious and had everything you needed. The rooms were cleaned excellently daily. The spa was exceptional. We had a spa package which started with a Hammam.The Hammam treatment was an amazing experience leaving my skin feeling soft and clean. This was followed by a massage which was comforting and relaxing. We were then allowed to relax by the heated pool. T  he pool was warm and clean. The style of the spa was just lovely and was my favourite part. The food at the hotel was ok. There was a good variety of food and many different options. However the food could have been hotter.  We did try to book at La Carte restaurant one night however we didn't enjoy the slow service and ended up eating at the buffet.    Again the staff were very friendly and welcoming.  When booking the excursions it was easy simple and quick.    I would love to return to the hotel and do it all again.  Amazing!!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Andy wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Stayed here for ten days. Fabulous hotel with fabulous staff. Nothing was too much for them to help you. Entertainment was fun and swimming pool was clean but a bit cold. Titi was particularly helpful as were the other pool boys Staff in the bar and restaurant were also very friendly and couldn‚Äôt have done anymore to make it a great ten days. Only one problem I had was the towels in the room. Three times I had a shower and there was no towels in the room but it didn‚Äôt spoil a great holiday. Thank you very much and I will be back in April for another much needed break.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Richard S wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Amazing hotel and great staff. If there ever saw an empty glass it was refilled!! the rooms are modern and spacious with super comfortable large beds. Food in the buffet style restaurant was excellent and something different every night. The hotel is slightly out of town but not an issue if you are sitting by the pool. Excellent weather for December grounds immaculately kept. Lots of activities if you want it. Indoor pool gym and spa. Free shuttle bus into the centre of town a bonus. Tui rep that operated from the hotel was very good and knowledgeable gave great tips. Highly recommended and a great price. Would definitely consider going back in the warmer months. Brilliant

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lee wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: The service cant be faulted at all. The animation team were super friendly and very interactive quite a lot on offer to keep you well entertained from archery basketball football gymn. We will definetly visit again no doubt. Thumbs up to all the team and Titif always on the look out to help...Mourad- best waiter i've ever met. Above all its an extremely nice resort.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mark M wrote a review Dec 2019
Review_Text: Amazing hotel and amazing stay. The staff are outstanding and the food is excellent too knocked 1 star off due to a smell I presume is plumbing works on the last 2 days    Overall it was a great stay and we would come back again. The staff really are brilliant and make you feel really welcome the rooms are modern and spacious with super comfortable beds - would recommend to anyone
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Harry D wrote a review Nov 2019
Review_Text: Mohcine - Best bar man ever! Great pool player and amazing cocktail artist! Highly recommend! üòéüí™üá≤üá¶Amazing hotel! I played Mohcine everyday at pool. Thank you for staff at the lobby bar! Yassine and asma and Maryame. Karim was fantastic at teaching the archery everyday! Thank you for everyone! Room was fantastic as well! Would highly recommend to everyone!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: peachesandclive wrote a review Nov 2019
Review_Text: Just back from 5 days at this hotel.    As you are doing now I read all the reviews and just like me I'm sure you've read the negative ones and have some reservations as a result.    Well I don't know where these people have holidayed before or how high their standards are but for a normal person on a regular holiday I cannot see what there is to complain about.    This was our third consecutive all-inclusive trip to Marrakesh at October half term and it was easily our favourite. Although we liked the other hotels we've stayed in (Aqua Mirage and Eden Andalou) everything here was a bit better and a bit more straightforward than our previous experiences.    The photographs are all accurate - what you see in the photos is exactly what you get. The rooms are really very nice indeed and the grounds are absolutely lovely.    If I wanted to I could find things to nit pick about - but this was not an expensive holiday and we had a very enjoyable relaxing week so why would I?    Traveller tips:  Take a few books and leave them behind in the hotel library  Take some teabags for your bedroom (they provide fruit teas only)  You have to pay a tourist tax in cash; this is normal  Ask the staff for a few words in French and the local arabic dialect. Hello and thank you in the local language are basic courtesies and will go a long way with staff.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: fridalund2019 wrote a review Nov 2019
Review_Title: My stay at be live collection Marrakech adults only
Review_Text: Our stay at the hotel was Good overall. The staff were usually helpful and nice. The only thing we were a little disappointed with was the cocktail drinks around both pools. The alcohol wasn‚Äôt strong at all and drinks didn‚Äôt taste the best. But the hotel was very clean and We had a nice stay :)
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: cazatinkerbell wrote a review Nov 2019
Review_Text: Had a fabulous three night stay with my husband as an early Birthday celebration. Food and drinks were spot on. The selection of fresh meats fish fruit and vegetables were varied and delicious. Desserts are amazing. We found all the staff to be polite and helpful. The lady in public relations gave us great advice before taking the free hotel bus to visit the souks and take in the sights of the City. Great bar service from Azdine (Lobby bar) Mochine (Sports bar) and Mohammed on reception was friendly and helpful. The hotel and grounds are spotless. Maids did a fantastic job of keeping our room tidy and making sure we had clean towels water in the fridge etc. We had a swim up room which I would recommend. It is a shallow river but is great for cooling off and relaxing back at your room. Both pools lovely with activities at one and a swim up bar at the other. Evening entertainment was low key but we had plenty of laughs and met other people to chat to. Would choose to visit this hotel again if we return to Marrakech.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: BigTim7 wrote a review Nov 2019
Review_Text: We‚Äôre currently on holiday at this hotel and find the reviews way off the food in the restaurant is just okay but the worst thing is that it‚Äôs not hot and takes far too long to be replenished so while you wait for something to be cooked the rest of it‚Äôs cold the hotel is really under staffed with one server at each of the bars and takes forever to get served not to mention the shortage of simple glasses the restaurant is way too small and difficult to get served with a really poor layout I really don‚Äôt think that this hotel has customer service as a priority they seem to put more importance in to the management of the towels which is a whole other story please do think we have high expectations but simple service should be a given.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sonia D wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: MOhcine is wonderful and always willing to assist at the sports bar. Very clean hotel food is great and no job is too big always willing to accommodate what customers want. Food is good drinks are great. Mochine at lobby bar bar fati and Karim at the pool are fantastic. Enjoyable stay!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Palm B wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: Mohcine from the sports bar and lobby bar 100% best person on site.very polite looks after the customers recommend asking for him when you visit. Made our trip pleasant and great customer service! We will 100% be returning to be lived hotel and asking for this server. cocktails are on point !!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: martinebrand wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: Some staff were fantastic others were a little rude. Food was overall ok very much the same each night. Drinks there was plenty to choose from. Hotel grounds and rooms were lovely clean and bright.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Review_Date: Stuart B wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: During our week long stay at Be Live Collection we had a great time. The entertainment in the evenings and the activities during the day put on by Titif and his colleagues meant we are never bored or short of things to do. Titif was very good at getting people into the activities and taking part - normally we would never have taken part.    The hotel staff/restaurant staff and pool staff are very friendly and their service is fantastic. Darts in the pool archery table tennis and other fun activities like Aqua Exercise/Aerobics were always entertaining and a good laugh.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Essex1984 wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: We had a mum and daughter 4 day stay in a swim up room 1009.    + Room  very clean with 2 queen size beds  Robes slippers and toiletries  Tea and coffee making facilities but coffee replenishment was hit and miss  Safe and lots of wardrobe space and hangers  Swim up room is a novelty as doesn‚Äôt actually go to the pool however it‚Äôs lovely to chill out and relax in your own area    + Food and drinks  Lots of variety for dinner but sorry no chips much authentic options of tagine etc  We didn‚Äôt struggle for a table or drinks but ate after 9pm (restaurant open to 10)  A la carte - we enjoyed it made a change.  Lunch from the pool bar was v.good - the ladies and chap that takes the orders are excellent very friendly and smiley. Funny how a smile can be contagious- the amount of people who don‚Äôt say thank you or engage with the staff made me feel really sad as they work so hard.  Cocktails during the day are watered down so we stuck with the stork beer which was good bless Omar on the pool bar having to deal some of the rowdy drunk loud Brits...yes unfortunately there was some Brits abroad behaviour going down... üôà  Evening cocktails were amazing the mojitos in the lobby bar were delicious and the bartenders were super and kept the drinks coming. Thanks guys ‚ù§Ô∏è    +Entertainment  We enjoyed the Latin show DJ and the band. To be honest it was better than I expected. I was so underwhelmed by the Sports Bar because there are so many reviews id liken to a man cave/youth club. I wouldn‚Äôt bother we went once for a late drink but it was just an odd place thank god for Ray ‚Äòthe Rolex‚Äô üòÇ and his Bose and tunes üï∫    Look my view is take it for what it is a 5 star in Morocco is never going to be a Dubai 5 star. The hotel has a gym spa etc so it‚Äôs based on the amenities. Could service be quicker? Yes.  Could the food in the restaurant be hotter yes!  Could there be more plastic cups? YES YES YES  Did any of this ruin a fantastic break? NO.  With the glorious weather it is an opportunity to spend quality time with your loved ones. Enjoy x
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Cerrileigh wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: Hotel was set out nice and very pretty. However food in buffet bar was average at best the A La Carte food gave us all food poisoning and flies around all drinks/snack bars.  A lot of staff are very unhelpful and very rude there is no where near enough staff to cover the amount of people in the hotel. We was waiting 25 minutes for a drink with our meal having to clear tables to sit down at and asking 3 times for knifes and forks to eat a meal with.  Rooms was nice and clean however our shower leaked every time we used it which flooded the whole bathroom floor and had to ring the maids to come and clean it up everyday.  The ATM in reception took the money out of our account but did not give us the cash. When we asked reception for help they said they knew about the problem as it had happened a few times before but did not give any guidance about how to get the money back or fix the problem.  Multiple tiles was missing from the bottom of the pool and pool area which made it uncomfortable to stand on and cutting my partners foot.  After all entertainment shut at around 10:30/11 every night the sports bar around the corner was supposed to be open while 1am the hotel manager asked everyone to leave every night at around 11:30/12pm meaning we was forced to go to our rooms at that time.  All the bars and food bars had flies around and the cups that you receive your drink/cocktail in was always really dirty.  The hotel is nice and okay for the price we paid for it however it is no where near a 5 star hotel.

Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: adrianHeswall_Wirral wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: As you can see from my profile I use TripAdvisor to allow people to find good hotels/restaurants/experiences. I'm not here to criticise for the sake of it and recognise that on any given day somebody can have a bad day so please understand that for me to write this review must reflect something seriously poor.    I have NEVER had such a shocking hotel experience in my life as I had here last week. It is difficult to know where to start but we were on an all-inclusive package. Check-in was early and a ¬£10 deposit was taken for pool towel card but we were not allowed into room until 4pm. Luckily we went off to play golf so it was not an issue for us.    Rooms were actually quite comfortable but the fridge was empty - no water soft drinks or snacks etc etc even though on an all-inclusive package and it was 38 degrees C outside!!!!    Dining was poor. Took ages for them to get a table of 8 together every night buffet food was poor quality lukewarm at times and little in the way of choice. The local (free) wine was paint stripper-like and vile. There were options to buy European wines but only with cash no credit cards and no room charging - how ridiculous.    Bar was understaffed so poor slow service. No wonder they were so rude and stressed. People waiting ages for drinks. Tonic flat ice from who knows where and the beer was room temperature (hot). Not enough glasses - even got told to find some glasses on vacated tables if I wanted the round of drinks that I ordered - what the hell was that all about?? No evidence of a proper steam cleaner for glasses commonly found in any European establishment.    Is it any wonder that half our group fell prey to the dreaded gastroenteritis!!!!!!!!    And the final coup de grace - be very careful during check out. Do NOT hand in your pool cards with the credit card used as a deposit when you check out. Do it earlier on a separate occasion and here is why. Once the front desk had my card I was then accused of stealing a Be Live tea mug as it was missing from my room. It was 5.45am in the morning and they claimed that somebody had already been in my room to do an inventory check. Why on earth would I steal a tea mug!!!!!!!!! Cost me ¬£5 to get my credit card back - a total scam amongst the check in and housekeeping staff.    DO NOT GO TO THIS HOTEL IT IS A DISGRACE. I look forward to hearing what the hotel manager has to say about it

Review_Text: Mohcine The most amazing Bahman friendly kind happy always very accommodating we will definitely come back here on holiday strongly recommend this venue the Bahman made it for us his personal service was 2nd to none what 10 out of 10b The most amazing Bahman friendly kind happy always very accommodating we will definitely come back here on holiday strongly recommend this venue the Bahman made it for us his personal service was 2nd to none what 10 out of 10

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: amefit247 wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: We have just spent a week here and had a very chilled time.    The hotel is small and clean with two pools - one with music and one without. We opted to relax by the quiet pool which also has a swim up bar.    We went to the gym most days - this was adequate. There is basic equipment CV equipment and free weights. It got very hot in there mostly because the air conditioning was never switched on and even when we'd turn it on the staff would leave the external door open which let in the heat. This made training hard work especially as the CV equipment is against the glass in the sun.    The food here was very good. I am vegetarian and there was a good selection of salads and vegetables as well as lots of morrocan cuisine. There was always lots of fresh fruit and the desert selection was great.    The service in the hotel was a little patchy. There were a number of people who we felt worked extra hard at looking after us; Omar at the pool bar Sara at the snack bar Ussama and El Bachim in the restaurant and Azdine was fantastic on table drinks service. We did feel that on occasion it would have helped if they'd had more staff on but generally speaking we were well looked after.    The room was very nice and kept clean however our tea coffee and water were very rarely topped up. Most days I had to go and find a cleaning trolley and help myself.    The hotel could be amazing we just felt that the areas outlined let the place down a little. That said I think that we would return for a chill winter sun break.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lucy3ee wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Title: A fabulous stay - realistic UK traveller review
Review_Text: I visited this hotel with my partner and we had a great holiday.  Arrival was smooth we booked private transfers from the airport and arrived within 30 mins. We were checked in but told our room would not be ready until 3pm. We were very tired so went back to the desk at around 2pm and asked if early check in to room was possible which the staff happily obliged to do.  Our room was perfect. We had an extremely quiet room facing away from the pool area in block 2 (room 2015). Our terrace was not overlooked and we were facing the sunrise every morning which meant that the room remained very cool as the sun went the other side of the hotel. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was very spacious and suitable for a couple. Be aware that if you book a superior room and you are travelling as friends there is a pane of glass that you can see straight through (even with the blind down) that goes from the bedroom to the bathroom this is fine for a couple but there is no bathroom privacy if you are sharing this room. However the toilet area is separate from this. The air conditioning in the room was amazing and a god send for the weather we were having (40-42degrees C everyday).  We had maid service everyday and tipped between 20-40MAD a day to our maid. Other people in the hotel explained that they were not tipping but this is a custom I like to dabble in as I know the standard of pay is not great for this type of job plus the room was cleaned immaculately as were all the surrounding areas in the hotel. There is a fridge in the room that has water in and you can pay for it to be a stocked mini bar although we did not do this. There is a lot of wardrobe space but not many hangers in the rooms. We had a seating area with a chair and table and was lovely for when having downtime in the room before dinner.  The grounds themselves are beautiful. The gardens are tended to and they are so well looked after. The pool areas are really lovely there is an animation pool and a more relaxing pool with the swim up bar. Our room was close to the one with the bar which we were grateful for as we aren‚Äôt the animation pool/music blaring/aqua aerobics type of couple but it was great for some. We enjoyed the pool area and the pool bar was great. The drinks aren‚Äôt very strong when served but if you ask for extra spirit in your drink the staff are happy to oblige. There are plenty of sun-beds for everyone but people got out early to put their towels on the bed of their choice so we did the same thing as we liked the double Balinese style beds with the table in the middle of them. Handy if you want to stay in the shade like I did because they are covered well.  There are plenty of options for food. Breakfast was plentiful and there was so much choice at every meal. But if you didn‚Äôt make breakfast before 10am you can eat late breakfast at the snack bar by the animation pool. This was limited but kept you going until lunch. The only problems with the food in the buffet restaurant was that it wasn‚Äôt always as hot as you‚Äôd like. The food was beautiful and I‚Äôm such a fan of the local cuisine in Morocco but there is choices for everyone even a fussy eater would find something here. We were in the a‚Äôla carte restaurant on one night and the food was all local cuisine. If you are a fussy eater you don‚Äôt want to go here. It‚Äôs included in your all inclusive stay but my advice would be to avoid if you don‚Äôt like the local cooking as you have a choice of 2 menus and they are rather similar in style but with different meat or fish on menu. I thought it was lovely but my other half was not full up by the limited amount on his plate and wanted to go to the buffet restaurant afterwards. The a‚Äôla carte restaurant was also uncomfortably hot to sit in the night we went they have air conditioning throughout the hotel but don‚Äôt always see fit to have it on. It made me feel like the experience in that restaurant was tainted by this but otherwise it was fab and the staff were so attentive. If you are peckish in the bars you can ask for nuts to nibble on with your drinks. There is no where to get food between 12pm-1pm which I found bizarre for all inclusive but wasn‚Äôt a problem.  The evening entertainment is not something I can comment on. I know some people have said it‚Äôs not great but I thought it was fine. It‚Äôs subtle and I guess some people are just after more when it comes to night time entertainment but we weren‚Äôt there for the entertainment so it didn‚Äôt bother us. If you like some big tacky show every night while you‚Äôre on holiday then this place probably isn‚Äôt for you. They had singers and keyboard playing and then a fire show one evening but if anything else was going on we were not made aware and we wouldn‚Äôt have gone anyway.  We considered going to the town to see the markets and hustle and bustle of Marrakesh but we didn‚Äôt go in the end. A lot of people were mentioning how they had gone and not enjoyed it due to the local ways and so we decided against it. However if you do want to get out of the hotel and see the local area the hotel run a shuttle bus to the town for free. You just book at reception for the time you want to go and then be picked up. We wanted crisps and little snacks for our room and the hotel shop did not sell what I wanted so we ventured out of the hotel once down the road to the little service station opposite the bmw garage (10 min walk). They had more selection of snacks at half the price of hotel shop. Remember there is a fridge in your room to keep chocolate or cans of drink in too so this was handy.  We visited the spa and had massages on two days but I will write a separate review for this as it was just so lovely.  Overall this was a lovely relaxing place to stay. Immaculately clean and the staff are very friendly and accommodating. We are already considering going back next year!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: globalconnexion wrote a review Oct 2019
Review_Text: The hotel:  The setting of the hotel is beautiful it's well landscaped and feels like a retreat oasis. The rooms are spacious clean and well-appointed those facing away from the pools are quieter with adequate facilities provided in all the rooms. One of the two pools attracted a younger crowd with loud music and other activities going on. The other pool was quiet and relaxing and it was usually easy to get a sunbed. Glad we didn't go for a swim-up room as you couldn't swim up to it you could paddle at the most. They also lacked privacy as you could easily encroach onto the outside space of the neighbouring room with no screening provided in some cases so you could just be sitting out in the open with your neighbour by your side. Balcony rooms were more private.    Entertainment:  The evening entertainment was fine different acts on each night the karaoke nights are best avoided. There was a very good band who played on a couple of nights the lead singer was particularly impressive. The acts are on weekly so if you're there more than a week you‚Äôll see the same acts twice.    Food/restaurants:  The food wasn't great it lacked variety and for a country with many spices the taste was pretty bland. If you like seafood it might be better to stick to that the meat variety was poor desserts were just okay. The √† la carte restaurant is best avoided as food quality was worse than the buffet restaurant many people including ourselves left before completing the 3 courses.    Staff:  Restaurant staff were very inattentive in general you could be sitting for a while before they even notice you they took forever to clear the tables and you could die of thirst before they bring you any drinks. The restaurant managers walked around uninterestingly whilst you wait for the staff attention or sat at a dirty table waiting for them to clear so that you can eat something. A couple of nights the drinks came so late after we‚Äôve eaten and when we tried taking them with us to the lobby bar we were stopped.    Reception spa and bar staff were more attentive reception staff were friendlier but a special mention to Azdine from the Lobby Bar who exceptionally stood out since he worked very hard getting everyone's drink all night and was very responsive not to mention having to remember long lists of drinks.    Clientele:  The clientele is not your average 5-star holidaymakers it seems to attract a broad range people including those you might expect to see in places like Benidorm. There was a particular incident with a group of rowdy people who for a couple days were very loud at one of the pools and caused other people to be upset. One of those rowdy people actually jumped over the bar to serve himself as he thought they weren't being served quick enough but they were drinking quicker than the bar man could keep up. The group also included two older women who insisted on being topless at the pool all day and tried to draw attention to themselves all the time by being loud and uncouth. They went a bit quiet afterwards so it can only be expected that they were warned. Some people were even smoking in the restaurant including a couple sitting very close to us who decided to both light up after having had their dinner which we found bizarre as they were Europeans and indoor smoking is banned in virtual every EU country. They were never asked to stop by the staff.    Marrakesh:  The city is not very tourist friendly but there are pockets of decent tourist attractions it is fairly dirty in the souks and other markets. Locals in the city are generally unfriendly unless they can get some money out of you you even have to ask for permission to take photos which you will be expected to pay for. A shopkeeper virtually abused us for taking photos of the outside of his shop shouting that we need his permission. It was a foolish move as we were actually going to buy from the shop so it put us off.    There is a place called the artisanal market which sells really good quality things you should go there for shopping as prices are fixed and very reasonable. You are likely to be ripped-off elsewhere as we were. We bought an item from the souk which we saw at the artisanal market for less than half the price we paid and this was even after haggling it down. A lot of places in the town don‚Äôt serve alcohol crossing the busy streets can be a challenge there's motorcycles everywhere even on narrow streets in the souks. We enjoyed a very nice camel ride with a nice bunch of locals including having traditional mint tea and cakes in a tent.    To sum it up we don‚Äôt regret the holiday and it was fine for what it was but we will certainly not go back to Marrakesh.
