Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: pep_freit wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Title: Better than the pictures do justice
Review_Text: When you look at any hotel the pictures usually sell it beyond the reality. If anything Be Live undersells itself.    I‚Äôve stayed at a lot of all inclusive hotels and even the most well known and most expensive often leave something to be desired. I see them for what they are: a chance to relax by a pool have a constant stream of alcohol and the food to be ‚Äògood enough.‚Äô    Be Live was all the above and more. The resort was extremely quiet - I‚Äôd say maybe 10 or so people poolside each day. There was an extensive list of drinks including cocktails and the food was great!    The staff are everything you‚Äôd hope for. Friendly polite willing to go above and beyond but most importantly not too invasive. Salim Fati Karim Titif are all great advocates of the resort but the real superstar is the king of the poolside Simo. He totally embodies the resort and what it‚Äôs about and really does make everyone there feel as if they‚Äôre the most important person staying there.    I‚Äôve recommended the place to everyone I‚Äôve spoken to and two separate people and their partners have already booked up. Genuinely can‚Äôt recommend more and would happily return again in the future.    Thanks to everyone at Be Live!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Craig D wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: Hotel: The hotel and ground very clean. Peaceful and relaxing. Modern with a Moroccan feel.    Hotel Staff: wow they where amazing helped out massively. My wife got bee sting that sweeled up  they called the nurse and doctor and they just could do any more if they wanted. Speak fluent English.    Entrainment Staff: Loved the entertainment playing most activities every day. Some of the activities are archery aqua fit mini golf darts spinning and Zumba etc. These staff are so friendly gets you up a joining in with all the activities. They just need arrows for the archery.    Bar and Restaurant Staff:  Always friendly and always have a smile on there face. Never let a glass get empty. Fast a serving. Restaurant staff always happy and so professional.    Overal amazing hotel would recommend it anyone and definitely comeback had a great time thanks to all the staff at the be live :)
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: LoveTravel154277 wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: Could not fault anything about this hotel the staff were great and food also and the cleanliness of the hotel was superb. The entertainment was good every night and we also enjoyed the daytime activities too.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Quest48597584141 wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: General facilities were good. Food was always good quality and with great choice. All of the staff were friendly and helpful. Activities available for those that wanted them. Free shuttle is an excellent service. Spa and gym facilities are excellent. Definitely recommend this for anyone wanting an adult only holiday.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Wevene wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: Travelled with a female friend for some much deserved R&R and that‚Äôs what we got.  On arrival we had been reserved a double bed but was changed within half an hour to individual beds.  We had a fantastic spacious and spotlessly clean room.  Working in the industry we both expect high standards in both food and service and I have to honestly say it was fantastic.  Every member of staff was polite professional helpful and always friendly.  We always felt safe.  Best wine at any all inclusive hot plates for food excellent selection and great shuttle bus service.  Simo fantastic entertainer and even managed to get us up to do aquarobics and yoga for 3 days. Some good evening entertainment too.  Watched how some people treated the staff quite rudely and with little respect during busy times.  They are all fantastic staff work very hard so please be nice to them and acknowledge their service with a little gratuity throughout your stay.  It‚Äôs nice to be nice.  Would recommended listing ingredients in sauces/dips foods etc and an allergens list would be good. Cocktails could be improved and a price list /menu for the Soa in each room would be helpful. Didn‚Äôt use the spa as we didn‚Äôt feel it was being passionately sold to us. Just saying. Will definitely be back.  Well done -we loved it.‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lauren Walker wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: Loved this hotel: food lovely (loved the Moroccan style tagines) staff and management brilliant spa is great cocktails great pool is great!    Make sure to get yourself a swim up room as they are fantastic!    The only thing it lacked was no tea and coffee in the room or an ironing board but no big deal!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: MCHigh wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: Brilliant holiday for relaxation and also entertainment provided by the Animation team throughout the day and evenings. Very accommodating staff and all friendly; no issues to go out of their way to make you feel welcome.    Plenty of activities are available throughout the day should you wish to participate; a great way to meet people. Simo Salim Karim Titif Fati are all there to get you involved in many games and activities that range from aqua areobics to golf to archery to even beer pong!    The rooms are all clean and the resort is spotless. Well maintained and cleaned every day. Myself and my partner would often sleep in and go for a late breakfast; we would leave the do not disturb on the door handle until we left for the pool. Unlike other hotels this did not disturb the maids from returning after we left to clean the room make the bed and provide fresh towels. It was very nice how they work around you and your schedule.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jessica wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: We had a fantastic time at Be Live Collection. Can not find a single fault with this place. The rooms are beautiful and cleaned everyday with fresh towels. You get fresh pool towels everyday so you don‚Äôt need to bring your own. The food is great as you‚Äôve got a choice of snack bar for fast food type or restaurant for your normal food and there‚Äôs plenty of choice!  The animation team made it for us they get you involved in all sorts of games and activities such as archery darts mini golf aqua aerobics Zumba yoga beer pong cha cha dancing table tennis and you end up making new friends which is great fun. Simo Karim Salim Titif Fati - all great guys from the animation team that make you feel welcome and their aim is to make your day fun and they do succeed!  Whilst I was there I booked to come back in November with my friends and I can‚Äôt wait to come back!  100% recommend üòÜ
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Gillian P wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: This hotel was exactly as it was described. A taxi ride out of the city in a quiet area. The pool and surroundings were lovely plenty of sun beds and heated pool. The room was spacious with everything you need. The hotel was spotless and constantly being cleaned. The staff were very friendly and helpful. My only small criticism was the buffet style food can get repetitious but there was plenty to eat and drink.  Overall good value for money.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sakina H wrote a review Feb 2019
Review_Text: This hotel is lovely I stayed here for a week which was a nice break. This hotel is more 4 star than 5 but has a lot of potential. This hotel has mostly pros but a few cons too.    The staff at this hotel are very hardworking they constantly on the go and always very polite. The waiter/ waitress at the snack bar were really friendly and polite the waiters at the buffet restaurant were really good too. and the guy at the lobby bar was really attentive would always get you another drink when running low his service was impeccable.    The food at the hotel is ok the snack bar was nice and the buffet restaurant was edible and had an array to choose from. I went to the A la Carte restaurant the food wasn‚Äôt nice the service by waiters was great but food just hard and greasy and doesn‚Äôt reflect Moroccan cuisine or represent the hotel well.    The spa was pricey but really nice I got the 600 dirham deal which was fantastic well worth it the money I spent. The receptionist-lady at the spa was very nice too.    Entertainment was vast too during the day there is aqua aerobics archery football and yoga and spinning at the gym. At night the entertainment doesn‚Äôt begin until 10pm I think they could do this a little earlier.    The bedrooms are nice and clean and spacious the bathroom is lovely but not really sure about the window unless you are a couple you have no privacy. The sewage system does smell at times but closing the door helped.    There is a safe in the bedroom I advice people to use this you get a letter before about this and about the hotel. I forgot and left some money in my bag and once returning from a day trip realised it was gone. Obviously reading the letter It was in my entirely own discretion.  There is a mini fridge with only water in. It would be good if there was snacks and other drinks in as you cant get food after 10pm.    This hotel would also benefit room service with an additional charge if need be as times for food are a little mundane.    There is 3 pools at this hotel one at the spa but you have to pay and 2 outdoor. The heated outdoor is were there is music and entertainment and the other pool has a swim up pool but really cold this would be ok in the summer but if it was heated would have a lot more appeal.    To go into town there is a shuttle bus I used this twice which saved on money.    Overall this hotel is lovely and peaceful a little out the way but the shuttle is acceptable.  I would definitely return if I went to Marrakech again.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mrt9000 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title:
BE LIVE COLLECTION MARRAKECH
GREETZ FROM BELGIUM
Review_Text: Very nice and clean hotel!    The foodddd üòçüòçüòç    Very friendly peoples    The Animation Team ( karim simo and miss fati) you were excellent guys!    We really enjoyed our stayüëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèªüëåüèª    I hope to see you back soon!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: CeEmDee wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: There is so much potential going on for this hotel but I have categorised the various aspects and given each our star rating and divided and the median came out as average. Which is a shame.    The building and the setting: the hotel is beautiful and the grounds equally so. Georaphically this is not the place to go out for an evening stroll after dinner; it is quite isolated. The courtesy buses to and from the city centre during the day are useful. Our room overlooked the pool and we did get a bit fed up of the constant music play over the speakers by the guy in charge of the pool activities. Fine when poll exercise classes take place not so for the hours inbetween.    Reception Staff: all I would wish for: pleasant and helpful    Room and Service: room was lovely and well serviced each day. Although towels still get changed everyday regardless of whether you chose the environmentally friendly option of not putting them in the tub. A BIG ISSUE with the room and we found from others they had the same issue in the morning there is an unpleasant sewerage smell in the room possibly down to when the toilets are being used to maximum. Another point we came into the room late one morning and the smell had changed to on of mayonnaise: still trying to work that one out !    Staff: Inconsistant attitudes. One day pleasant; the next not so. Two members of staff stood out as consistantly wonderful: a young lady in the snack bar area by the pool. We won't give her name as we didn't ask if we could and she didn't ask us to. The other is Hammesh. He served us many times in the evening buffet and asked us to mention him in any review.    Food: often not very tasty usually only warm. Overall we did not enjoy the food very much. The scrambled eggs are to be avoided and the coffee is so poor that I had tea in the morning and one of them one morning had been made with cold water.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Maria P wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: We have just returned from our visit to Marrakech and it was incredible.  The rooms are beautiful and immaculately cleaned by staff every day. You will not be disappointed and if you need anything extra reception will go out of their way to accommodate you Maria at reception stood out for us as she was always ready to help and had such a lovely cheerful personality.  The restaurants and food were beautiful service was amazing a choice of delicious foods were always available and your glass was always filled it was my partners birthday and we were treated to a beautiful cake which was delivered by staff who sang and danced traditional birthday wishes.. it was fantastic!!  Mourad Hussain and El Bachir gave excellent service at the restaurant as did all the staff.. please don't forget to tip it makes such a difference and shows your appreciation of the massive effort that often goes above and beyond the job descriptions of the staff.  Lots to do fantastic entertainment a truly excellent service and a beautiful hotel in stunning Marrakech!! What more could you want... we will be back!!  Thankyou to all of the staff Maria & Terry (room 2005) xx
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Salma K wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Lovely hotel which is kept spotless at all times. The rooms are just right - we had 2 bathroom sinks a bath and a separate shower cubicle.    Food is lovely with plenty of variety.    Mohammed the baggage handler and Sidi Ba were extremely helpful and willing to do whatever it takes to make sure you are happy.    What I would suggest to management is to have some heating arrangement in the reception area - we went in December when mornings and evenings are cold. Some days we wanted to sit at reception area etc but it was too chilly.    Also the bar opposite the restaurant is too loud in the evenings! Also you should not have to go the bar for a hot drink especially if you don't drink alcohol etc - its a bit awkward to get a hot drink from the bar when entertainment and alcoholic drinks are going on.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Explorer27727790050 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Our experience at the hotel was amazing the staff facilities and cleanliness was 100 %. The food was great with lots of choice and the entertainment was very entertaining. 5 stars. The only minor negative is the location which is on the outskirts of Marrakech with nowhere to wander and apporx 30 mins by car to the centre but there is a free shuttle bus from the hotel.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sarah B wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Came away for some winter sunshine and it didn‚Äôt disappoint! It‚Äôs a really Beautiful hotel and kept impeccably clean. Every member of staff I encountered were friendly and amenable.  Being out of season I wasn‚Äôt expecting the entertainment to be quite as good. A special mention to Karim and Samo. They gave a good level of encouragement and entertainment throughout the day.  Food was lovely. It was varied enough over the 5 days. Quite a typical buffet. A good selection of traditional foods and the Salads were always very fresh. The Snack bar was good. It served great chips! It was a shame they didn‚Äôt do them at the evening buffet. But always nice and always lots of choice.  The rooms were beautiful. The glass window between the bathroom and bedroom was cute but the blind could do with not being see through!!!!  All in all we got a great deal to come here for 5 days and it was brilliant! Would definitely come back!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: kateJessicaWinwood wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: We ended up coming away last minute as there was such a good deal and we‚Äôve had a brilliant time. The hotel is amazingly clean everyone is very friendly and welcoming with the added bonus of being adults only - which is fantastic!  We had a few issues with our room to begin with but these were sorted by hotel staff and our Thomas cook rep immediately. My husband has thoroughly enjoyed all of the activities run each day by the entertainment team he‚Äôs absolutely loved learning archery and can‚Äôt sing their praises enough. They do a fantastic job all day with lots of things for everyone to join in with or just to simply relax and observe.  My highlight of the trip has by far been the restaurant/catering staff - I have allergies and they have gone out of their way every single meal time to talk me through all the buffet options and have gone above and beyond creating me some of my very own puddings twice a day! Blown away by your effort thank you so much!  Definitely a place to visit if you want an awesome holiday!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Claire K wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: I went with my friends on a 5 day break and we had a fabulous time. The hotel is amazing so clean with great food and the staff can't do enough to you. The animation team are brilliant especially Simo and Karim who were fantastic and really got us involved in the activities. Simo taught me archery and I got a bullseye after 3 attempts! üòÅüòÅüòÅ  I couldn't recommend this place enough. We're definatley going back!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Gery V wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Great value and perfect for a golf getaway
Review_Text: Wonderful staff throughout the property excellent food ( the buffet had enough variety and changes to keep us busy for 1 week ) - rooms also very nice !  But the people are what make any place extra - and the dining room staff worked hard was efficient and so was reception crew etc - I'D RETURN ANY DAY - our group had a great time
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Charlotte H wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: This review is an honest review no grudges.    The hotel was very clean and tidy modern and well laid out. Not a huge hotel so not a lot going on in the evenings during the day etc. The drinks where terrible. Very cheap local booze and cocktails were rubbish all served in dirty plastic glasses and tasted different every time you ordered one. Very tight on water etc and no drinks were allowed to be taken to your rooms. Staff unpleasant and not friendly my partner got told he wasn‚Äôt allowed anymore alcohol because he accidentally broke a wine glass at dinner. The food was terrible everything tastes rank and seems all over the place. No ‚Äòthemes‚Äô if you like. And don‚Äôt even bother trying the waited restaurant. We walked out after first course just terrible terrible food. We also played quiet music on my small speaker by the pool bar and was told to be quiet and turn it off despite everyone enjoying it. Lots of sunbeds 'reserved' with towels first thing in the morning but no one returning to the bed all day long! Spa was lovely to walk around but hugely overpriced.    Wouldn‚Äôt ever stay at that hotel again. We would look to stay at a Riu one next time we go. We absolutely loved the Marrakesh nightlife it was the best I‚Äôve ever experienced in the Hivernage district. Hotel got us a taxi guy called Hakim and he took us about each night into the city to get away from the terrible entertainment and booze the hotel provides.    If you're expecting a typical 5 star that you would find in say Turkey or Tunisia it is of that standard hotel itself was pretty and clean but everything else was disappointing. I recently went to a 5 star all inclusive in the Caribbean and the difference is astonishing if this is what you are used to then you'd rate this hotel probably 3 stars at most.    I will 100% be returning to Marrakech just not this hotel.    Lots of teething problems with a new hotel and just not very good.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Rob Gower wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Lovely hotel spotlessly clean great food and genuinely friendly helpful staff.  We did have cause to ask for a room change as the air con unit for our block was over our room and made a terrible noise constantly. I went to reception to enquire. Someone came to listen in minutes and we were moved immediately to a very quiet room. The staff were brilliant and could not do enough to help. (avoid room 2112).  The other problem for us was that the hotel is miles out of town with nowhere to walk as we and others like to do especially after our evening meal.  That said we had a super holiday a this hotel and would highly recommend.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Natalie Savera wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: So I stayed at this hotel last week and honestly after reading some of the reviews I was so close to changing - I am glad I didn't.    Room:    The hotel rooms are huge spacious (I had two double beds in mine) and most importantly CLEAN! The cleaner comes everyday and change bed sheets etc. The rooms include a mini fridge two huge built in wardrobe flat screen TV and a nice spacious balcony. My bathroom had a shower and bath tub and extra room for the toilet. The power shower was amazing was the water was hot!    My only negatives about the room is that bath did not have a stopper so you actually cannot have a bath (which in my opinion is a bit pointless). Also I agree with the comment about having a kettle in the room sometimes I fancied a cup of tea but had to wait during the designated food hours.    Staff:    The staff were friendly and absolutely amazing and helpful. From the moment I checked in till the moment I left I really was pleased with the service. I fell Ill during this trip (flu) so when I asked the restaurant manager if he could get me some Garlic and water he catered to me without any problems. All of the restaurant staff were nice helpful and efficient. The food was also really good.    The Spa    After reading the reviews I was a bit hesitant about visiting the spa. However as I had the flu I was desperate to use the sauna. The Spa its self was incredible! The ambiance again to the service it was actually my highlight of the trip.    The spa manager offered me 1 hour to use the Sauna and pool for 200dirham. I opted for the cheapest deal which included the sauna a hammack bath and 15 mins by the pool (served with tea) and a 30 minutes massage for 600 dirham!    I did at first think the prices were a bit steep but after converting the price into pounds I was pretty impressed with what you actually get. I was there for just over an hour and felt much better after my treatment. I would definitely recommend anybody who wants to use the spa.    All in all I would most likely come back to this hotel I have been to Marrakech before so I am pretty confident you will not find a better hotel (at the price). I have recommended this hotel to so many people now and I have been back a week!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: lorrainet26 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Our recent stay at the Be Live Collection Adults Only.  We had read a lot of reviews before going to this hotel and some not very good.  But we have to say that our stay was very pleasant indeed.    The hotel is very clean and the rooms are spacious and all with a little private balcony. The rooms are all very well equipped with bath with a overhead shower also has a separate walk in shower 2 hand washbasins and a toilet with its own door.  Very comfortable bed with extra comfy pillows. Fridge and loads of wardrobe space. Free safe facility in the room. And free wifi throughtout the hotel.  The hotel grounds our maintain to a high standard everyday there are gardeners working away. And always cleaners on site and they also are always beavering away all day and always on hand at night.    The bars restaurants and entertainment were all very welcoming and the staff was even more welcoming and because one person in my party was less abled and used a mobility scooter they could not do enough for her and the hotel was also scooter friendly. Karim was always ready to keep us entertained whether it is Aqua Aerobics Arabic lesson or with his wonderful magic tricks even down to the dancing we did thank you Karim for helping to make our holiday.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Craig Wilson wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: We recently visited this Hotel for a bit of winter sun. We had two rooms in Block 1 and 2 for my parents and for my wife and I.    The rooms where spotless and very well maintained along with the grounds of the hotel I would possibly go out and say these where the cleanest rooms and grounds we have seen in the years of holidaying. We both had a swim up room which I would say are ideal for the summer months however in January the pool is so cold its unusable I slightly feel this room was wrongly sold to us as its not connected to the main pool and is unusable. The one time I stood in the swim up room I just about fell as the tiles were very slippy under the water not sure if these had not been cleaned as the pool was unusable. We spent two days at our room terrace and didn‚Äôt see anyone clean these areas.    There is a single pool which is heated however this is still a shock to the system at this time of year however as you acclimatize its much nicer we felt the pool at its best first thing in the morning when the cover was pulled off. Again the swimming pool area was very clean and well looked after the staff around the pool where excellent and very attentive with activities such as Yoga Archery water fitness and so on. We spent most of our time at the swimming pool getting as much sun as we possibly could. I would like to mention Karim Keera who was part of the entertainment team we loved speaking to him and my wife was amazed by his magic tricks I would say this is one of the main points that made our holiday.    The bar at night always had entertainment on and was always packed out some nights we unfortunately struggled to get seats I would suggest a larger bar area especially with there being no local areas close to walk to. Again there was a young man working in the bar that served us very well and was always very helpful. Unfortunately I didn‚Äôt catch his name however he had braces and always had a massive smile.    There was a good mix of local and home cooked foods so most days the selection suited everyone and if that didn‚Äôt suit there was the outside snack bar which served food most of the day.    We hired the electric bikes on site just for an hour and went for a look about I would highly recommend this as the area the hotel is in is very vast.    I would say the hotel lived to my expectations and in most cases exceed them however there was a couple of small faults that could be corrected by the travel agents.    The one massive disappointment was down to a small group of people holidaying at the same time They seemed to drink as much as they could all day and all night and make idiots of themselves on their last night one of them was sick in the bar/reception area which was cleaned quickly however I informed the reception staff of the mess they left in the bathrooms twice before it was cleaned up. After this the person who was sick returned to the bar and continues to drink with the star rating and the expectations of the hotel I would have expected the hotel to refuse any more drink to this individual.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Denise H wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Hope I nice but far from anywhere. You have to use the hotel shuttle bus if you want to go to the center. On 2 occasions we took the bus and it broke down so we were stranded for at least 1 hour. Food is not all that good and drinks is the cheap alcohol.  Stuff. Spa was not open when divertissement and the food was limited by the pool. They treated people like children even though it was an Adult Only Hotel. Reception staff was very rude and also some of the bar staff. Restaurant staff were ok. In all not a pleasant hotel to stay and definitely not a 5 star hotel more like a 2.5 star
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: mazreb wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Place was very clean and staff were very good. Good rooms good food. The hotel did its best to help you have a good holiday. Will be going again. The only thing is that if you go in winter take some winter clothes as it is freezing till 11-30 am and then when the sun goes down at 6pm. In between you can sunbathe
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Riziki X wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: I came to Morocco for my birthday I couldn‚Äôt have chosen a better place to stay. Belive hotel was the best experience full of wonderful staff respectful friendly and very entertaining.( Titif Karim fati salim sim )  And also mohcine from lobby bar hafid made me the best cocktails too.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Leah wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: My partner and I have just returned from our stay at Be Live Collection and could not be happier with the service we received during our holiday. One thing I have learnt is that a tip goes a long way!    After reading some of the reviews we were worried as to what to expect with the hotel however after our stay cannot fault the hotel nor its staff in any way. The staff were always friendly and would always go the extra mile for their guests. The entertainment team were amazing and always ensured that something was happening (day and night) so we were never bored. Two members of staff which stood out to us were Karim and Titif who never had too little time for us.    Both me and my partner are Vegetarian and we never had any issues with the food in the buffet restaurant and there was always a wide spread of food throughout the day in both the snack bar and restaurant. The restaurant staff were always accommodating to our requests and made sure that every guest was happy with the food and service received. The only complaint with the food is that it was sometimes a little bland but never tasteless. We always had our drinks topped up and were never waiting for staff to remove plates etc as staff were always on top of things. We were served by Oussama throughout the week who was one of the best servers I have met.    The hotel was ALWAYS clean throughout and bedrooms were cleaned daily to a high standard. Our bedroom was spacious and comfortable we had heating/air con a safe which was free to use plenty of storage including hanging space a private garden/balcony area and a mini fridge which was empty on arrival but could be filled at an additional cost. The bathroom was large and again always clean there was a window (with a blind) looking into the bedroom and a separate room with a toilet. There was a slight drainage smell coming from the toilet so would recommend keeping the door closed at all times.    The facilities in the hotel were wonderful with two large outdoor pools (one heated and the other with a swim up bar) activities going on throughout the day ping pong tables beautiful gardens photographers and bars serving food & drink throughout the day. As well as the entertainment in the hotel we were also a short drive from the centre of Marrakech with the free bus service or taxis which were always available.    I would recommend this hotel to everybody and we are looking forward to returning in the near future.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: cameronw409 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Myself and my partner stayed here 6th-13th January this year. After reading some of the reviews we were both a bit worried about what to expect. However my advice to anyone is to ignore the bad reviews as the hotel was amazing!    Every single staff member in the hotel was pleasant and couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. A bit of advice is that tips go a long way anywhere in Marrakech especially in the hotel. Our holiday was made special by 2 staff members in particular. They were Karim who is part of the entertainment team and Oussama who is a waiter in the buffet restaurant. Those 2 staff members were the highlight of my holiday and are a credit to the hotel. Karim always made sure we were not bored and had something to do such as archery yoga table tennis and he even showed us a few magic tricks and taught us how to do them. Oussama always made us feel welcome in the restaurant and wanted our experience to be a great one. He made sure our drinks were always topped up and ensured everything was always good.    The rooms themselves are spacious and clean with plenty of space for storage. You have a mini fridge to keep drinks cool but will be empty on arrival but can be filled for an additional cost. The bathroom was amazing however I would advise you to keep the toilet door closed all the time as the drainage system isn‚Äôt perfect and smells often came through to the room. However I‚Äôve been to many hotels and it‚Äôs quite a common issue so nothing too bad for me. Another comment about the rooms would be that an iron isn‚Äôt inside the rooms. I believe you can borrow one from reception but I think having your own in your room would be handy. All in all though the rooms were excellent and cleaned daily to a very high standard.    The food in the buffet restaurant was great! Myself and my partner are both vegetarian and there was plenty on offer for us to enjoy. The food was always warm and tasted good. I heard a few comments from guests saying the food was bland and to a degree I agree with this however I wouldn‚Äôt say the food was tasteless.  There is a tagine area a grill station a pizza and pasta station and much more other choices.  The food at the snack bar outside was also very good and the staff who worked in there were also great.    Myself and my partner will definitely be coming back in the near future as we had an amazing time! Don‚Äôt be put off by bad reviews.    See you again soon!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Amy R wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Lovely modern hotel with a Moroccan twist. Very clean and stylish. The food and drink options were great. You will not go hungry. The staff were the highlight of the stay. Very friendly and helpful making you feel relaxed and comfortable. At one point I lost my handbag with phone and it was already at reception before I noticed it was gone. Fantastic service.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Cerifero wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Lovely atmosphere in mid-January. Not too busy but with nice rooms facilities and a stunning view of the Atlas mountains. Staggered but consistent buses run into Marrakech and a few events run throughout the day(such as archery and basic Arabic lessons).  Would recommend to anyone as a relaxing break with the opportunity to head into the hectic world of central Marrakech.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lolpool33 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Arrived around 8pm on 1st Jan first impressions were that the hotel looked stunning. We went and ate at the buffet which was lovely too. Lobby bar a little bit daunting at first probably as it‚Äôs size as it is a small bar and needs more tables and chairs. There is a big room on the first floor that the hotel is missing a trick with! Could be turned into a bigger bar with proper entertainment and room to dance if you want to or sit and have a quiet drink.  There is a sports bar brilliant I thought but it opens at 10pm each evening! Again such a missed opportunity! You could play pool in the day if if the bar was open. And needs more than one pool table!  Simo and Kamir ran pool entertainment throughout the day what assets to the hotel! Great guys!  Evening entertainment was also good but would have been much better in the bigger room with a bigger bar.  Spa another shame as it was ridiculously expensive! No real deals and no movement on the prices such a shame as we would have used all of the spa facilities had they been better priced.  Food was lovely albeit very much repeated. My husband is a celiac and the hotel didn‚Äôt really understand or cater for him so he had to be extremely careful with what he chose to eat. Mourad in the restaurant was a lovely guy too always smiling. The hotel needs to brush up on allergies and cater for these with clear signage where food contains wheat and gluten!  I do hope the hotel management take the comments on board as we do intend to revisit next year. It would be be good to hear their plans to take on the constructive advice.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: BoardingPass572292 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Not a 5 star more like 3 star Butlins hotel package
Review_Text: Food not great same food everyday. Bathrooms smell had to change rooms twice. Staff are okay however some are rude . No room service and you‚Äôre not allowed to bring any food or drink to your room. Cocktail are cheap could be better like the food.Entertainment was only good on Thursday night with black male singer with his band the rest was poor. Not going back again basically:)
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mike1766 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: We travelled to this hotel as recommended by your golf travel. Firstly there is no golf on site so you need to travel to and from the various courses nearby.    The hotel accommodation is certainly comfortable but I would not say the hotel is 5 *. The food is plentiful and lots of choice available and should cover off most tastes. The staff are very helpful indeed so all in all the stay was pleasant enough.    The biggest issue they have is that the pools are freezing cold!!! Why have a swim up bar in the main pool when no one can use it due to it being Baltic... heat the pool the clientele will use the pool more people will enjoy the surroundings more relax and you will see more interaction between guests.    Overall a good stay but would go elsewhere if revisiting Marrakesh for golf.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Nmh wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Lovely adults only hotel in Marrakech
Review_Text: I stayed here with my best friend in the summer and thoroughly enjoyed our holiday. The hotel is gorgeous and since it is so newly opened the whole place felt very clean and modern.  They have a lovely spa underground with the gym which we visited twice and would highly recommend. The hamman at the beginning of your stay is ideal if you want your tan to last longer!  Lovely swim up bar in the smaller pool (great selection of drinks - I‚Äôd recommend sticking to the San Miguel as opposed to the sickly cocktails simply because of the wasps!) where we spent most of our time. This pool is much quieter and more peaceful whereas the larger rectangular pool is noisier and has daytime activities. Great food at all the dining options and an easy shuttle into Marrakech city to explore in the daytime or evening.  Would recommend this hotel to friends and couples looking for a sunny relaxing break.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Camper692634 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: We decided to go on a couples break for 4 nights. Overall experience was five out of five. It was 22¬∞ every day. If you go on in January or the winter months take a jacket for the evening because temperature drops around 12¬∞ and can be a little bit chilly. The rooms are big and spacious and always kept incredibly clean. The staff are so helpful and polite. The restaurant food is nice different choices on a daily basis. The poolside lunch menu as well is also very good. However the √† la cart restaurant not great. We use the spa facilities over a course of two days as a package it was amazing 4.5hours of total relaxation! The hotel is peaceful and is on the outskirts away from the hustle and bustle. The hotel offer a free shuttle bus service runs on the hour takes about 15 minutes to get into the centre definitely worth it. We went for total relaxation after the Christmas period and it absolutely delivered it. Would definitely recommend.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jelle wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Just relaxing in Be Live Hotels!
Review_Text: On the 31 of December we‚Äôve arrived just in time for the New Years Eve Diner! The waiter of the table Yassin was very good! He gives you the attention when it was needed. Thank you for the first good impression of the service Yassin!    We have a lot time spent on the pool! Just relaxing en have some talk with Simo of Salim! Of play the games with the other great team members; Fati Karim Titif and Ibrahim!    We loved the food of the snack bar. It was very good en also the service is very friendly.    Now we get the last sun tan before we leave. Thank you Be Live Hotels for the great New Year‚Äôs Eve and the good services!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Departure41489008753 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Nice resort with some difficulties of beginning
Review_Text: Our room itself was very beautiful stylish and clean but it had a very bad smell ( drainage canalization). The food at the buffet was good with a lot of variations. The stuff was very kind and helpfull. The dinner at the arabic restaurant was desastrous the main course was a tajine with nothing else than beef meat ( no vegetables no couscous...). Never seen that before. The timescedule of the shuttlebus to the citycenter should be improved ( no shuttle in the late moorning and afternoon) oneway taxitrip at least 150Dh. We have spend a nice holiday in this resort and we will come back expecting that the difficulties of the beginning will have been improved.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: A Tripadvisor Member wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Overall it is a nice hotel and the staff are very nice specially our trainer who was an entertainer too. The rooms are great. Food was ok. But there is no food after certain hours even though it is all inclusive.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kishor Negandhi wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Excellent time at Be Live Hotel
Review_Text: i went with my full family in this all inclusive resort and had a great time. From morning until evening we were kept busy with swimming volleyball darts table tennis archery etc. with plenty of food and drinks and daily evening events. Simo Salim Fati Karim IbrahimTitif were few names i cannot forget as they were always around to help during our week long stay. The best part of the hotel was that though we checked out at 12noon on the final day they allowed us to use all facilities including unlimited food and drink until we left the hotel around 6pm. This shows that the management is not after money but customer satisfaction. Well done. 9 out 10.  The only suggestion i would offer to the hotel is if they could have heated swimming pool it would help during cold period.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Patrycja wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Title: Honest review of our New Year stay
Review_Text: My husband and I just came back from a 5 days break at the hotel. The hotel is located 30 mins by taxi from the airport in the Palmeraie district.    We arrived at 3pm there were a few couples checking in at the same time. Check in was long we were told to sit down fill in our details then we paid for our room and a security deposit (you can pay by card no need for local currency). Those simple three things took 30 mins as the person helping us kept answering phone calls from the rooms.    No one gave us a tour of the hotel or facilities and we weren‚Äôt told of activities until we discovered a plan by the entertainment booth by the pool.    The room was very nice comfortable king size bed plenty of room for storage and to hung our clothes. The bathroom was also specious and modern. There were very few amenities provided; shampoo conditioner and soap but no shower gel or cotton buds which I consider a bare minimum at a hotel which claims to be 5 star.    The hotel has two swimming pools a party one heated pool with music playing and entertainment team organising activities for the guests and a quiet one where the water is outside temperature. Both of the pools have bars but the quiet one doesn‚Äôt have a food service. Towels can also be only picked up from the party one so it‚Äôs a bit of a walk each time if you prefer a relaxing atmosphere of the quiet pool.    Food was a highlight for me. All meals had a good selection of dishes and were very tasty. There was always a bread station egg station pancakes Moroccan food station  salads fresh juices fruit and sweet breads for dinners tagines (three types) barbecue meat and fish station as well as pizza and pasta.  What was very disappointing was the quality of alcohol no known brands at all very cheap and tasteless. I didn‚Äôt like anything I tried.    We spent the New Year eve at the hotel which organised a Gala Dinner. It was a drinks reception (Same cheap alcohol as every day) with canap√©s four course meal such as lobster soup beef medallion and a white chocolate dessert. The party was very boring to start with and Samba performance of poor quality but then the hotel brought our great Brazilian drummers and dj and some of the accessories for us to get dressed up and that made the party real fun. Unfortunately they decided to finish the night with a live band which was terrible and majority of the guests lefts around 1am-1:30am.    We tried to get information on the programme of the New Year party prior to arrival to the hotel as well as front desk at the hotel and they weren‚Äôt able to give us any details even on a day of the Gala Dinner.    Hotel provides the transport to the city (stop just outside Koutoubia Mosque) it leaves at 9:20 10:30 15:35 17:35 20:05 and returns at 12:30 13:45 19:00 21:00 and 22:30. You need to book at least two hours in advance to get a seat.    Overall it‚Äôs a decent hotel but definitely not a five star. The reception team are rude and very slow room service is none existent our numerous request for iron and water were simply ignored. The service overall leaves a lot to be desired but the food is good and the rooms comfortable and very clean. Marrakech is a great city to visit.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: CocoNorthernIreland wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Beautiful and modern hotel with very clean areas. Totally spotless. Rooms beautiful and swim up are so nice with the balcony. Food needs improved. Shuttle to town good. Staff lovely and friendly. Bar service could do with better glasses as plastic looks very badly worn.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Maxie166 wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: This hotel and its staff are what made a truly special holiday. From beautiful and very clean rooms to delicious and varied food everything was very good. The restaurant team was great and after the first two days the servers knew your drinks of by heart and we never waited longer than 5 minutes maximum for our drinks. The pools are nice and the animation team try and get everyone involved. I can not fault them for any of the above.  However the reason why I‚Äôm not giving this hotel 5 stars is the incredibly rude front desk staff. Every time we went to the desk (to book the bus into town get some cash or have our key rescanned for the 20th time in 7 days) the receptionists were rude and condescending often acting like we were a great inconvenience. Especially when trying to book the on site restaurant we were told to book in advance. when we asked the restaurant was apparently booked out every night but always empty when we walked past. If the front desk staff had some better customer management training or skills this hotel would definitely receive 5 out of 5 from me.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Fiona B wrote a review Jan 2019
Review_Text: Wonderful hotel with lovely staff. The rooms are beautiful and well designed with the bath looking over the room and outside. Swim up room was good although we were put in the only room that received shade all day. Food buffet was brilliant as was the wine of which we had a lot! Value for money if you are happy to eat and drink your weight in food like we were ü§™ it was Christmas after all! Thank you for a wonderful stay.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: 186338Rob wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Well appointed for a relaxing break
Review_Text: We spent the Christmas week here having booked a package with Tui. The hotel offers very good facilities with two outdoor swimming pools (not heated) an outdoor snack bar and a pool bar. We had a suite which was huge and well appointed. A bed was placed in the lounge area for the third adult in the party and we still had more than enough room to spread out. The room was well maintained and spotless. We had a huge balcony overlooking the snack bar and pool. I‚Äôd recommend asking for a room/suite overlooking the second pool as it would be much quieter as they do have blaring music around the main pool all day. The hotel is all inclusive. The food in the main dining room was plentiful and well displayed but we found it very bland and in need of some seasoning. The more intimate restaurant (which you are allowed to use once during a 7 night holiday) was a big disappointment. Again bland food with two menu choices. Drinks were acceptable and plentiful (no well known brands) and were available at the snack bar pool bar lounge and the dinning room. The hotel is situated well outside Marrakech but offered a shuttle bus service into the old town. The problem was the frequency of this service which meant that we had to use a taxi on occasion as the last shuttle in the morning was about 10.30 and the first in the afternoon well after 15.00. I had a massage at the spa. It had had a good write up but I was surprised that they didn‚Äôt ask for any details of injuries operations etc which any well appointed spa would do. The massage itself was mediocre.  All in all this is a good holiday hotel that pretty much provides the services advertised. It is however nowhere near the standards of 5* hotels found in the Far East.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lt3 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Lovely Hotel but HUGE Security Risk
Review_Text: I stayed here Christmas week as a lady travelling on her own. Firstly there was confusion checking in with some people being seen to whilst others were just told to sit down. Rooms are stunning the bathroom fabulous. As with most hotels the rooms have sliding glass doors which (supposedly) lock simply by flicking down a latch...or so you think. Due to a bit of jet lag I decided to have an early night on my first night. At about 10pm I was woken by the opening of the doors and a man entering my room. Once I half screamed at him he retreated having spoken to a 2nd man behind him!! I immediately rang reception to tell them and all I got was "Was it another tourist who was confused?" (No) "How do you know it was a Morrocan man (he spoke to a 2nd man in Arabic). He then grudgingly said security would have a look around. Not once was there any concern from staff about my safety or wellbeing or any reassurances I was very shook up as a lady on my own. 20 mins later I just get a call to say there was nobody there and that was that. The next morning I explained the incident to the young Tui Rep who didn't seem overly bothered and said she would contact me later and fill out an incident form. Of course no contact was made despite her having my number due to me booking one of her trips. Not great Tui. I work for a hotel back in England and we take matters of security very seriously.It just seemed swept under the carpet. Other than this the hotel staff are good Karim and Simo are great although they will beg you to write a review. Food is mediocre and the same every day. The bar/snack bars are understaffed with often one person on to serve many people. Shuttle bus to market great although if you miss the return 13.45 bus back you are stranded there until the next one at 7pm. Don't quite understand that. Main entertainment doesnt start until 10pm which in my opinon is too late. Hotel will change your money into Dirhams but don't want to know if you want to change them back at the end of the holiday. Recommend the balloon trip excursion however they bill it as a sunrise excursion when it's not. All in all I would recommend just be careful to lock your doors and secure your belongings in the safe!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled solo

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: lauracallender2018 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Just leaving the hotel after a fantastic week‚Äôs break. The hotel staff could not possibly do any more for you. A special thanks to Abdul in the Sports bar for keeping our glasses topped up! The hotel is absolutely spotless and the staff are endlessly cleaning and gardening. Rooms lovely and beds very comfy! Evening entertainment varied but we especially enjoyed the African dancing and DJ Smix. If I‚Äôm the evenings we preferred a more relaxed night the sports bar was great. Showed all the football and lots of board games. We found the food to be more than adequate with a great variety although it didn‚Äôt change much over the week. Used the free shuttle bus on two days which is a really fab addition. A brilliant week!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: chrsrams wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Hotel 4 star at best. Food very average and poorly cooked. Outside facilities very good with an excellent animation team. Pool bar ok for lunch staff very obliging despite some rude guests mainly from north England. Very good gym. Spa over priced and managed by a rude arrogant man. Gardens a real feature. Whole place both in and out spotless. Constant cleaning going on. Rooms large cold. Bathroom drains smell at times. Shuttle bus very good excellent drivers. If your not a foodie it‚Äôs one of the better all inclusive hotels. If you go on holiday for cuisine don‚Äôt go here.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

I felt I needed to write an honest review as I picked this hotel based on the reviews I saw and a lot of them were positive I went expecting 5 star luxury and I definitely didn‚Äôt get it that said Morocco is beautiful try a Riad
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only

Rooms are very spacious just missing a kettle but that is the only negative. There are two large pools one providing poolside activities and one which is quiet and has a swim to bar.

The animation team were amazing  Karol  Fati  Titif  Salim  Simo  Ibrahim  5 Stars ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ  The hotel is very clean all the staff very friendly I would recommend this hotel to everyone the food is very good withgreat choices
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Babs wrote a review Dec 2018

Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Wanderer51690704940 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Excellent stay- First time in Marrakech :)
Review_Text: We had an excellent time here on our first visit to Marrakech. The staff are very welcoming and friendly and also speak very good English if your French is not the best! Our room was beautiful and there was plenty to do at the Hotel itself. The food was fantastic although if you are vegetarian your options are very limited at the A La Carte restaurant! There are however plenty of options for veggies at both the snack Bar and the Buffet! The hotel is very clean and well looked after and they provide a shuttle into the centre throughout the day as well! The hotel is just a little bit outside of Marrakech so taxis the medina and the souks are not walking distance. either the shuttle or a taxi is your best option although the taxis do not run fast 10pm to the hotel. Overall we had a fantastic time and would definitely love to come back and stay here x
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Steve B wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Be Live Collection adults only Marakech
Review_Text: We have come here with friends for Christmas and New Year 2018 and boy is this a true 5 star hotel. The food is excellent and the selection should suite everyones choice with both traditional Moroccan and European. The staff are attentive and willing to help in both the main restaurant and the pool snack bar the drinks are of a high standard the cleanliness is exceptional everywhere. There are poolside activities throughout the day and entertainment in the evenings.  So far we cannot fault anything.  SteveJennJaksPaul.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Lori G wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: My boyfriend and I stayed in the Be Live collection Hotel 14th - 21st of Dec ‚Äò18 and I cannot recommend the hotel enough. We had read a lot of negative reviews before arriving and were slightly apprehensive but they couldn‚Äôt be further from what we experienced.    Arrival:  Before we had arrived we had read other reviews complaining on the lack of information provided on the security deposit and on the deposit for the towels. However we received an email from our travel agents prior to arrival informing us of the payments and the process for paying them.    Food & Service:    Breakfast lunch and dinner in the restaurant and the snack bar available to provide breakfast and lunch (panini‚Äôs burgers & pizza etc) and some of the best chips (fries) we‚Äôve ever tasted in our lives.    The food for all meals came in great variety was fresh and changed daily to avoid repetitiveness. Thoroughly enjoyed eating the meals in the hotel.    The service from staff in the snack bar and in the restaurant was fantastic. There was a gentleman serving food and a women serving drinks who spoke great English and French and who cared to all our needs and loved a bit of chat. Special mention to the waiter who served us in the Restaurant most nights Mourad. Mourad was great always providing drinks with a smile and asking how our day was very attentive and caring.    Also in normal all inclusive hotels the drinks are watered down but can ensure you this was not the case in the be live collection drinks were delicious and just like back home.    Room:  The room and the hotel in general was immaculate. Comfy big beds with plenty of room and very modern.    Entertainment:  There was entertainment on everyday run by the hotel entertainment team who were unbelievable so enthusiastic and great for getting everyone involved. Activities were fun and good way to get to know others staying in the hotel.  Also the hotel has a sports bar/games room which has every game you can think of ( pool table dominoes cards uno... etc) They also showed the English premier league games when they were on for the guests. Late night sandwiches were also a great touch Adbel    Great variety of entertainment at the lobby bar at night Great service from Mohssine.    Rambled on a bit but overall couldn‚Äôt fault the hotel and the service. We will certainly be back and will be recommending to our friends and family.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Happiness04393391123 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Spent a week at the Be Live Collection Marrakesh hotel staff were fabulous really enjoyed it no problems excellent holiday. Only real grumble is that the hotel could put allergen signs on the food to help people with allergies.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only

Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Vacationer237950 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: oh my gosh just as we have arrived they were asking for the local taxes for our 7 days stay I was like I have not converted the money yet so if you give me a chance I will in a couple of days I received a lot of rudeness (ie as in pay now pay by card etc etc) because of this. I was not running anywhere as I was staying for 7 days A couple of essentials missing as in cotton buds and face towels little things like these make a hotel a five-star hotel. so this hotel is not a five-star hotelWe were all inclusive and the international food was amazing and good but the local Moroccan food there was a very strange smell coming from the food which all guests were complaining about and were disliking the food later on we were told it is a kind of herb that is being used I disagree I think it was definitely something else as in to do with animals The entertainment was good at least something every evening.I don't know if this is professional or not but the hotel staff would dine with the guestsIn my experience of five-star hotels this definitely does not happen anywhere in the world. I had a leaking sink in my room enough said!This is not 5 star standards!I am yet still making my mind up if i could bring myself to recommend this hotel because of all the previous examples I have presented!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Joy Baker wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: First time visiting this Hotel. The rooms were clean and tidy and the staff at reception friendly and helpful.  The restaurant has a variety of traditional foods which were delicious. The staff in the restaurant were friendly and helpful. Some of the different foods could have been more clearly labelled. However when staff were asked they were helpful.  The bar staff were friendly and nothing was too much trouble.  The entertainment team Simo Salim Ibraham Karim Titij and Fati were all great fun. Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Journey39079330468 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Gorgeous grounds, delicious food, everything we needed!
Review_Text: We had a great week here for our homeymoon. The food all tastes fresh and mouth-watering. The waiting staff are so friendly and attentive. Activities and entertainment were great to get involved with/watch. Drinks are watered down and they want you to pay cash for the add-ons instead of putting it on the room which was annoying!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Paula Amorim wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: I been to be live adults only marrakech hotel for 7 days me and my husband loved everything..rooms very clean  good food  food entertainment.. the only thing I'm disappointment it's I paid 1000 dilar when I check in on the 2nd December and check out 9th December and I still not have my deposit back I want to know why if anyone from the hotel management let me know joseamorim56@hotmail.com  Thank you
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Naomi M wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Really great holiday not only was the weather great but the staff MADE the holiday! Everyone was so hopeful and kind and the entertainment here was amazing everything from day activities like archery to the white party in the evening! Karim especially was excellent and constantly made sure myself and mum were entertained and had everything we needed to make a great holiday...will definitely be coming back again soon!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: mstb wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Great hotel but quite a long way from the centre.
Review_Text: This is a new hotel which at the moment is fairly isolated there is not really anywhere to go from the hotel unless you get a taxi. There is a free shuttle bus into the centre of town but the times are not particularly convenient.  The food in the buffet was very good and the staff were very friendly there was wait for drinkd at the pool bar and in the main bar at the busiest times but not really anything to complain about.  The grounds are well maintained with two good sizes pools one of which is heated essential for cooler weather!

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Jodie wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Title: Its Ok for a chill out
Review_Text: The hotel itself is nice although it does not look new - there is a lot of maintenance issues and the drains sometimes smelt awful. The food in the buffet is nice although not hot and quite repetitive. There is also large amount of fish which is not great if you do not eat it. Evenings are quiet but hotel was not busy and entertainment does not start until 10pm which we found quite late when its every night. Also the amount of flies round the snack bar and when you are eating is hard to bare. The Morrocan Al A cart restaurant was the worst I have ever been too - both me and my partner could not eat the food and it was empty most nights where other people did not like the look for it either. Overall was good for a quiet chilled trip before christmas but we will not be returning.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Phil R wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Beautiful modern and spacious hotel all staff inc house keeping waiters and entertainment all great at the same time not over pushy. Too many choices with food to choose from different every day. Entertainment staff keep you entertained all day and night with various activity‚Äôs again not over pushy if you want to just watch that‚Äôs fine too. Beds are huge so comfy. Waiters cleared away plates quickly and your glasses topped up.  Overall a wonderful 4 day break.  A lovey touch for us though was when the staff dressed up our room for my wife‚Äôs birthday! Made her day!  As we have children we probably won‚Äôt make it back for a few years but will definitely recommend it.

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Sarah R wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Came for a short break to celebrate my 40th birthday and some winter sun! From the moment we arrived we were made to feel very welcome. All staff were very attentive and friendly without being overly so.    Rooms were lovely and were spacious and clean. Drench shower was amazing!    There was plenty to do in the daytime at the hotel like aqua aerobics and archery. Which lots of guest took part in and we really enjoyed. Simo salim ibrahim fati titis and karim in the entertainment team all work really hard make sure guests are entertained from day to night time.    The buffet restaurant was lovely plenty of choice and very tasty. Waiters again were very attentive and friendly and kept your drinks filled and plates cleared quickly.    Bar staff were great wine and beer were very good  and cocktails were lovely.    We really enjoyed our stay here and love to return!    Thanks to everyone x
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Adventure75683 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: We had the most relaxing five days. Lovely people at the reception and restaurant. Good variety of food with excellent service with smile. Pool side cafe - service with smile. Lots of poolside entertainment by Simo Karin Salim Fati Titif and Ibrahim. Thank you guys for keeping us fit with yoga Zumba aqua etc. Will definitely go back
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with family

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Kelly J wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Myself and my partner just arrived home today. We enjoyed every minute of our holiday. The hotel is spacious certainly not over crowded. Nothing is ever out of place extremely pristine. The bedroom and bathroom is spacious. The comfiest bed I have ever slept in whilst in holiday!!  Staff are very friendly helpful and polite. The food is fresh and tasty. My only negative is the breakfast could have more choice. However for a total chill out break away from the Christmas madness we loved it!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Maps49609645905 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Super and I will come back for a vacation. I went a the DDD10 conference and everythink was perfect. I will come again by God grace for a vacation to enjoy the room the service the good good and the vibe of Marrakech.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled on business

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: soul200 wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Everything about this hotel food surroundings ect. is very good. It is a bit far from the center and after the second day although they provide a shuttle service to the center We felt a bit isolated and bored.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: laserkid wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: The weather in December appeared very stabil with sunny days and cold nights.  We found this new hotel very clean and friendly for the adults stay.  The rooms are large with comfy bed but furniture looks more like tourist 4 star than 5 star standard.  The bathroom is spacious well arranged with seperate shower bathtube and WC.  Since the size of the hotel is not big slightly more than 200 rooms and the there are only storey buildings this venue is not congested and guarantees pretty full intimacy.  In the all inclusive option the food was rather repetitive with menu not very appealing. The breakfast choice was very samay every day and some dishes like meats and cheeses looked dried up and not tempting.  The bar is quite small and in the evening when there is organized the enterteinment could be lack of seats and very loudly.  The essential pros of this entity is free shuttle into the town centre the last after dinner with return 10.30 pm.  The staff is friendly tactful and not intrusive.  Generally the Be Live Collection is a good address and the town Marrakesh offers interesting and safe vacation with wide cultural and sightseeing program.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled with friends

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Mark S wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Stayed for a week at the end of November. Temperatures got up to around 25 celcius and down to about 10 at night. The hotel is new and kept really clean and runs a bus several times a day into the city centre. It's about a 25 minute drive.    Two good sized pools outside and Simo in the entertainment team is a good guy. All the service we got was really good by the staff and they did a really nice gesture for my partner's birthday. The food wasn't bad but not great either. The one thing they could improve is the food labelling as sometimes I didn't know what certain things were which would be a problem for vegetarians
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: ktmitch89l wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: It was our first visit to Marrakech and chose this hotel because we felt that adults only would be more suitable especially for some winter sun where we just wanted to get some heat and relax. We had been told by a couple of people that some people out in Morocco were rude but we weren‚Äôt expecting it at the hotel. That being said it was only one female reception attendant however this happened very early on arrival in fact.    Other than this our experience of the hotel was quite good. It‚Äôs very much a first generation all inclusive where there‚Äôs only one buffet restaurant and an a la carte (which you can only use once). The a la carte restaurant had 2 set menus to choose from but the food was delicious. In the buffet there was a variety of food with options for all but they were very samey. Lunch and dinner often had a similar selection. But the breakfast was great as there was a variety of foods which you would eat only once a day.  There is also a snack bar which serves breakfast from 10am (with a small menu) and also lunch which is great for those who want things like a club sandwich pizza burgers etc.    The pools were great. A nice size and you have a choice of two. The quieter pool which is to the right of the doors to the back of the hotel and the activity pool for all your aqua aerobics Zumba etc. The latter is a fair bit warmer than the first. But the first also boasts a pool bar. The activities available are varied and there is something for everyone (if you like that sort of thing)    As for the rooms they have everything you need and are always clean. The maids regularly stock the shampoo/lotion etc and make your bed but only change the bedding/towels every 3 days to save on laundry costs and the effect on the environment which is great!  Another lovely touch was that when the staff found out we were there on our anniversary we were treated to a gorgeous arrangement of petals and the maids actually spent the time to arrange our towels into swans.    All in all a fantastic place to get away. I think there are just some tweaks that need to be made for it to be truly a 5* establishment

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: st aubins wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Had a very good deal here for 4 nights from Liverpool. Never seen a cleaner hotel bedroom was large and bed one of the comfiest ever. Staff were attentive smiley and gracious. It was quiet especially around the pool but at this time of year expected. Most of the large hotels in Marrakesh are on the outskirts therefore nowhere for you to go for a stroll - but minibus available to go into the city several times a day. Would highly recommend for a bit of winter sun.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Gary S wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: Stayed for a week from 7th Dec 2018 snd have to say it is a superb hotel. Food drinks staff rooms etc are all excellent and pleasantly suprised me. Weather was pretty good and the Taste of Riad trip into Marakesh is well worth a try. Marakesh old town is 20 mins free shuttle bus ride which is regular day and night. The market and Suk's are very very busy but a must to visit.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Be Live Collection Marrakech Adults Only
Review_Date: Helenastocks wrote a review Dec 2018
Review_Text: We had a gorgeous time staying at the Be Live Collection for 7 days. The hotel is very clean and they replace towels sheets etc daily and the outside pool area and rest of the hotel was emmaculate. The food was good - obviously when you‚Äôre all inclusive anywhere it can feel at times repitive but they did what they could to mix it up and we really enjoyed it.    The service was fantastic and everyone was very helpful - we would especially like to thank Oussama for taking good care of us day and night in the restaurant. He was so polite kind and helpful and always remembered what drinks we had without even asking! The reception staff were also great.    The hotel provides a free shuttle bus to and from the centre which is so helpful - saves you a lot of money on taxis. Great facilities too gym spa indoor pool and organised actitivities. It‚Äôs a good relaxing retreat away from the hustle and bustle so you can have a bit of both during your stay - it‚Äôs only 20 mins from central too.    Thank you Be Live Collection and TUI!
